4053 * and its user-value in the interface structure
4054 */
4055 switch (remap.z_axis)
4056 {
4057 case BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS:
4058
4059 /* If mapped to x-axis */
4060 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4061 remapped_axis->z = BMI2_X;
4062 break;
4063 case BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS:
4064
4065 /* If mapped to y-axis */
4066 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4067 remapped_axis->z = BMI2_Y;
4068 break;
4069 case BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS:
4070
4071 /* If mapped to z-axis */
4072 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4073 remapped_axis->z = BMI2_Z;
4074 break;
4075 default:
4076 break;
4077 }
4078
4079 /* Store the re-mapped z-axis sign in device structure
4080 * and its user-value in the interface structure
4081 */
4082 if(remap.z_axis_sign)
4083 {
4084 /* If z-axis is mapped to -ve sign */
4085 dev->remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_NEG_SIGN;
4086 remapped_axis->z |= BMI2_AXIS_SIGN;
4087 }
4088 else
4089 {
4090 dev->remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_POS_SIGN;
4091 }
4092 }
4093 }
4094 else
4095 {
4096 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4097 }
4098
4099 return rslt;
4100}
4101
4106XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_set_remap_axes(const struct bmi2_remap *remapped_axis, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4107{
4108 /* Variable to define error */
4109 XBYTESIG rslt;
4110
4111 /* Variable to store all the re-mapped axes */
4112 XBYTE remap_axes = 0;
4113
4114 /* Variable to store the re-mapped x-axes */
4115 XBYTE remap_x = 0;
4116
4117 /* Variable to store the re-mapped y-axes */
4118 XBYTE remap_y = 0;
4119
4120 /* Variable to store the re-mapped z-axes */
4121 XBYTE remap_z = 0;
4122
4123 /* Initialize the local structure for axis re-mapping */
4124 struct bmi2_axes_remap remap = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
4125
4126 /* Null-pointer check */
4127 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4128 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (remapped_axis != NULL))
4129 {
4130 /* Check whether all the axes are re-mapped */
4131 remap_axes = remapped_axis->x | remapped_axis->y | remapped_axis->z;
4132
4133 /* If all the axes are re-mapped */
4134 if((remap_axes & BMI2_AXIS_MASK) == BMI2_AXIS_MASK)
4135 {
4136 /* Get the re-mapped value of x, y and z axis */
4137 remap_x = remapped_axis->x & BMI2_AXIS_MASK;
4138 remap_y = remapped_axis->y & BMI2_AXIS_MASK;
4139 remap_z = remapped_axis->z & BMI2_AXIS_MASK;
4140
4141 /* Store the value of re-mapped x-axis in both
4142 * device structure and the local structure
4143 */
4144 switch (remap_x)
4145 {
4146 case BMI2_X:
4147
4148 /* If mapped to x-axis */
4149 dev->remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4150 remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4151 break;
4152 case BMI2_Y:
4153
4154 /* If mapped to y-axis */
4155 dev->remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4156 remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4157 break;
4158 case BMI2_Z:
4159
4160 /* If mapped to z-axis */
4161 dev->remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4162 remap.x_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4163 break;
4164 default:
4165 break;
4166 }
4167
4168 /* Store the re-mapped x-axis sign in the device
4169 * structure and its value in local structure
4170 */
4171 if(remapped_axis->x & BMI2_AXIS_SIGN)
4172 {
4173 /* If x-axis is mapped to -ve sign */
4174 dev->remap.x_axis_sign = BMI2_NEG_SIGN;
4175 remap.x_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_NEGATIVE;
4176 }
4177 else
4178 {
4179 dev->remap.x_axis_sign = BMI2_POS_SIGN;
4180 remap.x_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_POSITIVE;
4181 }
4182
4183 /* Store the value of re-mapped y-axis in both
4184 * device structure and the local structure
4185 */
4186 switch (remap_y)
4187 {
4188 case BMI2_X:
4189
4190 /* If mapped to x-axis */
4191 dev->remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4192 remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4193 break;
4194 case BMI2_Y:
4195
4196 /* If mapped to y-axis */
4197 dev->remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4198 remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4199 break;
4200 case BMI2_Z:
4201
4202 /* If mapped to z-axis */
4203 dev->remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4204 remap.y_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4205 break;
4206 default:
4207 break;
4208 }
4209
4210 /* Store the re-mapped y-axis sign in the device
4211 * structure and its value in local structure
4212 */
4213 if(remapped_axis->y & BMI2_AXIS_SIGN)
4214 {
4215 /* If y-axis is mapped to -ve sign */
4216 dev->remap.y_axis_sign = BMI2_NEG_SIGN;
4217 remap.y_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_NEGATIVE;
4218 }
4219 else
4220 {
4221 dev->remap.y_axis_sign = BMI2_POS_SIGN;
4222 remap.y_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_POSITIVE;
4223 }
4224
4225 /* Store the value of re-mapped z-axis in both
4226 * device structure and the local structure
4227 */
4228 switch (remap_z)
4229 {
4230 case BMI2_X:
4231
4232 /* If mapped to x-axis */
4233 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4234 remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_X_AXIS;
4235 break;
4236 case BMI2_Y:
4237
4238 /* If mapped to y-axis */
4239 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4240 remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Y_AXIS;
4241 break;
4242 case BMI2_Z:
4243
4244 /* If mapped to z-axis */
4245 dev->remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4246 remap.z_axis = BMI2_MAP_Z_AXIS;
4247 break;
4248 default:
4249 break;
4250 }
4251
4252 /* Store the re-mapped z-axis sign in the device
4253 * structure and its value in local structure
4254 */
4255 if(remapped_axis->z & BMI2_AXIS_SIGN)
4256 {
4257 /* If z-axis is mapped to -ve sign */
4258 dev->remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_NEG_SIGN;
4259 remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_NEGATIVE;
4260 }
4261 else
4262 {
4263 dev->remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_POS_SIGN;
4264 remap.z_axis_sign = BMI2_MAP_POSITIVE;
4265 }
4266
4267 /* Set the re-mapped axes in the sensor */
4268 rslt = set_remap_axes(&remap, dev);
4269 }
4270 else
4271 {
4272 rslt = BMI2_E_REMAP_ERROR;
4273 }
4274 }
4275 else
4276 {
4277 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4278 }
4279
4280 return rslt;
4281}
4282
4287XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_set_gyro_offset_comp(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4288{
4289 /* Variable to define error */
4290 XBYTESIG rslt;
4291
4292 /* Variable to define register data */
4293 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
4294
4295 /* Null-pointer check */
4296 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4297 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4298 {
4299 /* Get the status of gyroscope offset enable */
4300 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_6_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
4301 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4302 {
4303 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_EN, enable);
4304
4305 /* Enable/Disable gyroscope offset compensation */
4306 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_6_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
4307 }
4308 }
4309 else
4310 {
4311 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4312 }
4313
4314 return rslt;
4315}
4316
4321XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_read_gyro_offset_comp_axes(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr_off_comp_axes, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4322{
4323 /* Variable to define error */
4324 XBYTESIG rslt;
4325
4326 /* Variable to define register data */
4327 XBYTE reg_data[4] = { 0 };
4328
4329 /* Variable to store LSB value of offset compensation for x-axis */
4330 XBYTE gyr_off_lsb_x;
4331
4332 /* Variable to store LSB value of offset compensation for y-axis */
4333 XBYTE gyr_off_lsb_y;
4334
4335 /* Variable to store LSB value of offset compensation for z-axis */
4336 XBYTE gyr_off_lsb_z;
4337
4338 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for x-axis */
4339 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_x;
4340
4341 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for y-axis */
4342 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_y;
4343
4344 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for z-axis */
4345 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_z;
4346
4347 /* Null-pointer check */
4348 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4349 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (gyr_off_comp_axes != NULL))
4350 {
4351 /* Get the gyroscope compensated offset values */
4352 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_3_ADDR, reg_data, 4, dev);
4353 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4354 {
4355 /* Get LSB and MSB values of offset compensation for
4356 * x, y and z axis
4357 */
4358 gyr_off_lsb_x = reg_data[0];
4359 gyr_off_lsb_y = reg_data[1];
4360 gyr_off_lsb_z = reg_data[2];
4361 gyr_off_msb_x = reg_data[3] & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_X_MASK;
4362 gyr_off_msb_y = reg_data[3] & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_Y_MASK;
4363 gyr_off_msb_z = reg_data[3] & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_Z_MASK;
4364
4365 /* Gyroscope offset compensation value for x-axis */
4366 gyr_off_comp_axes->x = (XWORDSIG)(((XWORD) gyr_off_msb_x << 8) | gyr_off_lsb_x);
4367
4368 /* Gyroscope offset compensation value for y-axis */
4369 gyr_off_comp_axes->y = (XWORDSIG)(((XWORD) gyr_off_msb_y << 6) | gyr_off_lsb_y);
4370
4371 /* Gyroscope offset compensation value for z-axis */
4372 gyr_off_comp_axes->z = (XWORDSIG)(((XWORD) gyr_off_msb_z << 4) | gyr_off_lsb_z);
4373 }
4374 }
4375 else
4376 {
4377 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4378 }
4379
4380 return rslt;
4381}
4382
4387XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_write_gyro_offset_comp_axes(const struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr_off_comp_axes, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4388{
4389 /* Variable to define error */
4390 XBYTESIG rslt;
4391
4392 /* Variable to define register data */
4393 XBYTE reg_data[4] = { 0 };
4394
4395 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for x-axis */
4396 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_x;
4397
4398 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for y-axis */
4399 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_y;
4400
4401 /* Variable to store MSB value of offset compensation for z-axis */
4402 XBYTE gyr_off_msb_z;
4403
4404 /* Null-pointer check */
4405 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4406 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (gyr_off_comp_axes != NULL))
4407 {
4408 /* Get the MSB values of gyroscope compensated offset values */
4409 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_6_ADDR, &reg_data[3], 1, dev);
4410 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4411 {
4412 /* Get MSB value of x-axis from user-input */
4413 gyr_off_msb_x = (XBYTE)((gyr_off_comp_axes->x & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_MASK) >> 8);
4414
4415 /* Get MSB value of y-axis from user-input */
4416 gyr_off_msb_y = (XBYTE)((gyr_off_comp_axes->y & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_MASK) >> 8);
4417
4418 /* Get MSB value of z-axis from user-input */
4419 gyr_off_msb_z = (XBYTE)((gyr_off_comp_axes->z & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_MASK) >> 8);
4420
4421 /* Get LSB value of x-axis from user-input */
4422 reg_data[0] = (XBYTE)(gyr_off_comp_axes->x & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_LSB_MASK);
4423
4424 /* Get LSB value of y-axis from user-input */
4425 reg_data[1] = (XBYTE)(gyr_off_comp_axes->y & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_LSB_MASK);
4426
4427 /* Get LSB value of z-axis from user-input */
4428 reg_data[2] = (XBYTE)(gyr_off_comp_axes->z & BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_LSB_MASK);
4429
4430 /* Get MSB value of x-axis to be set */
4431 reg_data[3] = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[3], BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_X, gyr_off_msb_x);
4432
4433 /* Get MSB value of y-axis to be set */
4434 reg_data[3] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[3], BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_Y, gyr_off_msb_y);
4435
4436 /* Get MSB value of z-axis to be set */
4437 reg_data[3] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[3], BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_MSB_Z, gyr_off_msb_z);
4438
4439 /* Set the offset compensation values of axes */
4440 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_GYR_OFF_COMP_3_ADDR, reg_data, 4, dev);
4441 }
4442 }
4443 else
4444 {
4445 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4446 }
4447
4448 return rslt;
4449}
4450
4455XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_get_gyro_cross_sense(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4456{
4457 /* Variable to define error */
4458 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
4459 struct bmi2_sensor_data data;
4460
4461 /* Check if the feature is supported by this variant */
4462 if(dev->variant_feature & BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_SENS_ENABLE)
4463 {
4464 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4465 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4466 {
4467 /* Select the feature whose data is to be acquired */
4468 data.type = BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_SENSE;
4469
4470 /* Get the respective data */
4471 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_data(&data, 1, dev);
4472 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4473 {
4474 /* Update the gyroscope cross sense value of z axis
4475 * in the device structure
4476 */
4477 dev->gyr_cross_sens_zx = data.sens_data.correction_factor_zx;
4478 }
4479 }
4480 else
4481 {
4482 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4483 }
4484 }
4485
4486 return rslt;
4487}
4488
4492XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_get_internal_status(XBYTE *int_stat, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4493{
4494 /* Variable to define error */
4495 XBYTESIG rslt;
4496
4497 /* Null-pointer check */
4498 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4499 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (int_stat != NULL))
4500 {
4501 /* Delay to read the internal status */
4502 bmi2_delay_us(20000, dev->intf_ptr);
4503
4504 /* Get the error bits and message */
4505 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_INTERNAL_STATUS_ADDR, int_stat, 1, dev);
4506 }
4507 else
4508 {
4509 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4510 }
4511
4512 return rslt;
4513}
4514
4517/* Suppressing doxygen warnings triggered for same static function names present across various sensor variant
4518 * directories */
4519
4524XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::verify_foc_position(XBYTE sens_list,
4525 const struct bmi2_accel_foc_g_value *accel_g_axis,
4526 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4527{
4528 XBYTESIG rslt;
4529
4530 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data avg_foc_data = { 0 };
4531 struct bmi2_foc_temp_value temp_foc_data = { 0 };
4532
4533 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4534 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4535 {
4536 /* Enable sensor */
4537 rslt = bmi2_sensor_enable(&sens_list, 1, dev);
4538 }
4539
4540 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4541 {
4542
4543 rslt = get_average_of_sensor_data(sens_list, &temp_foc_data, dev);
4544 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4545 {
4546 if(sens_list == BMI2_ACCEL)
4547 {
4548
4549 /* Taking modulus to make negative values as positive */
4550 if((accel_g_axis->x == 1) && (accel_g_axis->sign == 1))
4551 {
4552 temp_foc_data.x = temp_foc_data.x * -1;
4553 }
4554 else if((accel_g_axis->y == 1) && (accel_g_axis->sign == 1))
4555 {
4556 temp_foc_data.y = temp_foc_data.y * -1;
4557 }
4558 else if((accel_g_axis->z == 1) && (accel_g_axis->sign == 1))
4559 {
4560 temp_foc_data.z = temp_foc_data.z * -1;
4561 }
4562 }
4563
4564 /* Typecasting into 16bit */
4565 avg_foc_data.x = (XWORDSIG)(temp_foc_data.x);
4566 avg_foc_data.y = (XWORDSIG)(temp_foc_data.y);
4567 avg_foc_data.z = (XWORDSIG)(temp_foc_data.z);
4568
4569 rslt = validate_foc_position(sens_list, accel_g_axis, avg_foc_data, dev);
4570 }
4571 }
4572
4573 return rslt;
4574}
4575
4581XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_perform_accel_foc(const struct bmi2_accel_foc_g_value *accel_g_value, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4582{
4583 /* Variable to define error */
4584 XBYTESIG rslt;
4585
4586 /* Structure to define the accelerometer configurations */
4587 struct bmi2_accel_config acc_cfg = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
4588
4589 /* Variable to store status of advance power save */
4590 XBYTE aps = 0;
4591
4592 /* Variable to store status of accelerometer enable */
4593 XBYTE acc_en = 0;
4594
4595 /* Null-pointer check */
4596 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4597 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (accel_g_value != NULL))
4598 {
4599 /* Check for input validity */
4600 if((((BMI2_ABS(accel_g_value->x)) + (BMI2_ABS(accel_g_value->y)) + (BMI2_ABS(accel_g_value->z))) == 1) &&
4601 ((accel_g_value->sign == 1) || (accel_g_value->sign == 0)))
4602 {
4603 rslt = verify_foc_position(BMI2_ACCEL, accel_g_value, dev);
4604 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4605 {
4606
4607 /* Save accelerometer configurations, accelerometer
4608 * enable status and advance power save status
4609 */
4610 rslt = save_accel_foc_config(&acc_cfg, &aps, &acc_en, dev);
4611 }
4612
4613 /* Set configurations for FOC */
4614 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4615 {
4616 rslt = set_accel_foc_config(dev);
4617 }
4618
4619 /* Perform accelerometer FOC */
4620 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4621 {
4622 rslt = perform_accel_foc(accel_g_value, &acc_cfg, dev);
4623 }
4624
4625 /* Restore the saved configurations */
4626 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4627 {
4628 rslt = restore_accel_foc_config(&acc_cfg, aps, acc_en, dev);
4629 }
4630 }
4631 else
4632 {
4633 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_INPUT;
4634 }
4635 }
4636 else
4637 {
4638 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4639 }
4640
4641 return rslt;
4642}
4643
4647XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_perform_gyro_foc(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4648{
4649 /* Variable to define error */
4650 XBYTESIG rslt;
4651
4652 /* Structure to define the gyroscope configurations */
4653 struct bmi2_gyro_config gyr_cfg = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
4654
4655 /* Variable to store status of advance power save */
4656 XBYTE aps = 0;
4657
4658 /* Variable to store status of gyroscope enable */
4659 XBYTE gyr_en = 0;
4660
4661 /* Array of structure to store gyroscope data */
4662 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data gyr_value[128];
4663
4664 /* Structure to store gyroscope data temporarily */
4665 struct bmi2_foc_temp_value temp = { 0, 0, 0 };
4666
4667 /* Variable to store status read from the status register */
4668 XBYTE reg_status = 0;
4669
4670 /* Variable to define count */
4671 XBYTE loop = 0;
4672
4673 /* Structure to store the offset values to be stored in the register */
4674 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data gyro_offset = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
4675
4676 /* Null-pointer check */
4677 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
4678 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4679 {
4680 /* Argument2 is not applicable for gyro */
4681 rslt = verify_foc_position(BMI2_GYRO, 0, dev);
4682 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4683 {
4684 /* Save gyroscope configurations, gyroscope enable
4685 * status and advance power save status
4686 */
4687 rslt = save_gyro_config(&gyr_cfg, &aps, &gyr_en, dev);
4688
4689 /* Set configurations for gyroscope FOC */
4690 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4691 {
4692 rslt = set_gyro_foc_config(dev);
4693 }
4694
4695 /* Perform FOC */
4696 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4697 {
4698 for (loop = 0; loop < 128; loop++)
4699 {
4700 /* Giving a delay of more than 40ms since ODR is configured as 25Hz */
4701 bmi2_delay_us(50000, dev->intf_ptr);
4702
4703 /* Get gyroscope data ready interrupt status */
4704 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&reg_status, dev);
4705
4706 /* Read 128 samples of gyroscope data on data ready interrupt */
4707 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (reg_status & BMI2_DRDY_GYR))
4708 {
4709 rslt = read_gyro_xyz(&gyr_value[loop], dev);
4710 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4711 {
4712 /* Store the data in a temporary structure */
4713 temp.x = temp.x + (XDWORDSIG)gyr_value[loop].x;
4714 temp.y = temp.y + (XDWORDSIG)gyr_value[loop].y;
4715 temp.z = temp.z + (XDWORDSIG)gyr_value[loop].z;
4716 }
4717 }
4718
4719 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
4720 {
4721 break;
4722 }
4723 else if((reg_status & BMI2_DRDY_GYR) != BMI2_DRDY_GYR)
4724 {
4725 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_STATUS;
4726 break;
4727 }
4728 }
4729
4730 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4731 {
4732 /* Take average of x, y and z data for lesser
4733 * noise. It is same as offset data since lsb/dps
4734 * is same for both data and offset register
4735 */
4736 gyro_offset.x = (XWORDSIG)(temp.x / 128);
4737 gyro_offset.y = (XWORDSIG)(temp.y / 128);
4738 gyro_offset.z = (XWORDSIG)(temp.z / 128);
4739
4740 /* Saturate gyroscope data since the offset
4741 * registers are of 10 bit value where as the
4742 * gyroscope data is of 16 bit value
4743 */
4744 saturate_gyro_data(&gyro_offset);
4745
4746 /* Invert the gyroscope offset data */
4747 invert_gyro_offset(&gyro_offset);
4748
4749 /* Write offset data in the gyroscope offset
4750 * compensation register
4751 */
4752 rslt = bmi2_write_gyro_offset_comp_axes(&gyro_offset, dev);
4753 }
4754
4755 /* Enable gyroscope offset compensation */
4756 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4757 {
4758 rslt = bmi2_set_gyro_offset_comp(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
4759 }
4760
4761 /* Restore the saved gyroscope configurations */
4762 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4763 {
4764 rslt = restore_gyro_config(&gyr_cfg, aps, gyr_en, dev);
4765 }
4766 }
4767 }
4768 }
4769
4770 return rslt;
4771}
4772
4777XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_get_feat_config(XBYTE sw_page, XBYTE *feat_config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4778{
4779 /* Variable to define error */
4780 XBYTESIG rslt;
4781
4782 /* Variable to define bytes remaining to read */
4783 XBYTE bytes_remain = BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES;
4784
4785 /* Variable to define the read-write length */
4786 XBYTE read_write_len = 0;
4787
4788 /* Variable to define the feature configuration address */
4789 XBYTE addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR;
4790
4791 /* Variable to define index */
4792 XBYTE index = 0;
4793
4794 if((feat_config == NULL) || (dev == NULL))
4795 {
4796 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
4797 }
4798 else
4799 {
4800 /* Check whether the page is valid */
4801 if(sw_page < dev->page_max)
4802 {
4803 /* Switch page */
4804 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEAT_PAGE_ADDR, &sw_page, 1, dev);
4805
4806 /* If user length is less than feature length */
4807 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (dev->read_write_len < BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES))
4808 {
4809 /* Read-write should be even */
4810 if((dev->read_write_len % 2) != 0)
4811 {
4812 dev->read_write_len--;
4813 }
4814
4815 while (bytes_remain > 0)
4816 {
4817 if(bytes_remain >= dev->read_write_len)
4818 {
4819 /* Read from the page */
4820 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(addr, &feat_config[index], dev->read_write_len, dev);
4821
4822 /* Update index */
4823 index += (XBYTE) dev->read_write_len;
4824
4825 /* Update address */
4826 addr += (XBYTE) dev->read_write_len;
4827
4828 /* Update read-write length */
4829 read_write_len += (XBYTE) dev->read_write_len;
4830 }
4831 else
4832 {
4833 /* Read from the page */
4834 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(addr, (XBYTE *) (feat_config + index), (XWORD) bytes_remain, dev);
4835
4836 /* Update read-write length */
4837 read_write_len += bytes_remain;
4838 }
4839
4840 /* Remaining bytes */
4841 bytes_remain = BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES - read_write_len;
4842
4843 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
4844 {
4845 break;
4846 }
4847 }
4848 }
4849 else if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4850 {
4851 /* Get configuration from the page */
4852 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
4853 }
4854 }
4855 else
4856 {
4857 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_PAGE;
4858 }
4859 }
4860
4861 return rslt;
4862}
4863
4868XBYTE DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(struct bmi2_feature_config *feat_config, XBYTE type,
4869 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4870{
4871 /* Variable to define loop */
4872 XBYTE loop = 0;
4873
4874 /* Variable to set flag */
4875 XBYTE feat_found = BMI2_FALSE;
4876
4877 /* Search for the input feature from the input configuration array */
4878 while (loop < dev->input_sens)
4879 {
4880 if(dev->feat_config[loop].type == type)
4881 {
4882 *feat_config = dev->feat_config[loop];
4883 feat_found = BMI2_TRUE;
4884 break;
4885 }
4886
4887 loop++;
4888 }
4889
4890 /* Return flag */
4891 return feat_found;
4892}
4893
4894
4897/* Suppressing doxygen warnings triggered for same static function names present across various sensor variant
4898 * directories */
4899
4903XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::write_config_file(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4904{
4905 /* Variable to define error */
4906 XBYTESIG rslt;
4907
4908 /* Variable to update the configuration file index */
4909 XWORD index = 0;
4910
4911 /* config file size */
4912 XWORD config_size = dev->config_size;
4913
4914 /* Variable to get the remainder */
4915 XBYTE remain = (XBYTE)(config_size % dev->read_write_len);
4916
4917 /* Variable to get the balance bytes */
4918 XWORD bal_byte = 0;
4919
4920 /* Variable to define temporary read/write length */
4921 XWORD read_write_len = 0;
4922
4923 /* Disable advanced power save mode */
4924 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
4925 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4926 {
4927 /* Disable loading of the configuration */
4928 rslt = set_config_load(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
4929 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4930 {
4931 if(!remain)
4932 {
4933 /* Write the configuration file */
4934 for (index = 0; (index < config_size) && (rslt == BMI2_OK); index += dev->read_write_len)
4935 {
4936 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, dev->read_write_len, dev);
4937 }
4938 }
4939 else
4940 {
4941 /* Get the balance bytes */
4942 bal_byte = (XWORD) config_size - (XWORD) remain;
4943
4944 /* Write the configuration file for the balancem bytes */
4945 for (index = 0; (index < bal_byte) && (rslt == BMI2_OK); index += dev->read_write_len)
4946 {
4947 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, dev->read_write_len, dev);
4948 }
4949
4950 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4951 {
4952 /* Update length in a temporary variable */
4953 read_write_len = dev->read_write_len;
4954
4955 /* Write the remaining bytes in 2 bytes length */
4956 dev->read_write_len = 2;
4957
4958 /* Write the configuration file for the remaining bytes */
4959 for (index = bal_byte;
4960 (index < config_size) && (rslt == BMI2_OK);
4961 index += dev->read_write_len)
4962 {
4963 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, dev->read_write_len, dev);
4964 }
4965
4966 /* Restore the user set length back from the temporary variable */
4967 dev->read_write_len = read_write_len;
4968 }
4969 }
4970
4971 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4972 {
4973 /* Enable loading of the configuration */
4974 rslt = set_config_load(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
4975
4976 /* Wait till ASIC is initialized */
4977 bmi2_delay_us(150000, dev->intf_ptr);
4978
4979 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
4980 {
4981 /* Enable advanced power save mode */
4982 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
4983 }
4984 }
4985 }
4986 }
4987
4988 return rslt;
4989}
4990
4995XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_config_load(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
4996{
4997 /* Variable to define error */
4998 XBYTESIG rslt;
4999
5000 /* Variable to store data */
5001 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
5002
5003 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_INIT_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5004 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5005 {
5006 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_CONF_LOAD_EN, enable);
5007 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_INIT_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5008 }
5009
5010 return rslt;
5011}
5012
5016XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::upload_file(const XBYTE *config_data, XWORD index, XWORD write_len, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5017{
5018 /* Variable to define error */
5019 XBYTESIG rslt;
5020
5021 /* Array to store address */
5022 XBYTE addr_array[2] = { 0 };
5023
5024 if(config_data != NULL)
5025 {
5026 /* Store 0 to 3 bits of address in first byte */
5027 addr_array[0] = (XBYTE)((index / 2) & 0x0F);
5028
5029 /* Store 4 to 11 bits of address in the second byte */
5030 addr_array[1] = (XBYTE)((index / 2) >> 4);
5031
5032 /* Write the 2 bytes of address in consecutive locations */
5033 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_INIT_ADDR_0, addr_array, 2, dev);
5034 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5035 {
5036 /* Burst write configuration file data corresponding to user set length */
5037 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_INIT_DATA_ADDR, (XBYTE *)config_data, write_len, dev);
5038 }
5039 }
5040 else
5041 {
5042 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
5043 }
5044
5045 return rslt;
5046}
5047
5052XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_bw_perf_mode(XBYTE *bandwidth, XBYTE *perf_mode, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5053{
5054 /* Variable to define error */
5055 XBYTESIG rslt;
5056
5057 /* Validate and auto-correct performance mode */
5058 rslt = check_boundary_val(perf_mode, BMI2_POWER_OPT_MODE, BMI2_PERF_OPT_MODE, dev);
5059 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5060 {
5061 /* Validate and auto-correct bandwidth parameter */
5062 if(*perf_mode == BMI2_PERF_OPT_MODE)
5063 {
5064 /* Validate for continuous filter mode */
5065 rslt = check_boundary_val(bandwidth, BMI2_ACC_OSR4_AVG1, BMI2_ACC_CIC_AVG8, dev);
5066 }
5067 else
5068 {
5069 /* Validate for CIC averaging mode */
5070 rslt = check_boundary_val(bandwidth, BMI2_ACC_OSR4_AVG1, BMI2_ACC_RES_AVG128, dev);
5071 }
5072 }
5073
5074 return rslt;
5075}
5076
5081 XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_odr_range(XBYTE *odr, XBYTE *range, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5082{
5083 /* Variable to define error */
5084 XBYTESIG rslt;
5085
5086 /* Validate and auto correct ODR */
5087 rslt = check_boundary_val(odr, BMI2_ACC_ODR_0_78HZ, BMI2_ACC_ODR_1600HZ, dev);
5088 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5089 {
5090 /* Validate and auto correct Range */
5091 rslt = check_boundary_val(range, BMI2_ACC_RANGE_2G, BMI2_ACC_RANGE_16G, dev);
5092 }
5093
5094 return rslt;
5095}
5096
5101XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_gyro_config(struct bmi2_gyro_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5102{
5103 /* Variable to define error */
5104 XBYTESIG rslt;
5105
5106 /* Validate and auto-correct performance mode */
5107 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->filter_perf, BMI2_POWER_OPT_MODE, BMI2_PERF_OPT_MODE, dev);
5108 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5109 {
5110 /* Validate and auto-correct bandwidth parameter */
5111 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->bwp, BMI2_GYR_OSR4_MODE, BMI2_GYR_CIC_MODE, dev);
5112 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5113 {
5114 /* Validate and auto-correct low power/high-performance parameter */
5115 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->noise_perf, BMI2_POWER_OPT_MODE, BMI2_PERF_OPT_MODE, dev);
5116 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5117 {
5118 /* Validate and auto-correct ODR parameter */
5119 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->odr, BMI2_GYR_ODR_25HZ, BMI2_GYR_ODR_3200HZ, dev);
5120 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5121 {
5122 /* Validate and auto-correct OIS range */
5123 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->ois_range, BMI2_GYR_OIS_250, BMI2_GYR_OIS_2000, dev);
5124 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5125 {
5126 /* Validate and auto-correct range parameter */
5127 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->range, BMI2_GYR_RANGE_2000, BMI2_GYR_RANGE_125, dev);
5128 }
5129 }
5130 }
5131 }
5132 }
5133
5134 return rslt;
5135}
5136
5141XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::cfg_error_status(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5142{
5143 /* Variable to define error */
5144 XBYTESIG rslt;
5145
5146 /* Variable to store data */
5147 XBYTE reg_data;
5148
5149 /* Get error status of the set sensor configuration */
5150 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_EVENT_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5151 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5152 {
5153 reg_data = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_EVENT_FLAG);
5154 switch (reg_data)
5155 {
5156 case BMI2_NO_ERROR:
5157 rslt = BMI2_OK;
5158 break;
5159 case BMI2_ACC_ERROR:
5160 rslt = BMI2_E_ACC_INVALID_CFG;
5161 break;
5162 case BMI2_GYR_ERROR:
5163 rslt = BMI2_E_GYRO_INVALID_CFG;
5164 break;
5165 case BMI2_ACC_GYR_ERROR:
5166 rslt = BMI2_E_ACC_GYR_INVALID_CFG;
5167 break;
5168 default:
5169 break;
5170 }
5171 }
5172
5173 return rslt;
5174}
5175
5184XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_aux_config(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5185{
5186 /* Variable to define error */
5187 XBYTESIG rslt;
5188
5189 /* Validate auxiliary configurations */
5190 rslt = validate_aux_config(config, dev);
5191 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5192 {
5193 /* Enable/Disable auxiliary interface */
5194 rslt = set_aux_interface(config, dev);
5195 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5196 {
5197 /* Set the auxiliary interface configurations */
5198 rslt = config_aux_interface(config, dev);
5199 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5200 {
5201 /* Set read out offset and ODR */
5202 rslt = config_aux(config, dev);
5203 }
5204 }
5205 }
5206
5207 return rslt;
5208}
5209
5214XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_gyro_user_gain_config(const struct bmi2_gyro_user_gain_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5215{
5216 /* Variable to define error */
5217 XBYTESIG rslt;
5218
5219 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
5220 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
5221
5222 /* Variable to define the array offset */
5223 XBYTE idx = 0;
5224
5225 /* Variable to define index */
5226 XBYTE index = 0;
5227
5228 /* Variable to set flag */
5229 XBYTE feat_found;
5230
5231 /* Initialize feature configuration for user-gain */
5232 struct bmi2_feature_config user_gain_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
5233
5234 /* Copy the feature configuration address to a local pointer */
5235 XWORD *data_p = (XWORD *) (void *)feat_config;
5236
5237 /* Search for user-gain feature and extract its configuration details */
5238 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&user_gain_config, BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE, dev);
5239 if(feat_found)
5240 {
5241 /* Get the configuration from the page where user-gain feature resides */
5242 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(user_gain_config.page, feat_config, dev);
5243 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5244 {
5245 /* Define the offset in bytes for user-gain select */
5246 idx = user_gain_config.start_addr;
5247
5248 /* Get offset in words since all the features are set in words length */
5249 idx = idx / 2;
5250
5251 /* Set ratio_x */
5252 *(data_p + idx) = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(*(data_p + idx), BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_X, config->ratio_x);
5253
5254 /* Increment offset by 1 word to set ratio_y */
5255 idx++;
5256
5257 /* Set ratio_y */
5258 *(data_p + idx) = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(*(data_p + idx), BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_Y, config->ratio_y);
5259
5260 /* Increment offset by 1 word to set ratio_z */
5261 idx++;
5262
5263 /* Set ratio_z */
5264 *(data_p + idx) = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(*(data_p + idx), BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_Z, config->ratio_z);
5265
5266 /* Increment offset by 1 more word to get the total length in words */
5267 idx++;
5268
5269 /* Get total length in bytes to copy from local pointer to the array */
5270 idx = (XBYTE)(idx * 2) - user_gain_config.start_addr;
5271
5272 /* Copy the bytes to be set back to the array */
5273 for (index = 0; index < idx; index++)
5274 {
5275 feat_config[user_gain_config.start_addr +
5276 index] = *((XBYTE *) data_p + user_gain_config.start_addr + index);
5277 }
5278
5279 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
5280 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
5281 }
5282 }
5283 else
5284 {
5285 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
5286 }
5287
5288 return rslt;
5289}
5290
5294XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_aux_interface(const struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5295{
5296 /* Variable to define error */
5297 XBYTESIG rslt;
5298
5299 /* Variable to store data */
5300 XBYTE reg_data;
5301
5302 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_IF_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5303 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5304 {
5305 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_IF_EN, config->aux_en);
5306
5307 /* Enable/Disable auxiliary interface */
5308 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_IF_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5309 }
5310
5311 return rslt;
5312}
5313
5321XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::config_aux_interface(const struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5322{
5323 /* Variable to define error */
5324 XBYTESIG rslt;
5325
5326 /* Variable to store data */
5327 XBYTE reg_data[2] = { 0 };
5328
5329 /* Variable to store status */
5330 XBYTE status = 0;
5331
5332 /* Variable to define count */
5333 XBYTE count = 0;
5334
5335 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_DEV_ID_ADDR, reg_data, 2, dev);
5336 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5337 {
5338 /* Set I2C address for AUX sensor */
5339 reg_data[0] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[0], BMI2_AUX_SET_I2C_ADDR, config->i2c_device_addr);
5340
5341 /* Set the AUX IF to either manual or auto mode */
5342 reg_data[1] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_MAN_MODE_EN, config->manual_en);
5343
5344 /* Enables FCU write command on AUX IF for auxiliary sensors that need a trigger */
5345 reg_data[1] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_FCU_WR_EN, config->fcu_write_en);
5346
5347 /* Set the burst read length for manual mode */
5348 reg_data[1] = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_MAN_READ_BURST, config->man_rd_burst);
5349
5350 /* Set the burst read length for data mode */
5351 reg_data[1] = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_READ_BURST, config->aux_rd_burst);
5352 for (;;)
5353 {
5354 /* Check if auxiliary sensor is busy */
5355 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&status, dev);
5356 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (!(status & BMI2_AUX_BUSY)))
5357 {
5358 /* Set the configurations if AUX is not busy */
5359 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_AUX_DEV_ID_ADDR, reg_data, 2, dev);
5360 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
5361
5362 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5363 {
5364 /* If data mode */
5365 if(!config->manual_en)
5366 {
5367 /* Disable manual enable flag in device structure */
5368 dev->aux_man_en = 0;
5369
5370 /* Set the read address of the AUX sensor */
5371 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_AUX_RD_ADDR, (XBYTE *) &config->read_addr, 1, dev);
5372 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
5373
5374 }
5375 else
5376 {
5377 /* Enable manual enable flag in device structure */
5378 dev->aux_man_en = 1;
5379
5380 /* Update manual read burst length in device structure */
5381 dev->aux_man_rd_burst_len = config->man_rd_burst;
5382 }
5383 }
5384
5385 /* Break after setting the register */
5386 break;
5387 }
5388
5389 /* Increment count after every 10 seconds */
5390 bmi2_delay_us(10000, dev->intf_ptr);
5391 count++;
5392
5393 /* Break after 2 seconds if AUX still busy - since slowest ODR is 0.78Hz*/
5394 if(count > 20)
5395 {
5396 rslt = BMI2_E_AUX_BUSY;
5397 break;
5398 }
5399 }
5400 }
5401
5402 return rslt;
5403}
5404
5409XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::config_aux(const struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5410{
5411 /* Variable to define error */
5412 XBYTESIG rslt;
5413
5414 /* Variable to store data */
5415 XBYTE reg_data;
5416
5417 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5418 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5419 {
5420 /* Trigger read out offset */
5421 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_OFFSET_READ_OUT, config->offset);
5422
5423 /* Set ODR */
5424 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_ODR_EN, config->odr);
5425
5426 /* Set auxiliary configuration register */
5427 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_AUX_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5428 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
5429 }
5430
5431 return rslt;
5432}
5433
5438XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_if_aux_not_busy(XBYTE reg_addr, XBYTE reg_data, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5439{
5440 /* Variable to define error */
5441 XBYTESIG rslt;
5442
5443 /* Variable to get status of AUX_BUSY */
5444 XBYTE status = 0;
5445
5446 /* Variable to define count for time-out */
5447 XBYTE count = 0;
5448
5449 for (;;)
5450 {
5451 /* Check if AUX is busy */
5452 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&status, dev);
5453
5454 /* Set the registers if not busy */
5455 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (!(status & BMI2_AUX_BUSY)))
5456 {
5457 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5458 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
5459
5460 /* Break after setting the register */
5461 break;
5462 }
5463
5464 /* Increment count after every 10 seconds */
5465 bmi2_delay_us(10000, dev->intf_ptr);
5466 count++;
5467
5468 /* Break after 2 seconds if AUX still busy - since slowest ODR is 0.78Hz*/
5469 if(count > 20)
5470 {
5471 rslt = BMI2_E_AUX_BUSY;
5472 break;
5473 }
5474 }
5475
5476 return rslt;
5477}
5478
5482XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_aux_config(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5483{
5484 /* Variable to define error */
5485 XBYTESIG rslt;
5486
5487 /* Validate ODR for auxiliary sensor */
5488 rslt = check_boundary_val(&config->odr, BMI2_AUX_ODR_0_78HZ, BMI2_AUX_ODR_800HZ, dev);
5489
5490 return rslt;
5491}
5492
5497XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_accel_config(struct bmi2_accel_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5498{
5499 /* Variable to define error */
5500 XBYTESIG rslt;
5501
5502 /* Array to store data */
5503 XBYTE data_array[2] = { 0 };
5504
5505 /* Null-pointer check */
5506 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
5507 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (config != NULL))
5508 {
5509 /* Read the sensor configuration details */
5510 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_ACC_CONF_ADDR, data_array, 2, dev);
5511 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5512 {
5513 /* Get accelerometer performance mode */
5514 config->filter_perf = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_ACC_FILTER_PERF_MODE);
5515
5516 /* Get accelerometer bandwidth */
5517 config->bwp = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_ACC_BW_PARAM);
5518
5519 /* Get accelerometer ODR */
5520 config->odr = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(data_array[0], BMI2_ACC_ODR);
5521
5522 /* Get accelerometer range */
5523 config->range = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(data_array[1], BMI2_ACC_RANGE);
5524 }
5525 }
5526 else
5527 {
5528 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
5529 }
5530
5531 return rslt;
5532}
5533
5538XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_gyro_config(struct bmi2_gyro_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5539{
5540 /* Variable to define error */
5541 XBYTESIG rslt;
5542
5543 /* Array to store data */
5544 XBYTE data_array[2] = { 0 };
5545
5546 /* Null-pointer check */
5547 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
5548 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (config != NULL))
5549 {
5550 /* Read the sensor configuration details */
5551 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_CONF_ADDR, data_array, 2, dev);
5552 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5553 {
5554 /* Get gyroscope performance mode */
5555 config->filter_perf = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_GYR_FILTER_PERF_MODE);
5556
5557 /* Get gyroscope noise performance mode */
5558 config->noise_perf = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_GYR_NOISE_PERF_MODE);
5559
5560 /* Get gyroscope bandwidth */
5561 config->bwp = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_GYR_BW_PARAM);
5562
5563 /* Get gyroscope ODR */
5564 config->odr = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(data_array[0], BMI2_GYR_ODR);
5565
5566 /* Get gyroscope OIS range */
5567 config->ois_range = BMI2_GET_BITS(data_array[1], BMI2_GYR_OIS_RANGE);
5568
5569 /* Get gyroscope range */
5570 config->range = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(data_array[1], BMI2_GYR_RANGE);
5571 }
5572 }
5573 else
5574 {
5575 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
5576 }
5577
5578 return rslt;
5579}
5580
5589XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_aux_config(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5590{
5591 /* Variable to define error */
5592 XBYTESIG rslt;
5593
5594 /* Null-pointer check */
5595 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
5596 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (config != NULL))
5597 {
5598 /* Get enable status of auxiliary interface */
5599 rslt = get_aux_interface(config, dev);
5600 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5601 {
5602 /* Get the auxiliary interface configurations */
5603 rslt = get_aux_interface_config(config, dev);
5604 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5605 {
5606 /* Get read out offset and ODR */
5607 rslt = get_aux_cfg(config, dev);
5608 }
5609 }
5610 }
5611 else
5612 {
5613 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
5614 }
5615
5616 return rslt;
5617}
5618
5623XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_gyro_gain_update_config(struct bmi2_gyro_user_gain_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5624{
5625 /* Variable to define error */
5626 XBYTESIG rslt;
5627
5628 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
5629 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
5630
5631 /* Variable to define the array offset */
5632 XBYTE idx = 0;
5633
5634 /* Variable to define LSB */
5635 XWORD lsb = 0;
5636
5637 /* Variable to define MSB */
5638 XWORD msb = 0;
5639
5640 /* Variable to define a word */
5641 XWORD lsb_msb = 0;
5642
5643 /* Variable to set flag */
5644 XBYTE feat_found;
5645
5646 /* Initialize feature configuration for user-gain */
5647 struct bmi2_feature_config user_gain_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
5648
5649 /* Search for user-gain feature and extract its configuration details */
5650 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&user_gain_config, BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE, dev);
5651 if(feat_found)
5652 {
5653 /* Get the configuration from the page where user-gain feature resides */
5654 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(user_gain_config.page, feat_config, dev);
5655 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5656 {
5657 /* Define the offset in bytes for user-gain select */
5658 idx = user_gain_config.start_addr;
5659
5660 /* Get word to calculate ratio_x */
5661 lsb = (XWORD) feat_config[idx++];
5662 msb = ((XWORD) feat_config[idx++] << 8);
5663 lsb_msb = lsb | msb;
5664
5665 /* Get ratio_x */
5666 config->ratio_x = lsb_msb & BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_X_MASK;
5667
5668 /* Get word to calculate ratio_y */
5669 lsb = (XWORD) feat_config[idx++];
5670 msb = ((XWORD) feat_config[idx++] << 8);
5671 lsb_msb = lsb | msb;
5672
5673 /* Get ratio_y */
5674 config->ratio_y = lsb_msb & BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_Y_MASK;
5675
5676 /* Get word to calculate ratio_z */
5677 lsb = (XWORD) feat_config[idx++];
5678 msb = ((XWORD) feat_config[idx++] << 8);
5679 lsb_msb = lsb | msb;
5680
5681 /* Get ratio_z */
5682 config->ratio_z = lsb_msb & BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_RATIO_Z_MASK;
5683 }
5684 }
5685 else
5686 {
5687 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
5688 }
5689
5690 return rslt;
5691}
5692
5696XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_aux_interface(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5697{
5698 /* Variable to define error */
5699 XBYTESIG rslt;
5700
5701 /* Variable to store data */
5702 XBYTE reg_data;
5703
5704 /* Get the enable status of auxiliary interface */
5705 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_IF_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5706 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5707 {
5708 config->aux_en = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_IF_EN);
5709 }
5710
5711 return rslt;
5712}
5713
5718XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_aux_interface_config(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5719{
5720 /* Variable to define error */
5721 XBYTESIG rslt;
5722
5723 /* Variable to store data */
5724 XBYTE reg_data[2] = { 0 };
5725
5726 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_DEV_ID_ADDR, reg_data, 2, dev);
5727 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5728 {
5729 /* Get I2C address for auxiliary sensor */
5730 config->i2c_device_addr = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data[0], BMI2_AUX_SET_I2C_ADDR);
5731
5732 /* Get the AUX IF to either manual or auto mode */
5733 config->manual_en = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_MAN_MODE_EN);
5734
5735 /* Enables FCU write command on AUX IF for auxiliary sensors that need a trigger */
5736 config->fcu_write_en = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_FCU_WR_EN);
5737
5738 /* Get the burst read length for manual mode */
5739 config->man_rd_burst = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_MAN_READ_BURST);
5740
5741 /* Get the burst read length for data mode */
5742 config->aux_rd_burst = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[1], BMI2_AUX_READ_BURST);
5743
5744 /* If data mode, get the read address of the auxiliary sensor from where data is to be read */
5745 if(!config->manual_en)
5746 {
5747 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_RD_ADDR, &config->read_addr, 1, dev);
5748 }
5749 }
5750
5751 return rslt;
5752}
5753
5758XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_aux_cfg(struct bmi2_aux_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5759{
5760 /* Variable to define error */
5761 XBYTESIG rslt;
5762
5763 /* Variable to store data */
5764 XBYTE reg_data;
5765
5766 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
5767 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5768 {
5769 /* Get read out offset */
5770 config->offset = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_OFFSET_READ_OUT);
5771
5772 /* Get ODR */
5773 config->odr = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_ODR_EN);
5774 }
5775
5776 return rslt;
5777}
5778
5783XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::map_feat_int(XBYTE *reg_data_array, enum bmi2_hw_int_pin int_pin, XBYTE int_mask)
5784{
5785 /* Variable to define error */
5786 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
5787
5788 /* Check for NULL error */
5789 if(reg_data_array != NULL)
5790 {
5791 /* Check validity on interrupt pin selection */
5792 if(int_pin < BMI2_INT_PIN_MAX)
5793 {
5794 switch (int_pin)
5795 {
5796 case BMI2_INT_NONE:
5797
5798 /* Un-Map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 1 and 2 */
5799 reg_data_array[0] &= ~(int_mask);
5800 reg_data_array[1] &= ~(int_mask);
5801 break;
5802 case BMI2_INT1:
5803
5804 /* Map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 1 */
5805 reg_data_array[0] |= int_mask;
5806
5807 /* Un-map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 2 */
5808 reg_data_array[1] &= ~(int_mask);
5809 break;
5810 case BMI2_INT2:
5811
5812 /* Map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 2 */
5813 reg_data_array[1] |= int_mask;
5814
5815 /* Un-map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 1 */
5816 reg_data_array[0] &= ~(int_mask);
5817 break;
5818 case BMI2_INT_BOTH:
5819
5820 /* Map the corresponding feature interrupt to interrupt pin 1 and 2 */
5821 reg_data_array[0] |= int_mask;
5822 reg_data_array[1] |= int_mask;
5823 break;
5824 default:
5825 break;
5826 }
5827 }
5828 else
5829 {
5830 /* Return error if invalid pin selection */
5831 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_INT_PIN;
5832 }
5833 }
5834 else
5835 {
5836 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
5837 }
5838
5839 return rslt;
5840}
5841
5845XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_accel_sensor_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *data, XBYTE reg_addr, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5846{
5847 /* Variable to define error */
5848 XBYTESIG rslt;
5849
5850 /* Array to define data stored in register */
5851 XBYTE reg_data[BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES] = { 0 };
5852
5853 /* Read the sensor data */
5854 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(reg_addr, reg_data, BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES, dev);
5855 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5856 {
5857 /* Get accelerometer data from the register */
5858 get_acc_gyr_data(data, reg_data);
5859
5860 /* Get the re-mapped accelerometer data */
5861 get_remapped_data(data, dev);
5862 }
5863
5864 return rslt;
5865}
5866
5870XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_gyro_sensor_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *data, XBYTE reg_addr, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5871{
5872 /* Variable to define error */
5873 XBYTESIG rslt;
5874
5875 /* Array to define data stored in register */
5876 XBYTE reg_data[BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES] = { 0 };
5877
5878 /* Read the sensor data */
5879 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(reg_addr, reg_data, BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES, dev);
5880 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
5881 {
5882 /* Get gyroscope data from the register */
5883 get_acc_gyr_data(data, reg_data);
5884
5885 /* Get the compensated gyroscope data */
5886 comp_gyro_cross_axis_sensitivity(data, dev);
5887
5888 /* Get the re-mapped gyroscope data */
5889 get_remapped_data(data, dev);
5890
5891 }
5892
5893 return rslt;
5894}
5895
5899void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_acc_gyr_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *data, const XBYTE *reg_data)
5900{
5901 /* Variables to store msb value */
5902 XBYTE msb;
5903
5904 /* Variables to store lsb value */
5905 XBYTE lsb;
5906
5907 /* Variables to store both msb and lsb value */
5908 XWORD msb_lsb;
5909
5910 /* Variables to define index */
5911 XBYTE index = 0;
5912
5913 /* Read x-axis data */
5914 lsb = reg_data[index++];
5915 msb = reg_data[index++];
5916 msb_lsb = ((XWORD) msb << 8) | (XWORD) lsb;
5917 data->x = (XWORDSIG) msb_lsb;
5918
5919 /* Read y-axis data */
5920 lsb = reg_data[index++];
5921 msb = reg_data[index++];
5922 msb_lsb = ((XWORD) msb << 8) | (XWORD) lsb;
5923 data->y = (XWORDSIG) msb_lsb;
5924
5925 /* Read z-axis data */
5926 lsb = reg_data[index++];
5927 msb = reg_data[index++];
5928 msb_lsb = ((XWORD) msb << 8) | (XWORD) lsb;
5929 data->z = (XWORDSIG) msb_lsb;
5930}
5931
5935void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_remapped_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *data, const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5936{
5937 /* Array to defined the re-mapped sensor data */
5938 XWORDSIG remap_data[3] = { 0 };
5939 XWORDSIG pos_multiplier = INT16_C(1);
5940 XWORDSIG neg_multiplier = INT16_C(-1);
5941
5942 /* Fill the array with the un-mapped sensor data */
5943 remap_data[0] = data->x;
5944 remap_data[1] = data->y;
5945 remap_data[2] = data->z;
5946
5947 /* Get the re-mapped x axis data */
5948 if(dev->remap.x_axis_sign == BMI2_POS_SIGN)
5949 {
5950 data->x = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.x_axis] * pos_multiplier);
5951 }
5952 else
5953 {
5954 data->x = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.x_axis] * neg_multiplier);
5955 }
5956
5957 /* Get the re-mapped y axis data */
5958 if(dev->remap.y_axis_sign == BMI2_POS_SIGN)
5959 {
5960 data->y = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.y_axis] * pos_multiplier);
5961 }
5962 else
5963 {
5964 data->y = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.y_axis] * neg_multiplier);
5965 }
5966
5967 /* Get the re-mapped z axis data */
5968 if(dev->remap.z_axis_sign == BMI2_POS_SIGN)
5969 {
5970 data->z = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.z_axis] * pos_multiplier);
5971 }
5972 else
5973 {
5974 data->z = (XWORDSIG)(remap_data[dev->remap.z_axis] * neg_multiplier);
5975 }
5976}
5977
5982XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::read_aux_data(XBYTE reg_addr, XBYTE *aux_data, XWORD len, XBYTE burst_len, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
5983{
5984 /* Variable to define error */
5985 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
5986
5987 /* Array to store the register data */
5988 XBYTE reg_data[15] = { 0 };
5989
5990 /* Variable to define number of bytes to read */
5991 XWORD read_length = 0;
5992
5993 /* Variable to define loop */
5994 XBYTE loop = 0;
5995
5996 /* Variable to define counts to get the correct array index */
5997 XBYTE count = 0;
5998
5999 /* Variable to define index for the array */
6000 XBYTE idx = 0;
6001
6002 while (len > 0)
6003 {
6004 /* Set the read address if AUX is not busy */
6005 rslt = set_if_aux_not_busy(BMI2_AUX_RD_ADDR, reg_addr, dev);
6006 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
6007 {
6008 /* Read data from bmi2 data register */
6009 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_X_LSB_ADDR, reg_data, (XWORD) burst_len, dev);
6010 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
6011 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
6012 {
6013 /* Get number of bytes to be read */
6014 if(len < burst_len)
6015 {
6016 read_length = (XBYTE) len;
6017 }
6018 else
6019 {
6020 read_length = burst_len;
6021 }
6022
6023 /* Update array index and store the data */
6024 for (loop = 0; loop < read_length; loop++)
6025 {
6026 idx = loop + count;
6027 aux_data[idx] = reg_data[loop];
6028 }
6029 }
6030 }
6031
6032 /* Update address for the next read */
6033 reg_addr += burst_len;
6034
6035 /* Update count for the array index */
6036 count += burst_len;
6037
6038 /* Update no of bytes left to read */
6039 len -= read_length;
6040 }
6041
6042 return rslt;
6043}
6044
6051XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::write_aux_data(XBYTE reg_addr, XBYTE reg_data, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6052{
6053 /* Variable to define error */
6054 XBYTESIG rslt;
6055
6056 /* Write data to be written to the AUX sensor in bmi2 register */
6057 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_AUX_WR_DATA_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
6058 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
6059 {
6060 /* Write the AUX address where data is to be stored when AUX is not busy */
6061 rslt = set_if_aux_not_busy(BMI2_AUX_WR_ADDR, reg_addr, dev);
6062 }
6063
6064 return rslt;
6065}
6066
6071XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::read_aux_data_mode(XBYTE *aux_data, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6072{
6073 /* Variable to define error */
6074 XBYTESIG rslt;
6075
6076 /* Variables to define loop */
6077 XBYTE count = 0;
6078
6079 /* Variables to define index */
6080 XBYTE index = 0;
6081
6082 /* Array to define data stored in register */
6083 XBYTE reg_data[BMI2_AUX_NUM_BYTES] = { 0 };
6084
6085 /* Check if data mode */
6086 if(!dev->aux_man_en)
6087 {
6088 /* Read the auxiliary sensor data */
6089 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_AUX_X_LSB_ADDR, reg_data, BMI2_AUX_NUM_BYTES, dev);
6090 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
6091 {
6092 /* Get the 8 bytes of auxiliary data */
6093 do
6094 {
6095 *(aux_data + count++) = *(reg_data + index++);
6096 } while (count < BMI2_AUX_NUM_BYTES);
6097 }
6098 }
6099 else
6100 {
6101 rslt = BMI2_E_AUX_INVALID_CFG;
6102 }
6103
6104 return rslt;
6105}
6106
6111XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::map_read_len(XBYTE *len, const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6112{
6113 /* Variable to define error */
6114 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6115
6116 /* Get the burst read length against the values set by the user */
6117 switch (dev->aux_man_rd_burst_len)
6118 {
6119 case BMI2_AUX_READ_LEN_0:
6120 *len = 1;
6121 break;
6122 case BMI2_AUX_READ_LEN_1:
6123 *len = 2;
6124 break;
6125 case BMI2_AUX_READ_LEN_2:
6126 *len = 6;
6127 break;
6128 case BMI2_AUX_READ_LEN_3:
6129 *len = 8;
6130 break;
6131 default:
6132 rslt = BMI2_E_AUX_INVALID_CFG;
6133 break;
6134 }
6135
6136 return rslt;
6137}
6138
6143XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::parse_fifo_accel_len(XWORD *start_idx,
6144 XWORD *len,
6145 const XWORD *acc_count,
6146 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
6147{
6148 /* Variable to define error */
6149 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6150
6151 /* Data start index */
6152 (*start_idx) = fifo->acc_byte_start_idx;
6153
6154 /* If only accelerometer is enabled */
6155 if(fifo->data_enable == BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN)
6156 {
6157 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6158 (*len) = (XWORD)((*acc_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ACC_LENGTH);
6159 }
6160 /* If only accelerometer and auxiliary are enabled */
6161 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN | BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN))
6162 {
6163 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6164 (*len) = (XWORD)((*acc_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ACC_AUX_LENGTH);
6165 }
6166 /* If only accelerometer and gyroscope are enabled */
6167 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN | BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN))
6168 {
6169 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6170 (*len) = (XWORD)((*acc_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ACC_GYR_LENGTH);
6171 }
6172 /* If only accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary are enabled */
6173 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN | BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN | BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN))
6174 {
6175 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6176 (*len) = (XWORD)((*acc_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH);
6177 }
6178 else
6179 {
6180 /* Move the data index to the last byte to mark completion when
6181 * no sensors or sensors apart from accelerometer are enabled
6182 */
6183 (*start_idx) = fifo->length;
6184
6185 /* FIFO is empty */
6186 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6187 }
6188
6189 /* If more data is requested than available */
6190 if((*len) > fifo->length)
6191 {
6192 (*len) = fifo->length;
6193 }
6194
6195 return rslt;
6196}
6197
6202XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_accel_header_mode(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *acc,
6203 XWORD *accel_length,
6204 struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6205 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6206{
6207 /* Variable to define error */
6208 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6209
6210 /* Variable to define header frame */
6211 XBYTE frame_header = 0;
6212
6213 /* Variable to index the data bytes */
6214 XWORD data_index;
6215
6216 /* Variable to index accelerometer frames */
6217 XWORD accel_index = 0;
6218
6219 /* Variable to indicate accelerometer frames read */
6220 XWORD frame_to_read = *accel_length;
6221
6222 for (data_index = fifo->acc_byte_start_idx; data_index < fifo->length;)
6223 {
6224 /* Get frame header byte */
6225 frame_header = fifo->data[data_index] & BMI2_FIFO_TAG_INTR_MASK;
6226
6227 /* Parse virtual header if S4S is enabled */
6228 parse_if_virtual_header(&frame_header, &data_index, fifo);
6229
6230 /* Index shifted to next byte where data starts */
6231 data_index++;
6232 switch (frame_header)
6233 {
6234 /* If header defines accelerometer frame */
6235 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
6236 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6237 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6238 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
6239
6240 /* Unpack from normal frames */
6241 rslt = unpack_accel_frame(acc, &data_index, &accel_index, frame_header, fifo, dev);
6242 break;
6243
6244 /* If header defines only gyroscope frame */
6245 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
6246 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->gyr_frm_len, fifo);
6247 break;
6248
6249 /* If header defines only auxiliary frame */
6250 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
6251 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->aux_frm_len, fifo);
6252 break;
6253
6254 /* If header defines only auxiliary and gyroscope frame */
6255 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
6256 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len, fifo);
6257 break;
6258
6259 /* If header defines sensor time frame */
6260 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SENS_TIME_FRM:
6261 rslt = unpack_sensortime_frame(&data_index, fifo);
6262 break;
6263
6264 /* If header defines skip frame */
6265 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SKIP_FRM:
6266 rslt = unpack_skipped_frame(&data_index, fifo);
6267 break;
6268
6269 /* If header defines Input configuration frame */
6270 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_INPUT_CFG_FRM:
6271 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_INPUT_CFG_LENGTH, fifo);
6272 break;
6273
6274 /* If header defines invalid frame or end of valid data */
6275 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_OVER_READ_MSB:
6276
6277 /* Move the data index to the last byte to mark completion */
6278 data_index = fifo->length;
6279
6280 /* FIFO is empty */
6281 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6282 break;
6283 case BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_RECOG_FRM:
6284 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_DATA_LENGTH, fifo);
6285 break;
6286 default:
6287
6288 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case of invalid values */
6289 data_index = fifo->length;
6290
6291 /* FIFO is empty */
6292 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6293 break;
6294 }
6295
6296 /* Break if Number of frames to be read is complete or FIFO is mpty */
6297 if((frame_to_read == accel_index) || (rslt == BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY))
6298 {
6299 break;
6300 }
6301 }
6302
6303 /* Update the accelerometer frame index */
6304 (*accel_length) = accel_index;
6305
6306 /* Update the accelerometer byte index */
6307 fifo->acc_byte_start_idx = data_index;
6308
6309 return rslt;
6310}
6311
6317XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_accel_frame(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *acc,
6318 XWORD *idx,
6319 XWORD *acc_idx,
6320 XBYTE frame,
6321 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6322 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6323{
6324 /* Variable to define error */
6325 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6326
6327 switch (frame)
6328 {
6329 /* If frame contains only accelerometer data */
6330 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
6331 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ACC_FRM:
6332
6333 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6334 if(((*idx) + fifo->acc_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6335 {
6336 /* Update the data index as complete*/
6337 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6338
6339 /* FIFO is empty */
6340 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6341 break;
6342 }
6343
6344 /* Get the accelerometer data */
6345 unpack_accel_data(&acc[(*acc_idx)], *idx, fifo, dev);
6346
6347 /* Update data index */
6348 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ACC_LENGTH;
6349
6350 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6351 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6352 {
6353 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&acc[(*acc_idx)], idx, fifo);
6354 }
6355
6356 /* Update accelerometer frame index */
6357 (*acc_idx)++;
6358
6359 /* More frames could be read */
6360 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6361 break;
6362
6363 /* If frame contains accelerometer and gyroscope data */
6364 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6365 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6366
6367 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6368 if(((*idx) + fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6369 {
6370 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6371 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6372
6373 /* FIFO is empty */
6374 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6375 break;
6376 }
6377
6378 /* Get the accelerometer data */
6379 unpack_accel_data(&acc[(*acc_idx)], ((*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_GYR_LENGTH), fifo, dev);
6380
6381 /* Update data index */
6382 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ACC_GYR_LENGTH;
6383
6384 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6385 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6386 {
6387 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&acc[(*acc_idx)], idx, fifo);
6388 }
6389
6390 /* Update accelerometer frame index */
6391 (*acc_idx)++;
6392
6393 /* More frames could be read */
6394 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6395 break;
6396
6397 /* If frame contains accelerometer and auxiliary data */
6398 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6399 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6400
6401 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6402 if(((*idx) + fifo->acc_aux_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6403 {
6404 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6405 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6406
6407 /* FIFO is empty */
6408 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6409 break;
6410 }
6411
6412 /* Get the accelerometer data */
6413 unpack_accel_data(&acc[(*acc_idx)], ((*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH), fifo, dev);
6414
6415 /* Update data index */
6416 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ACC_AUX_LENGTH;
6417
6418 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6419 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6420 {
6421 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&acc[(*acc_idx)], idx, fifo);
6422 }
6423
6424 /* Update accelerometer frame index */
6425 (*acc_idx)++;
6426
6427 /* More frames could be read */
6428 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6429 break;
6430
6431 /* If frame contains accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary data */
6432 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
6433 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ALL_FRM:
6434
6435 /* Partially read, then skip the data*/
6436 if((*idx + fifo->all_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6437 {
6438 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6439 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6440
6441 /* FIFO is empty */
6442 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6443 break;
6444 }
6445
6446 /* Get the accelerometer data */
6447 unpack_accel_data(&acc[(*acc_idx)], ((*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH), fifo, dev);
6448
6449 /* Update data index */
6450 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH;
6451
6452 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6453 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6454 {
6455 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&acc[(*acc_idx)], idx, fifo);
6456 }
6457
6458 /* Update accelerometer frame index */
6459 (*acc_idx)++;
6460
6461 /* More frames could be read */
6462 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6463 break;
6464
6465 /* If frame contains gyroscope and auxiliary data */
6466 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
6467 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_AUX_FRM:
6468
6469 /* Update data index */
6470 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len;
6471
6472 /* More frames could be read */
6473 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6474 break;
6475
6476 /* If frame contains only auxiliary data */
6477 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
6478 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_FRM:
6479
6480 /* Update data index */
6481 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->aux_frm_len;
6482
6483 /* More frames could be read */
6484 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6485 break;
6486
6487 /* If frame contains only gyroscope data */
6488 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
6489 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_FRM:
6490
6491 /* Update data index */
6492 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->gyr_frm_len;
6493
6494 /* More frames could be read */
6495 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6496 break;
6497 default:
6498
6499 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case of invalid values */
6500 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6501
6502 /* FIFO is empty */
6503 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6504 break;
6505 }
6506
6507 return rslt;
6508}
6509
6514void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_accel_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *acc,
6515 XWORD data_start_index,
6516 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6517 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6518{
6519 /* Variables to store LSB value */
6520 XWORD data_lsb;
6521
6522 /* Variables to store MSB value */
6523 XWORD data_msb;
6524
6525 /* Accelerometer raw x data */
6526 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6527 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6528 acc->x = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6529
6530 /* Accelerometer raw y data */
6531 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6532 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6533 acc->y = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6534
6535 /* Accelerometer raw z data */
6536 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6537 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6538 acc->z = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6539
6540 /* Get the re-mapped accelerometer data */
6541 get_remapped_data(acc, dev);
6542}
6543
6548XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::parse_fifo_gyro_len(XWORD *start_idx,
6549 XWORD(*len),
6550 const XWORD *gyr_count,
6551 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
6552{
6553 /* Variable to define error */
6554 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6555
6556 /* Data start index */
6557 (*start_idx) = fifo->gyr_byte_start_idx;
6558
6559 /* If only gyroscope is enabled */
6560 if(fifo->data_enable == BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN)
6561 {
6562 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6563 (*len) = (XWORD)((*gyr_count) * BMI2_FIFO_GYR_LENGTH);
6564 }
6565 /* If only gyroscope and auxiliary are enabled */
6566 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN | BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN))
6567 {
6568 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6569 (*len) = (XWORD)((*gyr_count) * BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH);
6570 }
6571 /* If only accelerometer and gyroscope are enabled */
6572 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN | BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN))
6573 {
6574 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6575 (*len) = (XWORD)((*gyr_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ACC_GYR_LENGTH);
6576 }
6577 /* If only accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary are enabled */
6578 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN | BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN | BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN))
6579 {
6580 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6581 (*len) = (XWORD)((*gyr_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH);
6582 }
6583 else
6584 {
6585 /* Move the data index to the last byte to mark completion when
6586 * no sensors or sensors apart from gyroscope are enabled
6587 */
6588 (*start_idx) = fifo->length;
6589
6590 /* FIFO is empty */
6591 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6592 }
6593
6594 /* If more data is requested than available */
6595 if(((*len)) > fifo->length)
6596 {
6597 (*len) = fifo->length;
6598 }
6599
6600 return rslt;
6601}
6602
6607XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_gyro_header_mode(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr,
6608 XWORD *gyro_length,
6609 struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6610 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6611{
6612 /* Variable to define error */
6613 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6614
6615 /* Variable to define header frame */
6616 XBYTE frame_header = 0;
6617
6618 /* Variable to index the data bytes */
6619 XWORD data_index;
6620
6621 /* Variable to index gyroscope frames */
6622 XWORD gyro_index = 0;
6623
6624 /* Variable to indicate gyroscope frames read */
6625 XWORD frame_to_read = (*gyro_length);
6626
6627 for (data_index = fifo->gyr_byte_start_idx; data_index < fifo->length;)
6628 {
6629 /* Get frame header byte */
6630 frame_header = fifo->data[data_index] & BMI2_FIFO_TAG_INTR_MASK;
6631
6632 /* Parse virtual header if S4S is enabled */
6633 parse_if_virtual_header(&frame_header, &data_index, fifo);
6634
6635 /* Index shifted to next byte where data starts */
6636 data_index++;
6637 switch (frame_header)
6638 {
6639 /* If header defines gyroscope frame */
6640 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
6641 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6642 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
6643 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
6644
6645 /* Unpack from normal frames */
6646 rslt = unpack_gyro_frame(gyr, &data_index, &gyro_index, frame_header, fifo, dev);
6647 break;
6648
6649 /* If header defines only accelerometer frame */
6650 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
6651 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->acc_frm_len, fifo);
6652 break;
6653
6654 /* If header defines only auxiliary frame */
6655 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
6656 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->aux_frm_len, fifo);
6657 break;
6658
6659 /* If header defines only auxiliary and accelerometer frame */
6660 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6661 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->acc_aux_frm_len, fifo);
6662 break;
6663
6664 /* If header defines sensor time frame */
6665 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SENS_TIME_FRM:
6666 rslt = unpack_sensortime_frame(&data_index, fifo);
6667 break;
6668
6669 /* If header defines skip frame */
6670 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SKIP_FRM:
6671 rslt = unpack_skipped_frame(&data_index, fifo);
6672 break;
6673
6674 /* If header defines Input configuration frame */
6675 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_INPUT_CFG_FRM:
6676 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_INPUT_CFG_LENGTH, fifo);
6677 break;
6678
6679 /* If header defines invalid frame or end of valid data */
6680 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_OVER_READ_MSB:
6681
6682 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6683 data_index = fifo->length;
6684
6685 /* FIFO is empty */
6686 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6687 break;
6688 case BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_RECOG_FRM:
6689 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_DATA_LENGTH, fifo);
6690 break;
6691 default:
6692
6693 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case of invalid values */
6694 data_index = fifo->length;
6695
6696 /* FIFO is empty */
6697 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6698 break;
6699 }
6700
6701 /* Break if number of frames to be read is complete or FIFO is empty */
6702 if((frame_to_read == gyro_index) || (rslt == BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY))
6703 {
6704 break;
6705 }
6706 }
6707
6708 /* Update the gyroscope frame index */
6709 (*gyro_length) = gyro_index;
6710
6711 /* Update the gyroscope byte index */
6712 fifo->gyr_byte_start_idx = data_index;
6713
6714 return rslt;
6715}
6716
6722XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_gyro_frame(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr,
6723 XWORD *idx,
6724 XWORD *gyr_idx,
6725 XBYTE frame,
6726 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6727 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6728{
6729 /* Variable to define error */
6730 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6731
6732 switch (frame)
6733 {
6734 /* If frame contains only gyroscope data */
6735 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
6736 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_FRM:
6737
6738 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6739 if(((*idx) + fifo->gyr_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6740 {
6741 /* Update the data index as complete*/
6742 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6743
6744 /* FIFO is empty */
6745 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6746 break;
6747 }
6748
6749 /* Get the gyroscope data */
6750 unpack_gyro_data(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], *idx, fifo, dev);
6751
6752 /* Update data index */
6753 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_GYR_LENGTH;
6754
6755 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6756 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6757 {
6758 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], idx, fifo);
6759 }
6760
6761 /* Update gyroscope frame index */
6762 (*gyr_idx)++;
6763
6764 /* More frames could be read */
6765 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6766 break;
6767
6768 /* If frame contains accelerometer and gyroscope data */
6769 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6770 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_ACC_FRM:
6771
6772 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6773 if(((*idx) + fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6774 {
6775 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6776 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6777
6778 /* FIFO is empty */
6779 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6780 break;
6781 }
6782
6783 /* Get the gyroscope data */
6784 unpack_gyro_data(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], (*idx), fifo, dev);
6785
6786 /* Update data index */
6787 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ACC_GYR_LENGTH;
6788
6789 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6790 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6791 {
6792 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], idx, fifo);
6793 }
6794
6795 /* Update gyroscope frame index */
6796 (*gyr_idx)++;
6797
6798 /* More frames could be read */
6799 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6800 break;
6801
6802 /* If frame contains gyroscope and auxiliary data */
6803 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
6804 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_AUX_FRM:
6805
6806 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
6807 if(((*idx) + fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6808 {
6809 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6810 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6811
6812 /* FIFO is empty */
6813 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6814 break;
6815 }
6816
6817 /* Get the gyroscope data */
6818 unpack_gyro_data(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], ((*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH), fifo, dev);
6819
6820 /* Update data index */
6821 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH;
6822
6823 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6824 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6825 {
6826 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], idx, fifo);
6827 }
6828
6829 /* Update gyroscope frame index */
6830 (*gyr_idx)++;
6831
6832 /* More frames could be read */
6833 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6834 break;
6835
6836 /* If frame contains accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary data */
6837 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
6838 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ALL_FRM:
6839
6840 /* Partially read, then skip the data*/
6841 if((*idx + fifo->all_frm_len) > fifo->length)
6842 {
6843 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
6844 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6845
6846 /* FIFO is empty */
6847 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6848 break;
6849 }
6850
6851 /* Get the gyroscope data */
6852 unpack_gyro_data(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], ((*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH), fifo, dev);
6853
6854 /* Update data index */
6855 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH;
6856
6857 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
6858 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
6859 {
6860 unpack_virt_sensor_time(&gyr[(*gyr_idx)], idx, fifo);
6861 }
6862
6863 /* Update gyroscope frame index */
6864 (*gyr_idx)++;
6865
6866 /* More frames could be read */
6867 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6868 break;
6869
6870 /* If frame contains accelerometer and auxiliary data */
6871 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6872 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_ACC_FRM:
6873
6874 /* Update data index */
6875 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->acc_aux_frm_len;
6876
6877 /* More frames could be read */
6878 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6879 break;
6880
6881 /* If frame contains only auxiliary data */
6882 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
6883 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_FRM:
6884
6885 /* Update data index */
6886 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->aux_frm_len;
6887
6888 /* More frames could be read */
6889 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6890 break;
6891
6892 /* If frame contains only accelerometer data */
6893 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
6894 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ACC_FRM:
6895
6896 /* Update data index */
6897 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->acc_frm_len;
6898
6899 /* More frames could be read */
6900 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
6901 break;
6902 default:
6903
6904 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case of invalid values */
6905 (*idx) = fifo->length;
6906
6907 /* FIFO is empty */
6908 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6909 break;
6910 }
6911
6912 return rslt;
6913}
6914
6918void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_gyro_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr,
6919 XWORD data_start_index,
6920 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
6921 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
6922{
6923 /* Variables to store LSB value */
6924 XWORD data_lsb;
6925
6926 /* Variables to store MSB value */
6927 XWORD data_msb;
6928
6929 /* Gyroscope raw x data */
6930 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6931 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6932 gyr->x = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6933
6934 /* Gyroscope raw y data */
6935 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6936 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6937 gyr->y = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6938
6939 /* Gyroscope raw z data */
6940 data_lsb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6941 data_msb = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
6942 gyr->z = (XWORDSIG)((data_msb << 8) | data_lsb);
6943
6944 /* Get the compensated gyroscope data */
6945 comp_gyro_cross_axis_sensitivity(gyr, dev);
6946
6947 /* Get the re-mapped gyroscope data */
6948 get_remapped_data(gyr, dev);
6949}
6950
6955XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::parse_fifo_aux_len(XWORD *start_idx,
6956 XWORD(*len),
6957 const XWORD *aux_count,
6958 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
6959{
6960 /* Variable to define error */
6961 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
6962
6963 /* Data start index */
6964 *start_idx = fifo->aux_byte_start_idx;
6965
6966 /* If only auxiliary is enabled */
6967 if(fifo->data_enable == BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN)
6968 {
6969 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6970 (*len) = (XWORD)((*aux_count) * BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH);
6971 }
6972 /* If only accelerometer and auxiliary are enabled */
6973 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN | BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN))
6974 {
6975 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6976 (*len) = (XWORD)((*aux_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ACC_AUX_LENGTH);
6977 }
6978 /* If only accelerometer and gyroscope are enabled */
6979 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN | BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN))
6980 {
6981 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6982 (*len) = (XWORD)((*aux_count) * BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH);
6983 }
6984 /* If only accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary are enabled */
6985 else if(fifo->data_enable == (BMI2_FIFO_AUX_EN | BMI2_FIFO_GYR_EN | BMI2_FIFO_ACC_EN))
6986 {
6987 /* Number of bytes to be read */
6988 (*len) = (XWORD)((*aux_count) * BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH);
6989 }
6990 else
6991 {
6992 /* Move the data index to the last byte to mark completion when
6993 * no sensors or sensors apart from gyroscope are enabled
6994 */
6995 (*start_idx) = fifo->length;
6996
6997 /* FIFO is empty */
6998 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
6999 }
7000
7001 /* If more data is requested than available */
7002 if(((*len)) > fifo->length)
7003 {
7004 (*len) = fifo->length;
7005 }
7006
7007 return rslt;
7008}
7009
7014XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_aux_header_mode(struct bmi2_aux_fifo_data *aux,
7015 XWORD *aux_len,
7016 struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
7017 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7018{
7019 /* Variable to define error */
7020 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7021
7022 /* Variable to define header frame */
7023 XBYTE frame_header = 0;
7024
7025 /* Variable to index the data bytes */
7026 XWORD data_index;
7027
7028 /* Variable to index gyroscope frames */
7029 XWORD aux_index = 0;
7030
7031 /* Variable to indicate auxiliary frames read */
7032 XWORD frame_to_read = *aux_len;
7033
7034 for (data_index = fifo->aux_byte_start_idx; data_index < fifo->length;)
7035 {
7036 /* Get frame header byte */
