7037 frame_header = fifo->data[data_index] & BMI2_FIFO_TAG_INTR_MASK;
7038
7039 /* Parse virtual header if S4S is enabled */
7040 parse_if_virtual_header(&frame_header, &data_index, fifo);
7041
7042 /* Index shifted to next byte where data starts */
7043 data_index++;
7044 switch (frame_header)
7045 {
7046 /* If header defines auxiliary frame */
7047 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
7048 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
7049 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
7050 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
7051
7052 /* Unpack from normal frames */
7053 rslt = unpack_aux_frame(aux, &data_index, &aux_index, frame_header, fifo, dev);
7054 break;
7055
7056 /* If header defines only accelerometer frame */
7057 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
7058 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->acc_frm_len, fifo);
7059 break;
7060
7061 /* If header defines only gyroscope frame */
7062 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
7063 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->gyr_frm_len, fifo);
7064 break;
7065
7066 /* If header defines only gyroscope and accelerometer frame */
7067 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
7068 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len, fifo);
7069 break;
7070
7071 /* If header defines sensor time frame */
7072 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SENS_TIME_FRM:
7073 rslt = unpack_sensortime_frame(&data_index, fifo);
7074 break;
7075
7076 /* If header defines skip frame */
7077 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_SKIP_FRM:
7078 rslt = unpack_skipped_frame(&data_index, fifo);
7079 break;
7080
7081 /* If header defines Input configuration frame */
7082 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_INPUT_CFG_FRM:
7083 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_INPUT_CFG_LENGTH, fifo);
7084 break;
7085
7086 /* If header defines invalid frame or end of valid data */
7087 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_OVER_READ_MSB:
7088
7089 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7090 data_index = fifo->length;
7091
7092 /* FIFO is empty */
7093 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7094 break;
7095 case BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_RECOG_FRM:
7096 rslt = move_next_frame(&data_index, BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACT_DATA_LENGTH, fifo);
7097 break;
7098 default:
7099
7100 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case
7101 * of invalid values
7102 */
7103 data_index = fifo->length;
7104
7105 /* FIFO is empty */
7106 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7107 break;
7108 }
7109
7110 /* Break if number of frames to be read is complete or FIFO is
7111 * empty
7112 */
7113 if((frame_to_read == aux_index) || (rslt == BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY))
7114 {
7115 break;
7116 }
7117 }
7118
7119 /* Update the gyroscope frame index */
7120 (*aux_len) = aux_index;
7121
7122 /* Update the gyroscope byte index */
7123 fifo->aux_byte_start_idx = data_index;
7124
7125 return rslt;
7126}
7127
7133XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_aux_frame(struct bmi2_aux_fifo_data *aux,
7134 XWORD *idx,
7135 XWORD *aux_idx,
7136 XBYTE frame,
7137 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo,
7138 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7139{
7140 /* Variable to define error */
7141 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7142
7143 switch (frame)
7144 {
7145 /* If frame contains only auxiliary data */
7146 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_FRM:
7147 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_FRM:
7148
7149 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
7150 if(((*idx) + fifo->aux_frm_len) > fifo->length)
7151 {
7152 /* Update the data index as complete*/
7153 (*idx) = fifo->length;
7154
7155 /* FIFO is empty */
7156 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7157 break;
7158 }
7159
7160 /* Get the auxiliary data */
7161 unpack_aux_data(&aux[(*aux_idx)], (*idx), fifo);
7162
7163 /* Update data index */
7164 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH;
7165
7166 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
7167 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
7168 {
7169 unpack_virt_aux_sensor_time(&aux[(*aux_idx)], idx, fifo);
7170 }
7171
7172 /* Update auxiliary frame index */
7173 (*aux_idx)++;
7174
7175 /* More frames could be read */
7176 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7177 break;
7178
7179 /* If frame contains accelerometer and auxiliary data */
7180 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_ACC_FRM:
7181 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_AUX_ACC_FRM:
7182
7183 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
7184 if(((*idx) + fifo->acc_aux_frm_len) > fifo->length)
7185 {
7186 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7187 (*idx) = fifo->length;
7188
7189 /* FIFO is empty */
7190 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7191 break;
7192 }
7193
7194 /* Get the auxiliary data */
7195 unpack_aux_data(&aux[(*aux_idx)], (*idx), fifo);
7196
7197 /* Update data index */
7198 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ACC_AUX_LENGTH;
7199
7200 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
7201 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
7202 {
7203 unpack_virt_aux_sensor_time(&aux[(*aux_idx)], idx, fifo);
7204 }
7205
7206 /* Update auxiliary frame index */
7207 (*aux_idx)++;
7208
7209 /* More frames could be read */
7210 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7211 break;
7212
7213 /* If frame contains gyroscope and auxiliary data */
7214 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_AUX_GYR_FRM:
7215 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_AUX_FRM:
7216
7217 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
7218 if(((*idx) + fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len) > fifo->length)
7219 {
7220 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7221 (*idx) = fifo->length;
7222
7223 /* FIFO is empty */
7224 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7225 break;
7226 }
7227
7228 /* Get the auxiliary data */
7229 unpack_aux_data(&aux[(*aux_idx)], (*idx), fifo);
7230
7231 /* Update data index */
7232 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH;
7233
7234 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
7235 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
7236 {
7237 unpack_virt_aux_sensor_time(&aux[(*aux_idx)], idx, fifo);
7238 }
7239
7240 /* Update auxiliary frame index */
7241 (*aux_idx)++;
7242
7243 /* More frames could be read */
7244 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7245 break;
7246
7247 /* If frame contains accelerometer, gyroscope and auxiliary data */
7248 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ALL_FRM:
7249 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ALL_FRM:
7250
7251 /* Partially read, then skip the data */
7252 if((*idx + fifo->all_frm_len) > fifo->length)
7253 {
7254 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7255 (*idx) = fifo->length;
7256
7257 /* FIFO is empty */
7258 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7259 break;
7260 }
7261
7262 /* Get the auxiliary data */
7263 unpack_aux_data(&aux[(*aux_idx)], (*idx), fifo);
7264
7265 /* Update data index */
7266 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH;
7267
7268 /* Get virtual sensor time if S4S is enabled */
7269 if(dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
7270 {
7271 unpack_virt_aux_sensor_time(&aux[(*aux_idx)], idx, fifo);
7272 }
7273
7274 /* Update auxiliary frame index */
7275 (*aux_idx)++;
7276
7277 /* More frames could be read */
7278 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7279 break;
7280
7281 /* If frame contains only accelerometer data */
7282 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_ACC_FRM:
7283 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_ACC_FRM:
7284
7285 /* Update data index */
7286 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->acc_frm_len;
7287
7288 /* More frames could be read */
7289 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7290 break;
7291
7292 /* If frame contains only gyroscope data */
7293 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_FRM:
7294 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_FRM:
7295
7296 /* Update data index */
7297 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->gyr_frm_len;
7298
7299 /* More frames could be read */
7300 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7301 break;
7302
7303 /* If frame contains accelerometer and gyroscope data */
7304 case BMI2_FIFO_HEADER_GYR_ACC_FRM:
7305 case BMI2_FIFO_HEAD_LESS_GYR_ACC_FRM:
7306
7307 /* Update data index */
7308 (*idx) = (*idx) + fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len;
7309
7310 /* More frames could be read */
7311 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7312 break;
7313 default:
7314
7315 /* Move the data index to the last byte in case of
7316 * invalid values
7317 */
7318 (*idx) = fifo->length;
7319
7320 /* FIFO is empty */
7321 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7322 break;
7323 }
7324
7325 return rslt;
7326}
7327
7331void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_aux_data(struct bmi2_aux_fifo_data *aux,
7332 XWORD data_start_index,
7333 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7334{
7335 /* Variables to store index */
7336 XWORD idx = 0;
7337
7338 /* Get auxiliary data */
7339 for (; idx < 8; idx++)
7340 {
7341 aux->data[idx] = fifo->data[data_start_index++];
7342 }
7343}
7344
7348void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::parse_if_virtual_header(XBYTE *frame_header, XWORD *data_index, const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7349{
7350 /* Variable to extract virtual header byte */
7351 XBYTE virtual_header_mode;
7352
7353 /* Extract virtual header mode from the frame header */
7354 virtual_header_mode = BMI2_GET_BITS(*frame_header, BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_FRM_MODE);
7355
7356 /* If the extracted header byte is a virtual header */
7357 if(virtual_header_mode == BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_FRM_MODE)
7358 {
7359 /* If frame header is not activity recognition header */
7360 if(*frame_header != 0xC8)
7361 {
7362 /* Index shifted to next byte where sensor frame is present */
7363 (*data_index) = (*data_index) + 1;
7364
7365 /* Get the sensor frame header */
7366 *frame_header = fifo->data[*data_index] & BMI2_FIFO_TAG_INTR_MASK;
7367 }
7368 }
7369}
7370
7375 void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_virt_sensor_time(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *sens, XWORD *idx, const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7376{
7377 /* Variables to define 3 bytes of sensor time */
7378 XDWORD sensor_time_byte3;
7379 XWORD sensor_time_byte2;
7380 XBYTE sensor_time_byte1;
7381
7382 /* Get sensor time from the FIFO data */
7383 sensor_time_byte3 = (XDWORD)(fifo->data[(*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_MSB_BYTE] << 16);
7384 sensor_time_byte2 = (XWORD) fifo->data[(*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_XLSB_BYTE] << 8;
7385 sensor_time_byte1 = fifo->data[(*idx)];
7386
7387 /* Store sensor time in the sensor data structure */
7388 sens->virt_sens_time = (XDWORD)(sensor_time_byte3 | sensor_time_byte2 | sensor_time_byte1);
7389
7390 /* Move the data index by 3 bytes */
7391 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_LENGTH;
7392}
7393
7398void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_virt_aux_sensor_time(struct bmi2_aux_fifo_data *aux,
7399 XWORD *idx,
7400 const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7401{
7402 /* Variables to define 3 bytes of sensor time */
7403 XDWORD sensor_time_byte3;
7404 XWORD sensor_time_byte2;
7405 XBYTE sensor_time_byte1;
7406
7407 /* Get sensor time from the FIFO data */
7408 sensor_time_byte3 = (XDWORD)(fifo->data[(*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_MSB_BYTE] << 16);
7409 sensor_time_byte2 = (XWORD) fifo->data[(*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_XLSB_BYTE] << 8;
7410 sensor_time_byte1 = fifo->data[(*idx)];
7411
7412 /* Store sensor time in the sensor data structure */
7413 aux->virt_sens_time = (XDWORD)(sensor_time_byte3 | sensor_time_byte2 | sensor_time_byte1);
7414
7415 /* Move the data index by 3 bytes */
7416 (*idx) = (*idx) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_LENGTH;
7417}
7418
7423void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::reset_fifo_frame_structure(struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo, const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7424{
7425 /* Reset FIFO data structure */
7426 fifo->acc_byte_start_idx = 0;
7427 fifo->aux_byte_start_idx = 0;
7428 fifo->gyr_byte_start_idx = 0;
7429 fifo->sensor_time = 0;
7430 fifo->skipped_frame_count = 0;
7431 fifo->act_recog_byte_start_idx = 0;
7432
7433 /* If S4S is enabled */
7434 if((dev->sens_en_stat & BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL) == BMI2_EXT_SENS_SEL)
7435 {
7436 fifo->acc_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACC_LENGTH;
7437 fifo->gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_GYR_LENGTH;
7438 fifo->aux_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_AUX_LENGTH;
7439 fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACC_GYR_LENGTH;
7440 fifo->acc_aux_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ACC_AUX_LENGTH;
7441 fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_GYR_AUX_LENGTH;
7442 fifo->all_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_VIRT_ALL_LENGTH;
7443
7444 /* If S4S is not enabled */
7445 }
7446 else
7447 {
7448 fifo->acc_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_ACC_LENGTH;
7449 fifo->gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_GYR_LENGTH;
7450 fifo->aux_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_AUX_LENGTH;
7451 fifo->acc_gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_ACC_GYR_LENGTH;
7452 fifo->acc_aux_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_ACC_AUX_LENGTH;
7453 fifo->aux_gyr_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_GYR_AUX_LENGTH;
7454 fifo->all_frm_len = BMI2_FIFO_ALL_LENGTH;
7455 }
7456}
7457
7462XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::check_empty_fifo(XWORD *data_index, const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7463{
7464 /* Variables to define error */
7465 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7466
7467 /* Validate data index */
7468 if(((*data_index) + 6) < fifo->length)
7469 {
7470 /* Check if FIFO is empty */
7471 if(((fifo->data[(*data_index)] == BMI2_FIFO_MSB_CONFIG_CHECK) &&
7472 (fifo->data[(*data_index) + 1] == BMI2_FIFO_LSB_CONFIG_CHECK)) &&
7473 ((fifo->data[(*data_index) + 2] == BMI2_FIFO_MSB_CONFIG_CHECK) &&
7474 (fifo->data[(*data_index) + 3] == BMI2_FIFO_LSB_CONFIG_CHECK)) &&
7475 ((fifo->data[(*data_index) + 4] == BMI2_FIFO_MSB_CONFIG_CHECK) &&
7476 (fifo->data[(*data_index) + 5] == BMI2_FIFO_LSB_CONFIG_CHECK)))
7477 {
7478 /* Move the data index to the last byte to mark completion */
7479 (*data_index) = fifo->length;
7480
7481 /* FIFO is empty */
7482 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7483 }
7484 else
7485 {
7486 /* More frames could be read */
7487 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7488 }
7489 }
7490
7491 return rslt;
7492}
7493
7499XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::move_next_frame(XWORD *data_index, XBYTE current_frame_length, const struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7500{
7501 /* Variables to define error */
7502 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7503
7504 /* Validate data index */
7505 if(((*data_index) + current_frame_length) > fifo->length)
7506 {
7507 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7508 (*data_index) = fifo->length;
7509
7510 /* FIFO is empty */
7511 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7512 }
7513 else
7514 {
7515 /* Move the data index to next frame */
7516 (*data_index) = (*data_index) + current_frame_length;
7517
7518 /* More frames could be read */
7519 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7520 }
7521
7522 return rslt;
7523}
7524
7529XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_sensortime_frame(XWORD *data_index, struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7530{
7531 /* Variables to define error */
7532 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7533
7534 /* Variables to define 3 bytes of sensor time */
7535 XDWORD sensor_time_byte3 = 0;
7536 XWORD sensor_time_byte2 = 0;
7537 XBYTE sensor_time_byte1 = 0;
7538
7539 /* Validate data index */
7540 if(((*data_index) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_LENGTH) > fifo->length)
7541 {
7542 /* Move the data index to the last byte */
7543 (*data_index) = fifo->length;
7544
7545 /* FIFO is empty */
7546 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7547 }
7548 else
7549 {
7550 /* Get sensor time from the FIFO data */
7551 sensor_time_byte3 = fifo->data[(*data_index) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_MSB_BYTE] << 16;
7552 sensor_time_byte2 = fifo->data[(*data_index) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_XLSB_BYTE] << 8;
7553 sensor_time_byte1 = fifo->data[(*data_index)];
7554
7555 /* Update sensor time in the FIFO structure */
7556 fifo->sensor_time = (XDWORD)(sensor_time_byte3 | sensor_time_byte2 | sensor_time_byte1);
7557
7558 /* Move the data index by 3 bytes */
7559 (*data_index) = (*data_index) + BMI2_SENSOR_TIME_LENGTH;
7560
7561 /* More frames could be read */
7562 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7563 }
7564
7565 return rslt;
7566}
7567
7572XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::unpack_skipped_frame(XWORD *data_index, struct bmi2_fifo_frame *fifo)
7573{
7574 /* Variables to define error */
7575 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7576
7577 /* Validate data index */
7578 if((*data_index) >= fifo->length)
7579 {
7580 /* Update the data index to the last byte */
7581 (*data_index) = fifo->length;
7582
7583 /* FIFO is empty */
7584 rslt = BMI2_W_FIFO_EMPTY;
7585 }
7586 else
7587 {
7588 /* Update skipped frame count in the FIFO structure */
7589 fifo->skipped_frame_count = fifo->data[(*data_index)];
7590
7591 /* Move the data index by 1 byte */
7592 (*data_index) = (*data_index) + 1;
7593
7594 /* More frames could be read */
7595 rslt = BMI2_W_PARTIAL_READ;
7596 }
7597
7598 return rslt;
7599}
7600
7605XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::pre_self_test_config(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7606{
7607 /* Variable to define error */
7608 XBYTESIG rslt;
7609
7610 /* Structure to define sensor configurations */
7611 struct bmi2_sens_config sens_cfg;
7612
7613 /* List the sensors to be selected */
7614 XBYTE sens_sel = BMI2_ACCEL;
7615
7616 /* Enable accelerometer */
7617 rslt = bmi2_sensor_enable(&sens_sel, 1, dev);
7618 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
7619
7620 /* Enable self-test amplitude */
7621 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7622 {
7623 rslt = set_accel_self_test_amp(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
7624 }
7625
7626 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7627 {
7628 /* Select accelerometer for sensor configurations */
7629 sens_cfg.type = BMI2_ACCEL;
7630
7631 /* Get the default values */
7632 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_config(&sens_cfg, 1, dev);
7633 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7634 {
7635 /* Set the configurations required for self-test */
7636 sens_cfg.cfg.acc.odr = BMI2_ACC_ODR_1600HZ;
7637 sens_cfg.cfg.acc.bwp = BMI2_ACC_NORMAL_AVG4;
7638 sens_cfg.cfg.acc.filter_perf = BMI2_PERF_OPT_MODE;
7639 sens_cfg.cfg.acc.range = BMI2_ACC_RANGE_16G;
7640
7641 /* Set accelerometer configurations */
7642 rslt = bmi2_set_sensor_config(&sens_cfg, 1, dev);
7643 }
7644 }
7645
7646 return rslt;
7647}
7648
7653XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::self_test_config(XBYTE sign, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7654{
7655 /* Variable to define error */
7656 XBYTESIG rslt;
7657
7658 /* Enable the accelerometer self-test feature */
7659 rslt = set_accel_self_test_enable(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
7660 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7661 {
7662 /* Selects the sign of accelerometer self-test excitation */
7663 rslt = set_acc_self_test_sign(sign, dev);
7664 }
7665
7666 return rslt;
7667}
7668
7673XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_accel_self_test_enable(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7674{
7675 /* Variable to define error */
7676 XBYTESIG rslt;
7677
7678 /* Variable to define data */
7679 XBYTE data = 0;
7680
7681 /* Enable/Disable self-test feature */
7682 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7683 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7684 {
7685 data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(data, BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_EN, enable);
7686 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7687 }
7688
7689 return rslt;
7690}
7691
7696XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_acc_self_test_sign(XBYTE sign, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7697{
7698 /* Variable to define error */
7699 XBYTESIG rslt;
7700
7701 /* Variable to define data */
7702 XBYTE data = 0;
7703
7704 /* Select the sign for self-test excitation */
7705 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7706 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7707 {
7708 data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data, BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_SIGN, sign);
7709 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7710 }
7711
7712 return rslt;
7713}
7714
7719XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_accel_self_test_amp(XBYTE amp, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7720{
7721 /* Variable to define error */
7722 XBYTESIG rslt;
7723
7724 /* Variable to define data */
7725 XBYTE data = 0;
7726
7727 /* Select amplitude of the self-test deflection */
7728 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7729 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7730 {
7731 data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data, BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_AMP, amp);
7732 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
7733 }
7734
7735 return rslt;
7736}
7737
7742XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::read_accel_xyz(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *accel, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7743{
7744 /* Variable to define error */
7745 XBYTESIG rslt;
7746
7747 /* Variable to define LSB */
7748 XWORD lsb = 0;
7749
7750 /* Variable to define MSB */
7751 XWORD msb = 0;
7752
7753 /* Array to define data buffer */
7754 XBYTE data[BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES] = { 0 };
7755
7756 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_ACC_X_LSB_ADDR, data, BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES, dev);
7757 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7758 {
7759 /* Accelerometer data x axis */
7760 msb = data[1];
7761 lsb = data[0];
7762 accel->x = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7763
7764 /* Accelerometer data y axis */
7765 msb = data[3];
7766 lsb = data[2];
7767 accel->y = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7768
7769 /* Accelerometer data z axis */
7770 msb = data[5];
7771 lsb = data[4];
7772 accel->z = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7773 }
7774
7775 return rslt;
7776}
7777
7782XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::read_gyro_xyz(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyro, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7783{
7784 /* Variable to define error */
7785 XBYTESIG rslt;
7786
7787 /* Variable to define LSB */
7788 XWORD lsb = 0;
7789
7790 /* Variable to define MSB */
7791 XWORD msb = 0;
7792
7793 /* Array to define data buffer */
7794 XBYTE data[BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES] = { 0 };
7795
7796 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_X_LSB_ADDR, data, BMI2_ACC_GYR_NUM_BYTES, dev);
7797 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7798 {
7799 /* Gyroscope data x axis */
7800 msb = data[1];
7801 lsb = data[0];
7802 gyro->x = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7803
7804 /* Gyroscope data y axis */
7805 msb = data[3];
7806 lsb = data[2];
7807 gyro->y = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7808
7809 /* Gyroscope data z axis */
7810 msb = data[5];
7811 lsb = data[4];
7812 gyro->z = (XWORDSIG)((msb << 8) | lsb);
7813 }
7814
7815 return rslt;
7816}
7817
7822void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::convert_lsb_g(const struct bmi2_selftest_delta_limit *acc_data_diff,
7823 struct bmi2_selftest_delta_limit *acc_data_diff_mg,
7824 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7825{
7826 /* Variable to define LSB/g value of axes */
7827 XDWORD lsb_per_g;
7828
7829 /* Range considered for self-test is +/-16g */
7830 XBYTE range = BMI2_ACC_SELF_TEST_RANGE;
7831
7832 /* lsb_per_g for the respective resolution and 16g range */
7833 lsb_per_g = (XDWORD)(power(2, dev->resolution) / (2 * range));
7834
7835 /* Accelerometer x value in mg */
7836 acc_data_diff_mg->x = (acc_data_diff->x / (XDWORDSIG) lsb_per_g) * 1000;
7837
7838 /* Accelerometer y value in mg */
7839 acc_data_diff_mg->y = (acc_data_diff->y / (XDWORDSIG) lsb_per_g) * 1000;
7840
7841 /* Accelerometer z value in mg */
7842 acc_data_diff_mg->z = (acc_data_diff->z / (XDWORDSIG) lsb_per_g) * 1000;
7843}
7844
7848XDWORDSIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::power(XWORDSIG base, XBYTE resolution)
7849{
7850 /* Initialize loop */
7851 XBYTE loop = 1;
7852
7853 /* Initialize variable to store the power of 2 value */
7854 XDWORDSIG value = 1;
7855
7856 for (; loop <= resolution; loop++)
7857 {
7858 value = (XDWORDSIG)(value * base);
7859 }
7860
7861 return value;
7862}
7863
7868XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_self_test(const struct bmi2_selftest_delta_limit *accel_data_diff)
7869{
7870 /* Variable to define error */
7871 XBYTESIG rslt;
7872
7873 /* As per the data sheet, The actually measured signal differences should be significantly
7874 * larger than the minimum differences for each axis in order for the self-test to pass.
7875 */
7876 if((accel_data_diff->x > BMI2_ST_ACC_X_SIG_MIN_DIFF) && (accel_data_diff->y < BMI2_ST_ACC_Y_SIG_MIN_DIFF) &&
7877 (accel_data_diff->z > BMI2_ST_ACC_Z_SIG_MIN_DIFF))
7878 {
7879 /* Self-test pass */
7880 rslt = BMI2_OK;
7881 }
7882 else
7883 {
7884 /* Self-test fail*/
7885 rslt = BMI2_E_SELF_TEST_FAIL;
7886 }
7887
7888 return rslt;
7889}
7890
7894XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_remap_axes(struct bmi2_axes_remap *remap, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7895{
7896 /* Variable to define error */
7897 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7898
7899 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
7900 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
7901
7902 /* Variable to define the array offset */
7903 XBYTE idx = 0;
7904
7905 /* Variable to set flag */
7906 XBYTE feat_found;
7907
7908 /* Initialize feature configuration for axis re-mapping */
7909 struct bmi2_feature_config remap_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
7910
7911 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
7912 XBYTE aps_stat;
7913
7914 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
7915 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
7916 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
7917 {
7918 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
7919 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
7920 }
7921
7922 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7923 {
7924 /* Search for axis re-mapping and extract its configuration details */
7925 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&remap_config, BMI2_AXIS_MAP, dev);
7926 if(feat_found)
7927 {
7928 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(remap_config.page, feat_config, dev);
7929 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
7930 {
7931 /* Define the offset for axis re-mapping */
7932 idx = remap_config.start_addr;
7933
7934 /* Get the re-mapped x-axis */
7935 remap->x_axis = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_X_AXIS);
7936
7937 /* Get the re-mapped x-axis polarity */
7938 remap->x_axis_sign = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_X_AXIS_SIGN);
7939
7940 /* Get the re-mapped y-axis */
7941 remap->y_axis = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_Y_AXIS);
7942
7943 /* Get the re-mapped y-axis polarity */
7944 remap->y_axis_sign = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_Y_AXIS_SIGN);
7945
7946 /* Get the re-mapped z-axis */
7947 remap->z_axis = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_Z_AXIS);
7948
7949 /* Increment byte to fetch the next data */
7950 idx++;
7951
7952 /* Get the re-mapped z-axis polarity */
7953 remap->z_axis_sign = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_Z_AXIS_SIGN);
7954 }
7955 }
7956 else
7957 {
7958 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
7959 }
7960
7961 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
7962 * not when already disabled
7963 */
7964 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
7965 {
7966 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
7967 }
7968 }
7969
7970 return rslt;
7971}
7972
7976XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_remap_axes(const struct bmi2_axes_remap *remap, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
7977{
7978 /* Variable to define error */
7979 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
7980
7981 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
7982 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
7983
7984 /* Variable to define the array offset */
7985 XBYTE idx = 0;
7986
7987 /* Variable to define the register address */
7988 XBYTE reg_addr = 0;
7989
7990 /* Variable to set the re-mapped x-axes in the sensor */
7991 XBYTE x_axis = 0;
7992
7993 /* Variable to set the re-mapped y-axes in the sensor */
7994 XBYTE y_axis = 0;
7995
7996 /* Variable to set the re-mapped z-axes in the sensor */
7997 XBYTE z_axis = 0;
7998
7999 /* Variable to set the re-mapped x-axes sign in the sensor */
8000 XBYTE x_axis_sign = 0;
8001
8002 /* Variable to set the re-mapped y-axes sign in the sensor */
8003 XBYTE y_axis_sign = 0;
8004
8005 /* Variable to set the re-mapped z-axes sign in the sensor */
8006 XBYTE z_axis_sign = 0;
8007
8008 /* Variable to set flag */
8009 XBYTE feat_found;
8010
8011 /* Initialize feature configuration for axis re-mapping */
8012 struct bmi2_feature_config remap_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
8013
8014 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
8015 XBYTE aps_stat;
8016
8017 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
8018 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
8019 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
8020 {
8021 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
8022 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
8023 }
8024
8025 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8026 {
8027 /* Search for axis-re-mapping and extract its configuration details */
8028 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&remap_config, BMI2_AXIS_MAP, dev);
8029 if(feat_found)
8030 {
8031 /* Get the configuration from the page where axis re-mapping feature resides */
8032 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(remap_config.page, feat_config, dev);
8033 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8034 {
8035 /* Define the offset in bytes */
8036 idx = remap_config.start_addr;
8037
8038 /* Set the value of re-mapped x-axis */
8039 x_axis = remap->x_axis & BMI2_X_AXIS_MASK;
8040
8041 /* Set the value of re-mapped x-axis sign */
8042 x_axis_sign = ((remap->x_axis_sign << BMI2_X_AXIS_SIGN_POS) & BMI2_X_AXIS_SIGN_MASK);
8043
8044 /* Set the value of re-mapped y-axis */
8045 y_axis = ((remap->y_axis << BMI2_Y_AXIS_POS) & BMI2_Y_AXIS_MASK);
8046
8047 /* Set the value of re-mapped y-axis sign */
8048 y_axis_sign = ((remap->y_axis_sign << BMI2_Y_AXIS_SIGN_POS) & BMI2_Y_AXIS_SIGN_MASK);
8049
8050 /* Set the value of re-mapped z-axis */
8051 z_axis = ((remap->z_axis << BMI2_Z_AXIS_POS) & BMI2_Z_AXIS_MASK);
8052
8053 /* Set the value of re-mapped z-axis sign */
8054 z_axis_sign = remap->z_axis_sign & BMI2_Z_AXIS_SIGN_MASK;
8055
8056 /* Arrange axes in the first byte */
8057 feat_config[idx] = x_axis | x_axis_sign | y_axis | y_axis_sign | z_axis;
8058
8059 /* Increment the index */
8060 idx++;
8061
8062 /* Cannot OR in the second byte since it holds
8063 * gyroscope self-offset correction bit
8064 */
8065 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_Z_AXIS_SIGN, z_axis_sign);
8066
8067 /* Update the register address */
8068 reg_addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR + remap_config.start_addr;
8069
8070 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
8071 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &feat_config[remap_config.start_addr], 2, dev);
8072 }
8073 }
8074 else
8075 {
8076 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
8077 }
8078
8079 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
8080 * not when already disabled
8081 */
8082 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
8083 {
8084 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
8085 }
8086 }
8087
8088 return rslt;
8089}
8090
8095void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::comp_gyro_cross_axis_sensitivity(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr_data, const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8096{
8097 /* Get the compensated gyroscope x-axis */
8098 gyr_data->x = gyr_data->x - (XWORDSIG)(((XDWORDSIG) dev->gyr_cross_sens_zx * (XDWORDSIG) gyr_data->z) / 512);
8099}
8100
8104XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::check_boundary_val(XBYTE *val, XBYTE min, XBYTE max, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8105{
8106 /* Variable to define error */
8107 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
8108
8109 if(val != NULL)
8110 {
8111 /* Check if value is below minimum value */
8112 if(*val < min)
8113 {
8114 /* Auto correct the invalid value to minimum value */
8115 *val = min;
8116 dev->info |= BMI2_I_MIN_VALUE;
8117 }
8118
8119 /* Check if value is above maximum value */
8120 if(*val > max)
8121 {
8122 /* Auto correct the invalid value to maximum value */
8123 *val = max;
8124 dev->info |= BMI2_I_MAX_VALUE;
8125 }
8126 }
8127 else
8128 {
8129 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
8130 }
8131
8132 return rslt;
8133}
8134
8138XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::save_accel_foc_config(struct bmi2_accel_config *acc_cfg,
8139 XBYTE *aps,
8140 XBYTE *acc_en,
8141 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8142{
8143 /* Variable to define error */
8144 XBYTESIG rslt;
8145
8146 /* Variable to get the status from PWR_CTRL register */
8147 XBYTE pwr_ctrl_data = 0;
8148
8149 /* Get accelerometer configurations to be saved */
8150 rslt = get_accel_config(acc_cfg, dev);
8151 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8152 {
8153 /* Get accelerometer enable status to be saved */
8154 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8155 *acc_en = BMI2_GET_BITS(pwr_ctrl_data, BMI2_ACC_EN);
8156
8157 /* Get advance power save mode to be saved */
8158 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8159 {
8160 rslt = bmi2_get_adv_power_save(aps, dev);
8161 }
8162 }
8163
8164 return rslt;
8165}
8166
8170XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_accel_foc_config(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8171{
8172 /* Variable to define error */
8173 XBYTESIG rslt;
8174
8175 /* Variable to select the sensor */
8176 XBYTE sens_list = BMI2_ACCEL;
8177
8178 /* Variable to set the accelerometer configuration value */
8179 XBYTE acc_conf_data = BMI2_FOC_ACC_CONF_VAL;
8180
8181 /* Disabling offset compensation */
8182 rslt = set_accel_offset_comp(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
8183 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8184 {
8185 /* Set accelerometer configurations to 50Hz, continuous mode, CIC mode */
8186 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_CONF_ADDR, &acc_conf_data, 1, dev);
8187 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8188 {
8189 /* Set accelerometer to normal mode by enabling it */
8190 rslt = bmi2_sensor_enable(&sens_list, 1, dev);
8191
8192 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8193 {
8194 /* Disable advance power save mode */
8195 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
8196 }
8197 }
8198 }
8199
8200 return rslt;
8201}
8202
8206XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::perform_accel_foc(const struct bmi2_accel_foc_g_value *accel_g_value,
8207 const struct bmi2_accel_config *acc_cfg,
8208 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8209{
8210 /* Variable to define error */
8211 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_STATUS;
8212
8213 /* Variable to define count */
8214 XBYTE loop;
8215
8216 /* Variable to store status read from the status register */
8217 XBYTE reg_status = 0;
8218
8219 /* Array of structure to store accelerometer data */
8220 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data accel_value[128] = { { 0 } };
8221
8222 /* Structure to store accelerometer data temporarily */
8223 struct bmi2_foc_temp_value temp = { 0, 0, 0 };
8224
8225 /* Structure to store the average of accelerometer data */
8226 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data accel_avg = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
8227
8228 /* Variable to define LSB per g value */
8229 XWORD lsb_per_g = 0;
8230
8231 /* Variable to define range */
8232 XBYTE range = 0;
8233
8234 /* Structure to store accelerometer data deviation from ideal value */
8235 struct bmi2_offset_delta delta = { 0, 0, 0 };
8236
8237 /* Structure to store accelerometer offset values */
8238 struct bmi2_accel_offset offset = { 0, 0, 0 };
8239
8240 /* Variable tries max 5 times for interrupt then generates timeout */
8241 XBYTE try_cnt;
8242
8243 for (loop = 0; loop < 128; loop++)
8244 {
8245 try_cnt = 5;
8246 while (try_cnt && (!(reg_status & BMI2_DRDY_ACC)))
8247 {
8248 /* 20ms delay for 50Hz ODR */
8249 bmi2_delay_us(20000, dev->intf_ptr);
8250 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&reg_status, dev);
8251 try_cnt--;
8252 }
8253
8254 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (reg_status & BMI2_DRDY_ACC))
8255 {
8256 rslt = read_accel_xyz(&accel_value[loop], dev);
8257 }
8258
8259 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8260 {
8261 rslt = read_accel_xyz(&accel_value[loop], dev);
8262 }
8263
8264 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8265 {
8266 /* Store the data in a temporary structure */
8267 temp.x = temp.x + (XDWORDSIG)accel_value[loop].x;
8268 temp.y = temp.y + (XDWORDSIG)accel_value[loop].y;
8269 temp.z = temp.z + (XDWORDSIG)accel_value[loop].z;
8270 }
8271 else
8272 {
8273 break;
8274 }
8275 }
8276
8277 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8278 {
8279 /* Take average of x, y and z data for lesser noise */
8280 accel_avg.x = (XWORDSIG)(temp.x / 128);
8281 accel_avg.y = (XWORDSIG)(temp.y / 128);
8282 accel_avg.z = (XWORDSIG)(temp.z / 128);
8283
8284 /* Get the exact range value */
8285 map_accel_range(acc_cfg->range, &range);
8286
8287 /* Get the smallest possible measurable acceleration level given the range and
8288 * resolution */
8289 lsb_per_g = (XWORD)(power(2, dev->resolution) / (2 * range));
8290
8291 /* Compensate acceleration data against gravity */
8292 comp_for_gravity(lsb_per_g, accel_g_value, &accel_avg, &delta);
8293
8294 /* Scale according to offset register resolution */
8295 scale_accel_offset(range, &delta, &offset);
8296
8297 /* Invert the accelerometer offset data */
8298 invert_accel_offset(&offset);
8299
8300 /* Write offset data in the offset compensation register */
8301 rslt = write_accel_offset(&offset, dev);
8302
8303 /* Enable offset compensation */
8304 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8305 {
8306 rslt = set_accel_offset_comp(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
8307 }
8308 }
8309
8310 return rslt;
8311}
8312
8317XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_accel_offset_comp(XBYTE offset_en, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8318{
8319 /* Variable to define error */
8320 XBYTESIG rslt;
8321
8322 /* Variable to store data */
8323 XBYTE data = 0;
8324
8325 /* Enable/Disable offset compensation */
8326 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_NV_CONF_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
8327 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8328 {
8329 data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data, BMI2_NV_ACC_OFFSET, offset_en);
8330 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_NV_CONF_ADDR, &data, 1, dev);
8331 }
8332
8333 return rslt;
8334}
8335
8340void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::map_accel_range(XBYTE range_in, XBYTE *range_out)
8341{
8342 switch (range_in)
8343 {
8344 case BMI2_ACC_RANGE_2G:
8345 *range_out = 2;
8346 break;
8347 case BMI2_ACC_RANGE_4G:
8348 *range_out = 4;
8349 break;
8350 case BMI2_ACC_RANGE_8G:
8351 *range_out = 8;
8352 break;
8353 case BMI2_ACC_RANGE_16G:
8354 *range_out = 16;
8355 break;
8356 default:
8357
8358 /* By default RANGE 8G is set */
8359 *range_out = 8;
8360 break;
8361 }
8362}
8363
8367void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::comp_for_gravity(XWORD lsb_per_g,
8368 const struct bmi2_accel_foc_g_value *g_val,
8369 const struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *data,
8370 struct bmi2_offset_delta *comp_data)
8371{
8372 /* Array to store the accelerometer values in LSB */
8373 XWORDSIG accel_value_lsb[3] = { 0 };
8374
8375 /* Convert g-value to LSB */
8376 accel_value_lsb[BMI2_X_AXIS] = (XWORDSIG)(lsb_per_g * g_val->x);
8377 accel_value_lsb[BMI2_Y_AXIS] = (XWORDSIG)(lsb_per_g * g_val->y);
8378 accel_value_lsb[BMI2_Z_AXIS] = (XWORDSIG)(lsb_per_g * g_val->z);
8379
8380 /* Get the compensated values for X, Y and Z axis */
8381 comp_data->x = (data->x - accel_value_lsb[BMI2_X_AXIS]);
8382 comp_data->y = (data->y - accel_value_lsb[BMI2_Y_AXIS]);
8383 comp_data->z = (data->z - accel_value_lsb[BMI2_Z_AXIS]);
8384}
8385
8393void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::scale_accel_offset(XBYTE range, const struct bmi2_offset_delta *comp_data, struct bmi2_accel_offset *data)
8394{
8395 /* Variable to store the position of bit having 3.9mg resolution */
8396 XBYTESIG bit_pos_3_9mg;
8397
8398 /* Variable to store the position previous of bit having 3.9mg resolution */
8399 XBYTESIG bit_pos_3_9mg_prev_bit;
8400
8401 /* Variable to store the round-off value */
8402 XBYTE round_off;
8403
8404 /* Find the bit position of 3.9mg */
8405 bit_pos_3_9mg = get_bit_pos_3_9mg(range);
8406
8407 /* Round off, consider if the next bit is high */
8408 bit_pos_3_9mg_prev_bit = bit_pos_3_9mg - 1;
8409 round_off = (XBYTE)(power(2, ((XBYTE) bit_pos_3_9mg_prev_bit)));
8410
8411 /* Scale according to offset register resolution */
8412 data->x = (XBYTE)((comp_data->x + round_off) / power(2, ((XBYTE) bit_pos_3_9mg)));
8413 data->y = (XBYTE)((comp_data->y + round_off) / power(2, ((XBYTE) bit_pos_3_9mg)));
8414 data->z = (XBYTE)((comp_data->z + round_off) / power(2, ((XBYTE) bit_pos_3_9mg)));
8415}
8416
8421XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_bit_pos_3_9mg(XBYTE range)
8422{
8423 /* Variable to store the bit position of 3.9mg resolution */
8424 XBYTESIG bit_pos_3_9mg;
8425
8426 /* Variable to shift the bits according to the resolution */
8427 XDWORD divisor = 1;
8428
8429 /* Scaling factor to get the bit position of 3.9 mg resolution */
8430 XWORDSIG scale_factor = -1;
8431
8432 /* Variable to store temporary value */
8433 XWORD temp;
8434
8435 /* Shift left by the times of resolution */
8436 divisor = divisor << 16;
8437
8438 /* Get the bit position to be shifted */
8439 temp = (XWORD)(divisor / (range * 256));
8440
8441 /* Get the scaling factor until bit position is shifted to last bit */
8442 while (temp != 1)
8443 {
8444 scale_factor++;
8445 temp = temp >> 1;
8446 }
8447
8448 /* Scaling factor is the bit position of 3.9 mg resolution */
8449 bit_pos_3_9mg = (XBYTESIG) scale_factor;
8450
8451 return bit_pos_3_9mg;
8452}
8453
8457void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::invert_accel_offset(struct bmi2_accel_offset *offset_data)
8458{
8459 /* Get the offset data */
8460 offset_data->x = (XBYTE)((offset_data->x) * (-1));
8461 offset_data->y = (XBYTE)((offset_data->y) * (-1));
8462 offset_data->z = (XBYTE)((offset_data->z) * (-1));
8463}
8464
8469XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::write_accel_offset(const struct bmi2_accel_offset *offset, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8470{
8471 /* Variable to define error */
8472 XBYTESIG rslt;
8473
8474 /* Array to store the offset data */
8475 XBYTE data_array[3] = { 0 };
8476
8477 data_array[0] = offset->x;
8478 data_array[1] = offset->y;
8479 data_array[2] = offset->z;
8480
8481 /* Offset values are written in the offset register */
8482 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_OFF_COMP_0_ADDR, data_array, 3, dev);
8483
8484 return rslt;
8485}
8486
8491XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::restore_accel_foc_config(struct bmi2_accel_config *acc_cfg,
8492 XBYTE aps,
8493 XBYTE acc_en,
8494 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8495{
8496 /* Variable to define error */
8497 XBYTESIG rslt;
8498
8499 /* Variable to get the status from PWR_CTRL register */
8500 XBYTE pwr_ctrl_data = 0;
8501
8502 /* Restore the saved accelerometer configurations */
8503 rslt = set_accel_config(acc_cfg, dev);
8504 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8505 {
8506 /* Restore the saved accelerometer enable status */
8507 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8508 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8509 {
8510 pwr_ctrl_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(pwr_ctrl_data, BMI2_ACC_EN, acc_en);
8511 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8512
8513 /* Restore the saved advance power save */
8514 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8515 {
8516 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(aps, dev);
8517 }
8518 }
8519 }
8520
8521 return rslt;
8522}
8523
8528XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_accel_config(struct bmi2_accel_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8529{
8530 /* Variable to define error */
8531 XBYTESIG rslt;
8532
8533 /* Variable to store data */
8534 XBYTE reg_data;
8535
8536 /* Array to store the default value of accelerometer configuration
8537 * reserved registers
8538 */
8539 XBYTE data_array[2] = { 0 };
8540
8541 /* Validate bandwidth and performance mode */
8542 rslt = validate_bw_perf_mode(&config->bwp, &config->filter_perf, dev);
8543 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8544 {
8545 /* Validate ODR and range */
8546 rslt = validate_odr_range(&config->odr, &config->range, dev);
8547 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8548 {
8549 /* Set accelerometer performance mode */
8550 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_ACC_FILTER_PERF_MODE, config->filter_perf);
8551
8552 /* Set accelerometer bandwidth */
8553 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_ACC_BW_PARAM, config->bwp);
8554
8555 /* Set accelerometer ODR */
8556 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_ACC_ODR, config->odr);
8557
8558 /* Copy the register data to the array */
8559 data_array[0] = reg_data;
8560
8561 /* Set accelerometer range */
8562 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(data_array[1], BMI2_ACC_RANGE, config->range);
8563
8564 /* Copy the register data to the array */
8565 data_array[1] = reg_data;
8566
8567 /* Write accelerometer configuration to ACC_CONFand
8568 * ACC_RANGE registers simultaneously as they lie in consecutive places
8569 */
8570 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_ACC_CONF_ADDR, data_array, 2, dev);
8571
8572 /* Get error status to check for invalid configurations */
8573 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8574 {
8575 rslt = cfg_error_status(dev);
8576 }
8577 }
8578 }
8579
8580 return rslt;
8581}
8582
8588XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_gyro_config(struct bmi2_gyro_config *config, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8589{
8590 /* Variable to define error */
8591 XBYTESIG rslt;
8592
8593 /* Variable to store data */
8594 XBYTE reg_data;
8595
8596 /* Array to store the default value of gyroscope configuration reserved registers */
8597 XBYTE data_array[2] = { 0 };
8598
8599 /* Validate gyroscope configurations */
8600 rslt = validate_gyro_config(config, dev);
8601 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8602 {
8603 /* Set gyroscope performance mode */
8604 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data_array[0], BMI2_GYR_FILTER_PERF_MODE, config->filter_perf);
8605
8606 /* Set gyroscope noise performance mode */
8607 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_NOISE_PERF_MODE, config->noise_perf);
8608
8609 /* Set gyroscope bandwidth */
8610 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_BW_PARAM, config->bwp);
8611
8612 /* Set gyroscope ODR */
8613 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_ODR, config->odr);
8614
8615 /* Copy the register data to the array */
8616 data_array[0] = reg_data;
8617
8618 /* Set gyroscope OIS range */
8619 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(data_array[1], BMI2_GYR_OIS_RANGE, config->ois_range);
8620
8621 /* Set gyroscope range */
8622 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_RANGE, config->range);
8623
8624 /* Copy the register data to the array */
8625 data_array[1] = reg_data;
8626
8627 /* Write accelerometer configuration to GYR_CONF and GYR_RANGE
8628 * registers simultaneously as they lie in consecutive places
8629 */
8630 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_GYR_CONF_ADDR, data_array, 2, dev);
8631
8632 /* Get error status to check for invalid configurations */
8633 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8634 {
8635 rslt = cfg_error_status(dev);
8636 }
8637 }
8638
8639 return rslt;
8640}
8641
8646XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::save_gyro_config(struct bmi2_gyro_config *gyr_cfg, XBYTE *aps, XBYTE *gyr_en, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8647{
8648 /* Variable to define error */
8649 XBYTESIG rslt;
8650
8651 /* Variable to get the status from PWR_CTRL register */
8652 XBYTE pwr_ctrl_data = 0;
8653
8654 /* Get gyroscope configurations to be saved */
8655 rslt = get_gyro_config(gyr_cfg, dev);
8656 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8657 {
8658 /* Get gyroscope enable status to be saved */
8659 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8660 *gyr_en = BMI2_GET_BITS(pwr_ctrl_data, BMI2_GYR_EN);
8661
8662 /* Get advance power save mode to be saved */
8663 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8664 {
8665 rslt = bmi2_get_adv_power_save(aps, dev);
8666 }
8667 }
8668
8669 return rslt;
8670}
8671
8675XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_gyro_foc_config(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8676{
8677 XBYTESIG rslt;
8678
8679 /* Variable to select the sensor */
8680 XBYTE sens_list = BMI2_GYRO;
8681
8682 /* Array to set the gyroscope configuration value (ODR, Performance mode
8683 * and bandwidth) and gyroscope range
8684 */
8685 XBYTE gyr_conf_data[2] = { BMI2_FOC_GYR_CONF_VAL, BMI2_GYR_RANGE_2000 };
8686
8687 /* Disabling gyroscope offset compensation */
8688 rslt = bmi2_set_gyro_offset_comp(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
8689 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8690 {
8691 /* Set gyroscope configurations to 25Hz, continuous mode,
8692 * CIC mode, and 2000 dps range
8693 */
8694 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_GYR_CONF_ADDR, gyr_conf_data, 2, dev);
8695 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8696 {
8697 /* Set gyroscope to normal mode by enabling it */
8698 rslt = bmi2_sensor_enable(&sens_list, 1, dev);
8699
8700 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8701 {
8702 /* Disable advance power save mode */
8703 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
8704 }
8705 }
8706 }
8707
8708 return rslt;
8709}
8710
8714void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::invert_gyro_offset(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *offset_data)
8715{
8716 /* Invert the values */
8717 offset_data->x = (XWORDSIG)((offset_data->x) * (-1));
8718 offset_data->y = (XWORDSIG)((offset_data->y) * (-1));
8719 offset_data->z = (XWORDSIG)((offset_data->z) * (-1));
8720}
8721
8726XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::restore_gyro_config(struct bmi2_gyro_config *gyr_cfg, XBYTE aps, XBYTE gyr_en, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8727{
8728 XBYTESIG rslt;
8729 XBYTE pwr_ctrl_data = 0;
8730
8731 /* Restore the saved gyroscope configurations */
8732 rslt = set_gyro_config(gyr_cfg, dev);
8733 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8734 {
8735 /* Restore the saved gyroscope enable status */
8736 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8737 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8738 {
8739 pwr_ctrl_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(pwr_ctrl_data, BMI2_GYR_EN, gyr_en);
8740 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &pwr_ctrl_data, 1, dev);
8741
8742 /* Restore the saved advance power save */
8743 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8744 {
8745 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(aps, dev);
8746 }
8747 }
8748 }
8749
8750 return rslt;
8751}
8752
8757void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::saturate_gyro_data(struct bmi2_sens_axes_data *gyr_off)
8758{
8759 if(gyr_off->x > 511)
8760 {
8761 gyr_off->x = 511;
8762 }
8763
8764 if(gyr_off->x < -512)
8765 {
8766 gyr_off->x = -512;
8767 }
8768
8769 if(gyr_off->y > 511)
8770 {
8771 gyr_off->y = 511;
8772 }
8773
8774 if(gyr_off->y < -512)
8775 {
8776 gyr_off->y = -512;
8777 }
8778
8779 if(gyr_off->z > 511)
8780 {
8781 gyr_off->z = 511;
8782 }
8783
8784 if(gyr_off->z < -512)
8785 {
8786 gyr_off->z = -512;
8787 }
8788}
8789
8794XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::null_ptr_check(const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8795{
8796 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
8797
8798 if((dev == NULL) /*|| (dev->read == NULL) || (dev->write == NULL) || (dev->delay_us == NULL)*/)
8799 {
8800 /* Device structure pointer is not valid */
8801 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
8802 }
8803
8804 return rslt;
8805}
8806
8810XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_st_running(XBYTE *st_status, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8811{
8812 XBYTESIG rslt;
8813 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
8814
8815 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
8816 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8817 {
8818 /* Get the status of crt running */
8819 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_CRT_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
8820 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8821 {
8822 (*st_status) = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_CRT_RUNNING);
8823 }
8824 }
8825 else
8826 {
8827 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
8828 }
8829
8830 return rslt;
8831}
8832
8836XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_st_running(XBYTE st_status, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8837{
8838 XBYTESIG rslt;
8839 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
8840
8841 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
8842 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8843 {
8844 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_CRT_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
8845 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8846 {
8847 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_CRT_RUNNING, st_status);
8848 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_GYR_CRT_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
8849 }
8850 }
8851
8852 return rslt;
8853}
8854
8858XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_rdy_for_dl(XBYTE *rdy_for_dl, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8859{
8860 XBYTESIG rslt;
8861 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
8862
8863 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
8864 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8865 {
8866 /* Get the status of rdy_fo_dl */
8867 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_CRT_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
8868 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8869 {
8870 (*rdy_for_dl) = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_RDY_FOR_DL);
8871 }
8872 }
8873 else
8874 {
8875 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
8876 }
8877
8878 return rslt;
8879}
8880
8884XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::process_crt_download(XBYTE last_byte_flag, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8885{
8886 XBYTESIG rslt;
8887 XBYTE rdy_for_dl = 0;
8888 XBYTE cmd = BMI2_G_TRIGGER_CMD;
8889
8890 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
8891 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8892 {
8893 rslt = get_rdy_for_dl(&rdy_for_dl, dev);
8894 }
8895
8896 /* Trigger next CRT command */
8897 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8898 {
8899 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_CMD_REG_ADDR, &cmd, 1, dev);
8900 }
8901
8902 if((!last_byte_flag) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
8903 {
8904 rslt = wait_rdy_for_dl_toggle(BMI2_CRT_READY_FOR_DOWNLOAD_RETRY, rdy_for_dl, dev);
8905 }
8906
8907 return rslt;
8908}
8909
8913XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::write_crt_config_file(XWORD write_len,
8914 XWORD config_file_size,
8915 XWORD start_index,
8916 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8917{
8918 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
8919 XWORD index = 0;
8920 XBYTE last_byte_flag = 0;
8921 XBYTE remain = (XBYTE)(config_file_size % write_len);
8922 XWORD balance_byte = 0;
8923
8924 if(!remain)
8925 {
8926
8927 /* Write the configuration file */
8928 for (index = start_index;
8929 (index < (start_index + config_file_size)) && (rslt == BMI2_OK);
8930 index += write_len)
8931 {
8932 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, write_len, dev);
8933 if(index >= ((start_index + config_file_size) - (write_len)))
8934 {
8935 last_byte_flag = 1;
8936 }
8937
8938 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8939 {
8940 rslt = process_crt_download(last_byte_flag, dev);
8941 }
8942 }
8943 }
8944 else
8945 {
8946 /* Get the balance bytes */
8947 balance_byte = (XWORD)start_index + (XWORD)config_file_size - (XWORD)remain;
8948
8949 /* Write the configuration file for the balance bytes */
8950 for (index = start_index; (index < balance_byte) && (rslt == BMI2_OK); index += write_len)
8951 {
8952 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, write_len, dev);
8953 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8954 {
8955 rslt = process_crt_download(last_byte_flag, dev);
8956 }
8957 }
8958
8959 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8960 {
8961 /* Write the remaining bytes in 2 bytes length */
8962 write_len = 2;
8963 rslt = set_maxburst_len(write_len, dev);
8964
8965 /* Write the configuration file for the remaining bytes */
8966 for (index = balance_byte;
8967 (index < (start_index + config_file_size)) && (rslt == BMI2_OK);
8968 index += write_len)
8969 {
8970 rslt = upload_file((dev->config_file_ptr + index), index, write_len, dev);
8971 if(index < ((start_index + config_file_size) - write_len))
8972 {
8973 last_byte_flag = 1;
8974 }
8975
8976 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
8977 {
8978 rslt = process_crt_download(last_byte_flag, dev);
8979 }
8980 }
8981 }
8982 }
8983
8984 return rslt;
8985}
8986
8990XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::wait_rdy_for_dl_toggle(XBYTE retry_complete, XBYTE download_ready, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
8991{
8992 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
8993 XBYTE dl_ready = 0;
8994 XBYTE st_status = 0;
8995
8996 while ((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (retry_complete--))
8997 {
8998 rslt = get_rdy_for_dl(&dl_ready, dev);
8999 if(download_ready != dl_ready)
9000 {
9001 break;
9002 }
9003
9004 bmi2_delay_us(BMI2_CRT_READY_FOR_DOWNLOAD_US, dev->intf_ptr);
9005 }
9006
9007 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (download_ready == dl_ready))
9008 {
9009 rslt = BMI2_E_CRT_READY_FOR_DL_FAIL_ABORT;
9010 }
9011
9012 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9013 {
9014 rslt = get_st_running(&st_status, dev);
9015 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (st_status == 0))
9016 {
9017 rslt = BMI2_E_ST_ALREADY_RUNNING;
9018 }
9019 }
9020
9021 return rslt;
9022}
9023
9027XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::wait_st_running(XBYTE retry_complete, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9028{
9029 XBYTE st_status = 1;
9030 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9031
9032 while (retry_complete--)
9033 {
9034 rslt = get_st_running(&st_status, dev);
9035 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (st_status == 0))
9036 {
9037 break;
9038 }
9039
9040 bmi2_delay_us(BMI2_CRT_WAIT_RUNNING_US, dev->intf_ptr);
9041 }
9042
9043 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (st_status == 1))
9044 {
9045 rslt = BMI2_E_ST_ALREADY_RUNNING;
9046 }
9047
9048 return rslt;
9049}
9050
9054XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_do_gyro_st(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9055{
9056 XBYTESIG rslt;
9057
9058 rslt = do_gtrigger_test(BMI2_SELECT_GYRO_SELF_TEST, dev);
9059
9060 return rslt;
9061}
9062
9066XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_do_crt(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9067{
9068 XBYTESIG rslt;
9069
9070 rslt = do_gtrigger_test(BMI2_SELECT_CRT, dev);
9071
9072 return rslt;
9073}
9074
9078XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::do_gtrigger_test(XBYTE gyro_st_crt, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9079{
9080 XBYTESIG rslt;
9081 XBYTESIG rslt_crt = BMI2_OK;
9082 XBYTE st_status = 0;
9083 XBYTE max_burst_length = 0;
9084 XBYTE download_ready = 0;
9085 XBYTE cmd = BMI2_G_TRIGGER_CMD;
9086 struct bmi2_gyro_self_test_status gyro_st_result = { 0 };
9087
9088 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
9089 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
9090
9091 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
9092 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9093 {
9094 /* Check if the variant supports this feature */
9095 if(dev->variant_feature & BMI2_CRT_RTOSK_ENABLE)
9096 {
9097 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
9098 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
9099 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
9100 {
9101 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
9102 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9103 }
9104
9105 /* Get max burst length */
9106 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9107 {
9108 rslt = get_maxburst_len(&max_burst_length, dev);
9109 }
9110
9111 /* Checking for CRT running status */
9112 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9113 {
9114 rslt = get_st_running(&st_status, dev);
9115 }
9116
9117 /* CRT is not running and Max burst length is zero */
9118 if(st_status == 0)
9119 {
9120 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9121 {
9122 rslt = set_st_running(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9123 }
9124
9125 /* Preparing the setup */
9126 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9127 {
9128 rslt = crt_prepare_setup(dev);
9129 }
9130
9131 /* Enable the gyro self-test, CRT */
9132 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9133 {
9134 rslt = select_self_test(gyro_st_crt, dev);
9135 }
9136
9137 /* Check if FIFO is unchanged by checking the max burst length */
9138 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (max_burst_length == 0))
9139 {
9140 /* Trigger CRT */
9141 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_CMD_REG_ADDR, &cmd, 1, dev);
9142 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9143 {
9144 /* Wait until st_status = 0 or time out is 2 seconds */
9145 rslt = wait_st_running(BMI2_CRT_WAIT_RUNNING_RETRY_EXECUTION, dev);
9146
9147 /* CRT Running wait & check is successful */
9148 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9149 {
9150 rslt = crt_gyro_st_update_result(dev);
9151 }
9152 }
9153 }
9154 else
9155 {
9156 /* FIFO may be used */
9157 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9158 {
9159 if(dev->read_write_len < 2)
9160 {
9161 dev->read_write_len = 2;
9162 }
9163
9164 if(dev->read_write_len > (BMI2_CRT_MAX_BURST_WORD_LENGTH * 2))
9165 {
9166 dev->read_write_len = BMI2_CRT_MAX_BURST_WORD_LENGTH * 2;
9167 }
9168
9169 /* Reset the max burst length to default value */
9170 rslt = set_maxburst_len(dev->read_write_len, dev);
9171 }
9172
9173 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9174 {
9175 rslt = get_rdy_for_dl(&download_ready, dev);
9176 }
9177
9178 /* Trigger CRT */
9179 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9180 {
9181 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_CMD_REG_ADDR, &cmd, 1, dev);
9182 }
9183
9184 /* Wait till either ready for download toggle or crt running = 0 */
9185 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9186 {
9187 rslt = wait_rdy_for_dl_toggle(BMI2_CRT_READY_FOR_DOWNLOAD_RETRY, download_ready, dev);
9188 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9189 {
9190 rslt = write_crt_config_file(dev->read_write_len, BMI2_CRT_CONFIG_FILE_SIZE, 0x1800, dev);
9191 }
9192
9193 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9194 {
9195 rslt = wait_st_running(BMI2_CRT_WAIT_RUNNING_RETRY_EXECUTION, dev);
9196 rslt_crt = crt_gyro_st_update_result(dev);
9197 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9198 {
9199 rslt = rslt_crt;
9200 }
9201 }
9202 }
9203 }
9204 }
9205 else
9206 {
9207 rslt = BMI2_E_ST_ALREADY_RUNNING;
9208 }
9209
9210 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9211 {
9212 if(gyro_st_crt == BMI2_SELECT_GYRO_SELF_TEST)
9213 {
9214 rslt = gyro_self_test_completed(&gyro_st_result, dev);
9215 }
9216 }
9217
9218 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
9219 * not when already disabled
9220 */
9221 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
9222 {
9223 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9224 }
9225 }
9226 }
9227
9228 return rslt;
9229}
9230
9234XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::crt_prepare_setup(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9235{
9236 XBYTESIG rslt;
9237
9238 /* Variable to select the sensor */
9239 XBYTE sens_list = BMI2_GYRO;
9240
9241 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
9242
9243 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9244 {
9245 /* Disable gyroscope */
9246 rslt = bmi2_sensor_disable(&sens_list, 1, dev);
9247 }
9248
9249 /* Disable FIFO for all sensors */
9250 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9251 {
9252 rslt = bmi2_set_fifo_config(BMI2_FIFO_ALL_EN, BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9253 }
9254
9255 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9256 {
9257 /* Enable accelerometer */
9258 sens_list = BMI2_ACCEL;
9259 rslt = bmi2_sensor_enable(&sens_list, 1, dev);
9260 }
9261
9262 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9263 {
9264 /* Disable Abort after 1 msec */
9265 bmi2_delay_us(1000, dev->intf_ptr);
9266 rslt = abort_bmi2(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9267 }
9268
9269 return rslt;
9270}
9271
9275XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::crt_gyro_st_update_result(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9276{
9277 XBYTESIG rslt;
9278 struct bmi2_gyr_user_gain_status user_gain_stat = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
9279
9280 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
9281
9282 /* CRT status has to be read from the config register map */
9283 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9284 {
9285 rslt = get_gyro_gain_update_status(&user_gain_stat, dev);
9286 }
9287
9288 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9289 {
9290 switch (user_gain_stat.g_trigger_status)
9291 {
9292 case BMI2_G_TRIGGER_NO_ERROR:
9293
9294 /* CRT is successful - Reset the Max Burst Length */
9295 rslt = set_maxburst_len(0, dev);
9296 break;
9297
9298 case BMI2_G_TRIGGER_DL_ERROR:
9299
9300 /* CRT is Download Error - Keep non zero value for Max Burst Length */
9301 rslt = set_maxburst_len(dev->read_write_len, dev);
9302 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9303 {
9304 rslt = BMI2_E_DL_ERROR;
9305 }
9306
9307 break;
9308 case BMI2_G_TRIGGER_ABORT_ERROR:
9309
9310 /* Command is aborted either by host via the block bit or due to motion
9311 * detection. Keep non zero value for Max Burst Length
9312 */
9313 rslt = set_maxburst_len(dev->read_write_len, dev);
9314 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9315 {
9316 rslt = BMI2_E_ABORT_ERROR;
9317 }
9318
9319 break;
9320
9321 case BMI2_G_TRIGGER_PRECON_ERROR:
9322
9323 /* Pre-condition to start the feature was not completed. */
9324 rslt = BMI2_E_PRECON_ERROR;
9325 break;
9326
9327 default:
9328 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_STATUS;
9329
9330 break;
9331 }
9332 }
9333
9334 return rslt;
9335}
9336
9340 XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_maxburst_len(XBYTE *max_burst_len, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9341{
9342 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9343 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
9344 XBYTE idx = 0;
9345 XBYTE feat_found = 0;
9346 struct bmi2_feature_config maxburst_length_bytes = { 0, 0, 0 };
9347 XBYTE aps_stat;
9348
9349 if((dev->variant_feature & BMI2_CRT_IN_FIFO_NOT_REQ) != 0)
9350 {
9351 *max_burst_len = 0;
9352
9353 return BMI2_OK;
9354 }
9355
9356 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
9357 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
9358 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
9359 {
9360 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
9361 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9362 }
9363
9364 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9365 {
9366 /* Search for max burst length */
9367 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&maxburst_length_bytes, BMI2_MAX_BURST_LEN, dev);
9368 if(feat_found)
9369 {
9370 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(maxburst_length_bytes.page, feat_config, dev);
9371 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9372 {
9373 /* Define the offset for max burst length */
9374 idx = maxburst_length_bytes.start_addr;
9375
9376 /* Get the max burst length */
9377 *max_burst_len = feat_config[idx];
9378 }
9379 }
9380 else
9381 {
9382 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
9383 }
9384
9385 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
9386 * not when already disabled
9387 */
9388 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
9389 {
9390 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9391 }
9392 }
9393
9394 return rslt;
9395}
9396
9400XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_maxburst_len(const XWORD write_len_byte, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9401{
9402 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9403 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
9404 XBYTE idx = 0;
9405 XBYTE reg_addr = 0;
9406 XBYTE max_burst_len = 0;
9407 XBYTE feat_found = 0;
9408 struct bmi2_feature_config maxburst_length_bytes = { 0, 0, 0 };
9409 XBYTE aps_stat;
9410 XWORD burst_len = write_len_byte / 2;
9411
9412 /* for variant that support crt outside fifo, do not modify the max burst len */
9413 if((dev->variant_feature & BMI2_CRT_IN_FIFO_NOT_REQ) != 0)
9414 {
9415 return BMI2_OK;
9416 }
9417
9418 /* Max burst length is only 1 byte */
9419 if(burst_len > BMI2_CRT_MAX_BURST_WORD_LENGTH)
9420 {
9421 max_burst_len = UINT8_C(0xFF);
9422 }
9423 else
9424 {
9425 max_burst_len = (XBYTE)burst_len;
9426 }
9427
9428 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
9429 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
9430 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
9431 {
9432 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
9433 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9434 }
9435
9436 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9437 {
9438 /* Search for axis-re-mapping and extract its configuration details */
9439 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&maxburst_length_bytes, BMI2_MAX_BURST_LEN, dev);
9440 if(feat_found)
9441 {
9442 /* Get the configuration from the page where axis
9443 * re-mapping feature resides
9444 */
9445 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(maxburst_length_bytes.page, feat_config, dev);
9446 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9447 {
9448 /* Define the offset in bytes */
9449 idx = maxburst_length_bytes.start_addr;
9450
9451 /* update Max burst length */
9452 feat_config[idx] = max_burst_len;
9453
9454 /* Update the register address */
9455 reg_addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR + maxburst_length_bytes.start_addr;
9456
9457 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
9458 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &feat_config[maxburst_length_bytes.start_addr], 2, dev);
9459 }
9460 }
9461 else
9462 {
9463 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
9464 }
9465
9466 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
9467 * not when already disabled
9468 */
9469 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
9470 {
9471 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9472 }
9473 }
9474
9475 return rslt;
9476}
9477
9481XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_nvm_prep_prog(XBYTE nvm_prep, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9482{
9483 /* Variable to define error */
9484 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9485
9486 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
9487 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
9488
9489 /* Variable to define the array offset */
9490 XBYTE idx = 0;
9491
9492 /* Variable to set flag */
9493 XBYTE feat_found;
9494 XBYTE reg_addr = 0;
9495
9496 /* Initialize feature configuration for nvm preparation*/
9497 struct bmi2_feature_config nvm_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
9498
9499 /* Search for bmi2 gyro self offset correction feature as nvm program preparation feature is
9500 * present in the same Word and extract its configuration details
9501 */
9502 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&nvm_config, BMI2_NVM_PROG_PREP, dev);
9503 if(feat_found)
9504 {
9505 /* Get the configuration from the page where nvm preparation feature enable feature
9506 * resides */
9507 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(nvm_config.page, feat_config, dev);
9508 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9509 {
9510 /* Define the offset for nvm preparation feature enable */
9511 idx = nvm_config.start_addr;
9512
9513 /* update nvm_prog_prep enable bit */
9514 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_NVM_PREP_FEATURE_EN, nvm_prep);
9515
9516 /* Update the register address */
9517 reg_addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR + nvm_config.start_addr - 1;
9518
9519 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
9520 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &feat_config[nvm_config.start_addr - 1], 2, dev);
9521 }
9522 }
9523 else
9524 {
9525 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
9526 }
9527
9528 return rslt;
9529}
9530
9534XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::select_self_test(XBYTE gyro_st_crt, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9535{
9536 XBYTESIG rslt;
9537
9538 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
9539
9540 XBYTE idx = 0;
9541
9542 XBYTE feat_found;
9543 XBYTE reg_addr = 0;
9544
9545 struct bmi2_feature_config gyro_self_test_crt_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
9546
9547 /* Search for bmi2 crt gyro self-test feature and extract its configuration details */
9548 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&gyro_self_test_crt_config, BMI2_CRT_GYRO_SELF_TEST, dev);
9549 if(feat_found)
9550 {
9551 /* Get the configuration from the page where gyro self-test and crt enable feature
9552 * resides */
9553 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(gyro_self_test_crt_config.page, feat_config, dev);
9554 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9555 {
9556 /* Define the offset in bytes */
9557 idx = gyro_self_test_crt_config.start_addr;
9558
9559 /* update the gyro self-test crt enable bit */
9560 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYRO_SELF_TEST_CRT_EN, gyro_st_crt);
9561
9562 /* Update the register address */
9563 reg_addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR + (gyro_self_test_crt_config.start_addr - 1);
9564
9565 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
9566 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &feat_config[gyro_self_test_crt_config.start_addr - 1], 2, dev);
9567 }
9568 }
9569 else
9570 {
9571 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
9572 }
9573
9574 return rslt;
9575}
9576
9580XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_abort_crt_gyro_st(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9581{
9582 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9583 XBYTE aps_stat;
9584 XBYTE st_running = 0;
9585 XBYTE cmd = BMI2_G_TRIGGER_CMD;
9586
9587 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
9588 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
9589 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
9590 {
9591 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
9592 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9593 }
9594
9595 /* Checking for ST running status */
9596 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9597 {
9598 rslt = get_st_running(&st_running, dev);
9599 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9600 {
9601 /* ST is not running */
9602 if(st_running == 0)
9603 {
9604 rslt = BMI2_E_ST_NOT_RUNING;
9605 }
9606 }
9607 }
9608
9609 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9610 {
9611 rslt = abort_bmi2(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9612 }
9613
9614 /* send the g trigger command */
9615 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9616 {
9617 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_CMD_REG_ADDR, &cmd, 1, dev);
9618 }
9619
9620 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9621 {
9622 /* wait until st_status = 0 or time out is 2 seconds */
9623 rslt = wait_st_running(BMI2_CRT_WAIT_RUNNING_RETRY_EXECUTION, dev);
9624 }
9625
9626 /* Check G trigger status for error */
9627 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9628 {
9629 rslt = crt_gyro_st_update_result(dev);
9630 if(rslt == BMI2_E_ABORT_ERROR)
9631 {
9632 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9633 }
9634 else
9635 {
9636 rslt = BMI2_E_ABORT_ERROR;
9637 }
9638 }
9639
9640 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
9641 * not when already disabled
9642 */
9643 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
9644 {
9645 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9646 }
9647
9648 return rslt;
9649}
9650
9654XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::abort_bmi2(XBYTE abort_enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9655{
9656 /* Variable to define error */
9657 XBYTESIG rslt;
9658
9659 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
9660 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
9661
9662 /* Variable to define the array offset */
9663 XBYTE idx = 0;
9664
9665 /* Variable to set flag */
9666 XBYTE feat_found;
9667 XBYTE reg_addr = 0;
9668
9669 /* Initialize feature configuration for blocking a feature */
9670 struct bmi2_feature_config block_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
9671
9672 /* Search for bmi2 Abort feature and extract its configuration details */
9673 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&block_config, BMI2_ABORT_CRT_GYRO_SELF_TEST, dev);
9674 if(feat_found)
9675 {
9676 /* Get the configuration from the page where abort(block) feature resides */
9677 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(block_config.page, feat_config, dev);
9678 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9679 {
9680 /* Define the offset in bytes */
9681 idx = block_config.start_addr;
9682
9683 /* update the gyro self-test crt abort enable bit */
9684 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_ABORT_FEATURE_EN, abort_enable);
9685
9686 /* Update the register address */
9687 reg_addr = BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR + (block_config.start_addr - 1);
9688
9689 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
9690 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(reg_addr, &feat_config[block_config.start_addr - 1], 2, dev);
9691 }
9692 }
9693 else
9694 {
9695 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
9696 }
9697
9698 return rslt;
9699}
9700
9705XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::gyro_self_test_completed(struct bmi2_gyro_self_test_status *gyro_st_result, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9706{
9707 XBYTESIG rslt;
9708 XBYTE reg_data;
9709
9710 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_SELF_TEST_AXES_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
9711 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9712 {
9713 gyro_st_result->gyr_st_axes_done = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_ST_AXES_DONE);
9714 if(gyro_st_result->gyr_st_axes_done == 0x01)
9715 {
9716 gyro_st_result->gyr_axis_x_ok = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_AXIS_X_OK);
9717 gyro_st_result->gyr_axis_y_ok = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_AXIS_Y_OK);
9718 gyro_st_result->gyr_axis_z_ok = BMI2_GET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_AXIS_Z_OK);
9719 }
9720 else
9721 {
9722 rslt = BMI2_E_SELF_TEST_NOT_DONE;
9723 }
9724 }
9725
9726 return rslt;
9727}
9728
9732XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_foc_position(XBYTE sens_list,
9733 const struct bmi2_accel_foc_g_value *accel_g_axis,
9734 struct bmi2_sens_axes_data avg_foc_data,
9735 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9736{
9737 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_INPUT;
9738
9739 if(sens_list == BMI2_ACCEL)
9740 {
9741 if(accel_g_axis->x == 1)
9742 {
9743 rslt = validate_foc_accel_axis(avg_foc_data.x, dev);
9744 }
9745 else if(accel_g_axis->y == 1)
9746 {
9747 rslt = validate_foc_accel_axis(avg_foc_data.y, dev);
9748 }
9749 else
9750 {
9751 rslt = validate_foc_accel_axis(avg_foc_data.z, dev);
9752 }
9753 }
9754 else if(sens_list == BMI2_GYRO)
9755 {
9756 if(((avg_foc_data.x >= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_NEGATIVE) &&
9757 (avg_foc_data.x <= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_POSITIVE)) &&
9758 ((avg_foc_data.y >= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_NEGATIVE) &&
9759 (avg_foc_data.y <= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_POSITIVE)) &&
9760 ((avg_foc_data.z >= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_NEGATIVE) &&
9761 (avg_foc_data.z <= BMI2_GYRO_FOC_NOISE_LIMIT_POSITIVE)))
9762 {
9763 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9764 }
9765 else
9766 {
9767 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_FOC_POSITION;
9768 }
9769 }
9770
9771 return rslt;
9772}
9773
9777XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::validate_foc_accel_axis(XWORDSIG avg_foc_data, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9778{
9779 struct bmi2_sens_config sens_cfg = { 0 };
9780 XBYTE range;
9781 XBYTESIG rslt;
9782
9783 sens_cfg.type = BMI2_ACCEL;
9784 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_config(&sens_cfg, 1, dev);
9785 range = sens_cfg.cfg.acc.range;
9786
9787 /* reference LSB value of 16G */
9788 if((range == BMI2_ACC_RANGE_2G) && (avg_foc_data > BMI2_ACC_2G_MIN_NOISE_LIMIT) &&
9789 (avg_foc_data < BMI2_ACC_2G_MAX_NOISE_LIMIT))
9790 {
9791 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9792 }
9793 /* reference LSB value of 16G */
9794 else if((range == BMI2_ACC_RANGE_4G) && (avg_foc_data > BMI2_ACC_4G_MIN_NOISE_LIMIT) &&
9795 (avg_foc_data < BMI2_ACC_4G_MAX_NOISE_LIMIT))
9796 {
9797 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9798 }
9799 /* reference LSB value of 16G */
9800 else if((range == BMI2_ACC_RANGE_8G) && (avg_foc_data > BMI2_ACC_8G_MIN_NOISE_LIMIT) &&
9801 (avg_foc_data < BMI2_ACC_8G_MAX_NOISE_LIMIT))
9802 {
9803 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9804 }
9805 /* reference LSB value of 16G */
9806 else if((range == BMI2_ACC_RANGE_16G) && (avg_foc_data > BMI2_ACC_16G_MIN_NOISE_LIMIT) &&
9807 (avg_foc_data < BMI2_ACC_16G_MAX_NOISE_LIMIT))
9808 {
9809 rslt = BMI2_OK;
9810 }
9811 else
9812 {
9813 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_FOC_POSITION;
9814 }
9815
9816 return rslt;
9817}
9818
9820XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi2_nvm_prog(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9821{
9822 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9823
9824 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
9825 XBYTE aps_stat;
9826 XBYTE status;
9827 XBYTE cmd_rdy;
9828 XBYTE reg_data;
9829 XBYTE write_timeout = 100;
9830
9831 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
9832 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
9833 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
9834 {
9835 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
9836 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
9837 }
9838
9839 /* Check the Write status and proceed only if there is no ongoing write cycle */
9840 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9841 {
9842 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&status, dev);
9843
9844 cmd_rdy = BMI2_GET_BITS(status, BMI2_CMD_RDY);
9845 if(cmd_rdy)
9846 {
9847 rslt = set_nvm_prep_prog(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9848 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9849 {
9850 bmi2_delay_us(40000, dev->intf_ptr);
9851
9852 /* Set the NVM_CONF.nvm_prog_en bit in order to enable the NVM
9853 * programming */
9854 reg_data = BMI2_NVM_UNLOCK_ENABLE;
9855 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_NVM_CONF_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
9856 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9857 {
9858 /* Send NVM prog command to command register */
9859 reg_data = BMI2_NVM_PROG_CMD;
9860 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_CMD_REG_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
9861 }
9862
9863 /* Wait till write operation is completed */
9864 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9865 {
9866 while (write_timeout--)
9867 {
9868 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&status, dev);
9869 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9870 {
9871 cmd_rdy = BMI2_GET_BITS(status, BMI2_CMD_RDY);
9872
9873 /* Nvm is complete once cmd_rdy is 1, break if 1 */
9874 if(cmd_rdy)
9875 {
9876 break;
9877 }
9878
9879 /* Wait till cmd_rdy becomes 1 indicating
9880 * nvm process completes */
9881 bmi2_delay_us(20000, dev->intf_ptr);
9882 }
9883 }
9884 }
9885
9886 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (cmd_rdy != BMI2_TRUE))
9887 {
9888 rslt = BMI2_E_WRITE_CYCLE_ONGOING;
9889 }
9890 }
9891 }
9892 else
9893 {
9894 rslt = BMI2_E_WRITE_CYCLE_ONGOING;
9895 }
9896 }
9897
9898 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9899 {
9900 /* perform soft reset */
9901 rslt = bmi2_soft_reset(dev);
9902 }
9903
9904 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and not when already disabled */
9905 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
9906 {
9907 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
9908 }
9909
9910 return rslt;
9911}
9912
9917XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_average_of_sensor_data(XBYTE sens_list,
9918 struct bmi2_foc_temp_value *temp_foc_data,
9919 struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9920{
9921 XBYTESIG rslt = 0;
9922 struct bmi2_sensor_data sensor_data = { 0 };
9923 XBYTE sample_count = 0;
9924 XBYTE datardy_try_cnt;
9925 XBYTE drdy_status = 0;
9926 XBYTE sensor_drdy = 0;
9927
9928 sensor_data.type = sens_list;
9929 if(sens_list == BMI2_ACCEL)
9930 {
9931 sensor_drdy = BMI2_DRDY_ACC;
9932 }
9933 else
9934 {
9935 sensor_drdy = BMI2_DRDY_GYR;
9936 }
9937
9938 /* Read sensor values before FOC */
9939 while (sample_count < BMI2_FOC_SAMPLE_LIMIT)
9940 {
9941 datardy_try_cnt = 5;
9942 do
9943 {
9944 bmi2_delay_us(20000, dev->intf_ptr);
9945 rslt = bmi2_get_status(&drdy_status, dev);
9946 datardy_try_cnt--;
9947 } while ((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (!(drdy_status & sensor_drdy)) && (datardy_try_cnt));
9948
9949 if((rslt != BMI2_OK) || (datardy_try_cnt == 0))
9950 {
9951 rslt = BMI2_E_DATA_RDY_INT_FAILED;
9952 break;
9953 }
9954
9955 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_data(&sensor_data, 1, dev);
9956
9957 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9958 {
9959 if(sensor_data.type == BMI2_ACCEL)
9960 {
9961 temp_foc_data->x += sensor_data.sens_data.acc.x;
9962 temp_foc_data->y += sensor_data.sens_data.acc.y;
9963 temp_foc_data->z += sensor_data.sens_data.acc.z;
9964 }
9965 else if(sensor_data.type == BMI2_GYRO)
9966 {
9967 temp_foc_data->x += sensor_data.sens_data.gyr.x;
9968 temp_foc_data->y += sensor_data.sens_data.gyr.y;
9969 temp_foc_data->z += sensor_data.sens_data.gyr.z;
9970 }
9971 }
9972 else
9973 {
9974 break;
9975 }
9976
9977 sample_count++;
9978 }
9979
9980 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
9981 {
9982 temp_foc_data->x = (temp_foc_data->x / BMI2_FOC_SAMPLE_LIMIT);
9983 temp_foc_data->y = (temp_foc_data->y / BMI2_FOC_SAMPLE_LIMIT);
9984 temp_foc_data->z = (temp_foc_data->z / BMI2_FOC_SAMPLE_LIMIT);
9985 }
9986
9987 return rslt;
9988}
9989
9994XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_config_file(XBYTE *config_major, XBYTE *config_minor, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
9995{
9996 /* Variable to define the result */
9997 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
9998
9999 /* Variable to define the array offset */
10000 XBYTE idx = 0;
10001
10002 /* Variable to define LSB */
10003 XWORD lsb = 0;
10004
10005 /* Variable to define MSB */
10006 XWORD msb = 0;
10007
10008 /* Variable to define a word */
10009 XWORD lsb_msb = 0;
10010
10011 /* Variable to set flag */
10012 XBYTE feat_found;
10013
10014 /* Variable to define advance power save mode status */
10015 XBYTE aps_stat;
10016
10017 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
10018 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
10019
10020 /* Initialize feature configuration for config file identification */
10021 struct bmi2_feature_config config_id = { 0, 0, 0 };
10022
10023 /* Check the power mode status */
10024 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
10025 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
10026 {
10027 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
10028 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
10029 }
10030
10031 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10032 {
10033 /* Search for config file identification feature and extract its configuration
10034 * details */
10035 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&config_id, BMI2_CONFIG_ID, dev);
10036 if(feat_found)
10037 {
10038 /* Get the configuration from the page where config file identification
10039 * feature resides */
10040 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(config_id.page, feat_config, dev);
10041 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10042 {
10043 /* Define the offset for config file identification */
10044 idx = config_id.start_addr;
10045
10046 /* Get word to calculate config file identification */
10047 lsb = (XWORD) feat_config[idx++];
10048 msb = ((XWORD) feat_config[idx++] << 8);
10049 lsb_msb = lsb | msb;
10050
10051 /* Get major and minor version */
