10052 *config_major = BMI2_GET_BITS(lsb_msb, BMI2_CONFIG_MAJOR);
10053 *config_minor = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(lsb, BMI2_CONFIG_MINOR);
10054 }
10055 }
10056
10057 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
10058 * not when already disabled
10059 */
10060 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
10061 {
10062 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
10063 }
10064 }
10065 else
10066 {
10067 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10068 }
10069
10070 return rslt;
10071}
10072
10076void DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_feat_int_map(struct bmi2_map_int *map_int, XBYTE type, const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10077{
10078 /* Variable to define loop */
10079 XBYTE loop = 0;
10080
10081 /* Search for the interrupts from the input configuration array */
10082 while (loop < dev->sens_int_map)
10083 {
10084 if(dev->map_int[loop].type == type)
10085 {
10086 *map_int = dev->map_int[loop];
10087 break;
10088 }
10089
10090 loop++;
10091 }
10092}
10093
10098XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_gyro_gain_update_status(struct bmi2_gyr_user_gain_status *user_gain_stat, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10099{
10100 /* Variable to define error */
10101 XBYTESIG rslt;
10102
10103 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
10104 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
10105
10106 /* Variables to define index */
10107 XBYTE idx = 0;
10108
10109 /* Variable to set flag */
10110 XBYTE feat_found;
10111
10112 /* Initialize feature output for gyroscope user gain status */
10113 struct bmi2_feature_config user_gain_cfg = { 0, 0, 0 };
10114
10115 /* Search for gyroscope user gain status output feature and extract its
10116 * configuration details
10117 */
10118 feat_found = extract_output_feat_config(&user_gain_cfg, BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE, dev);
10119 if(feat_found)
10120 {
10121 /* Get the feature output configuration for gyroscope user gain status */
10122 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(user_gain_cfg.page, feat_config, dev);
10123 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10124 {
10125 /* Define the offset in bytes for gyroscope user gain status */
10126 idx = user_gain_cfg.start_addr;
10127
10128 /* Get the saturation status for x-axis */
10129 user_gain_stat->sat_x = BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_SAT_STAT_X);
10130
10131 /* Get the saturation status for y-axis */
10132 user_gain_stat->sat_y = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_SAT_STAT_Y);
10133
10134 /* Get the saturation status for z-axis */
10135 user_gain_stat->sat_z = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_SAT_STAT_Z);
10136
10137 /* Get g trigger status */
10138 user_gain_stat->g_trigger_status = BMI2_GET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_G_TRIGGER_STAT);
10139 }
10140 }
10141 else
10142 {
10143 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10144 }
10145
10146 return rslt;
10147}
10148
10153XBYTE DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::extract_output_feat_config(struct bmi2_feature_config *feat_output,
10154 XBYTE type,
10155 const struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10156{
10157 /* Variable to define loop */
10158 XBYTE loop = 0;
10159
10160 /* Variable to set flag */
10161 XBYTE feat_found = BMI2_FALSE;
10162
10163 /* Search for the output feature from the output configuration array */
10164 while (loop < dev->out_sens)
10165 {
10166 if(dev->feat_output[loop].type == type)
10167 {
10168 *feat_output = dev->feat_output[loop];
10169 feat_found = BMI2_TRUE;
10170 break;
10171 }
10172
10173 loop++;
10174 }
10175
10176 /* Return flag */
10177 return feat_found;
10178}
10179
10184XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::get_gyro_cross_sense(XWORDSIG *cross_sense, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10185{
10186 /* Variable to define error */
10187 XBYTESIG rslt;
10188
10189 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
10190 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
10191
10192 /* Variable to define index */
10193 XBYTE idx = 0;
10194
10195 /* Variable to set flag */
10196 XBYTE feat_found;
10197
10198 XBYTE corr_fact_zx;
10199
10200 /* Initialize feature output for gyroscope cross sensitivity */
10201 struct bmi2_feature_config cross_sense_out_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
10202
10203 if(dev->variant_feature & BMI2_MAXIMUM_FIFO_VARIANT)
10204 {
10205 /* For maximum_fifo variant fetch the correction factor from GPIO0 */
10206 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_CAS_GPIO0_ADDR, &corr_fact_zx, 1, dev);
10207 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10208 {
10209 /* Get the gyroscope cross sensitivity coefficient */
10210 if(corr_fact_zx & BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_AXES_SENSE_SIGN_BIT_MASK)
10211 {
10212 *cross_sense = (XWORDSIG)(((XWORDSIG)corr_fact_zx) - 128);
10213 }
10214 else
10215 {
10216 *cross_sense = (XWORDSIG)(corr_fact_zx);
10217 }
10218 }
10219 }
10220 else
10221 {
10222 /* Search for gyroscope cross sensitivity feature and extract its configuration details */
10223 feat_found = extract_output_feat_config(&cross_sense_out_config, BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_SENSE, dev);
10224 if(feat_found)
10225 {
10226 /* Get the feature output configuration for gyroscope cross sensitivity
10227 * feature */
10228 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(cross_sense_out_config.page, feat_config, dev);
10229 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10230 {
10231 /* Define the offset in bytes for gyroscope cross sensitivity output */
10232 idx = cross_sense_out_config.start_addr;
10233
10234 /* discard the MSB as GYR_CAS is of only 7 bit */
10235 feat_config[idx] = feat_config[idx] & BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_AXES_SENSE_MASK;
10236
10237 /* Get the gyroscope cross sensitivity coefficient */
10238 if(feat_config[idx] & BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_AXES_SENSE_SIGN_BIT_MASK)
10239 {
10240 *cross_sense = (XWORDSIG)(((XWORDSIG)feat_config[idx]) - 128);
10241 }
10242 else
10243 {
10244 *cross_sense = (XWORDSIG)(feat_config[idx]);
10245 }
10246 }
10247 }
10248 else
10249 {
10250 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10251 }
10252 }
10253
10254 return rslt;
10255}
10256

10262//{

10298//{

10301//
10302// /* Variable to store register values */

10304//
10305// rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
10306// if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10307// {
10308// /* Enable accelerometer */
10309// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ACCEL_SENS_SEL)
10310// {

10328// {
10329// reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_TEMP_EN, BMI2_ENABLE);

10331//

10333// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)

10335// rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);

10340//}
10341
10345//XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::sensor_disable(XQWORD sensor_sel, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10346//{
10347// /* Variable to define error */
10348// XBYTESIG rslt;
10349//
10350// /* Variable to store register values */
10351// XBYTE reg_data = 0;
10352//
10353// rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
10354// if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10355// {
10356// /* Disable accelerometer */
10357// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ACCEL_SENS_SEL)
10358// {
10359// reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_ACC_EN);
10360// }
10361//
10362// /* Disable gyroscope */
10363// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_SENS_SEL)
10364// {
10365// reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_EN);
10366// }
10367//
10368// /* Disable auxiliary sensor */
10369// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_AUX_SENS_SEL)
10370// {
10371// reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_EN);
10372// }
10373//
10374// /* Disable temperature sensor */
10375// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_TEMP_SENS_SEL)
10376// {
10377// reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_TEMP_EN);
10378// }
10379//
10380// /* Enable the sensors that are set in the power control register */
10381// if(sensor_sel & BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)
10382// {
10383// rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
10384// }
10385// }
10386//
10387// return rslt;
10388//}
10389
10390
10391/***************************************************************************/
10404XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_init(struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10405{
10406 /* Variable to define error */
10407 XBYTESIG rslt;
10408
10409 /* Null-pointer check */
10410 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10411 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10412 {
10413 /* Assign chip id of BMI270 */
10414 dev->chip_id = DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270_CHIP_ID;
10415
10416 /* get the size of config array */
10417 dev->config_size = sizeof(bmi270_config_file);
10418
10419 /* Enable the variant specific features if any */
10420 dev->variant_feature = BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_SENS_ENABLE | BMI2_CRT_RTOSK_ENABLE;
10421
10422 /* An extra dummy byte is read during SPI read */
10423 if(dev->intf == BMI2_SPI_INTF)
10424 {
10425 dev->dummy_byte = 1;
10426 }
10427 else
10428 {
10429 dev->dummy_byte = 0;
10430 }
10431
10432 /* If configuration file pointer is not assigned any address */
10433 if(!dev->config_file_ptr)
10434 {
10435 /* Give the address of the configuration file array to
10436 * the device pointer
10437 */
10438 dev->config_file_ptr = bmi270_config_file;
10439 }
10440
10441 /* Initialize BMI2 sensor */
10442 rslt = bmi2_sec_init(dev);
10443 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10444 {
10445 /* Assign the offsets of the feature input
10446 * configuration to the device structure
10447 */
10448 dev->feat_config = bmi270_feat_in;
10449
10450 /* Assign the offsets of the feature output to
10451 * the device structure
10452 */
10453 dev->feat_output = bmi270_feat_out;
10454
10455 /* Assign the maximum number of pages to the
10456 * device structure
10457 */
10458 dev->page_max = DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270_MAX_PAGE_NUM;
10459
10460 /* Assign maximum number of input sensors/
10461 * features to device structure
10462 */
10463 dev->input_sens = DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270_MAX_FEAT_IN;
10464
10465 /* Assign maximum number of output sensors/
10466 * features to device structure
10467 */
10468 dev->out_sens = DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270_MAX_FEAT_OUT;
10469
10470 /* Assign the offsets of the feature interrupt
10471 * to the device structure
10472 */
10473 dev->map_int = bmi270_map_int;
10474
10475 /* Assign maximum number of feature interrupts
10476 * to device structure
10477 */
10478 dev->sens_int_map = DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270_MAX_INT_MAP;
10479
10480 /* Get the gyroscope cross axis sensitivity */
10481 rslt = bmi2_get_gyro_cross_sense(dev);
10482 }
10483 }
10484
10485 return rslt;
10486}
10487
10491XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_sensor_enable(const XBYTE *sens_list, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10492{
10493 /* Variable to define error */
10494 XBYTESIG rslt;
10495
10496 /* Variable to select sensor */
10497 XQWORD sensor_sel = 0;
10498
10499 /* Null-pointer check */
10500 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10501 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sens_list != NULL))
10502 {
10503 /* Get the selected sensors */
10504 rslt = select_sensor(sens_list, n_sens, &sensor_sel);
10505 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10506 {
10507 /* Enable the selected sensors */
10508 rslt = sensor_enable(sensor_sel, dev);
10509 }
10510 }
10511 else
10512 {
10513 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10514 }
10515
10516 return rslt;
10517}
10518
10522XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_sensor_disable(const XBYTE *sens_list, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10523{
10524 /* Variable to define error */
10525 XBYTESIG rslt;
10526
10527 /* Variable to select sensor */
10528 XQWORD sensor_sel = 0;
10529
10530 /* Null-pointer check */
10531 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10532 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sens_list != NULL))
10533 {
10534 /* Get the selected sensors */
10535 rslt = select_sensor(sens_list, n_sens, &sensor_sel);
10536 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10537 {
10538 /* Disable the selected sensors */
10539 rslt = sensor_disable(sensor_sel, dev);
10540 }
10541 }
10542 else
10543 {
10544 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10545 }
10546
10547 return rslt;
10548}
10549
10553XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_set_sensor_config(struct bmi2_sens_config *sens_cfg, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10554{
10555 /* Variable to define error */
10556 XBYTESIG rslt;
10557
10558 /* Variable to define loop */
10559 XBYTE loop;
10560
10561 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
10562 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
10563
10564 /* Null-pointer check */
10565 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10566 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sens_cfg != NULL))
10567 {
10568 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
10569 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
10570
10571 for (loop = 0; loop < n_sens; loop++)
10572 {
10573 if((sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_ACCEL) || (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO) ||
10574 (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_AUX) || (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE))
10575 {
10576 rslt = bmi2_set_sensor_config(&sens_cfg[loop], 1, dev);
10577 }
10578 else
10579 {
10580 /* Disable Advance power save if enabled for auxiliary
10581 * and feature configurations
10582 */
10583 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
10584 {
10585 /* Disable advance power save if
10586 * enabled
10587 */
10588 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
10589 }
10590
10591 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10592 {
10593 switch (sens_cfg[loop].type)
10594 {
10595 /* Set any motion configuration */
10596 case BMI2_ANY_MOTION:
10597 rslt = set_any_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.any_motion, dev);
10598 break;
10599
10600 /* Set no motion configuration */
10601 case BMI2_NO_MOTION:
10602 rslt = set_no_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.no_motion, dev);
10603 break;
10604
10605 /* Set sig-motion configuration */
10606 case BMI2_SIG_MOTION:
10607 rslt = set_sig_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.sig_motion, dev);
10608 break;
10609
10610 /* Set the step counter parameters */
10611 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER_PARAMS:
10612 rslt = set_step_count_params_config(sens_cfg[loop].cfg.step_counter_params, dev);
10613 break;
10614
10615 /* Set step counter/detector/activity configuration */
10616 case BMI2_STEP_DETECTOR:
10617 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER:
10618 case BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY:
10619 rslt = set_step_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.step_counter, dev);
10620 break;
10621
10622 /* Set the wrist gesture configuration */
10623 case BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE:
10624 rslt = set_wrist_gest_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.wrist_gest, dev);
10625 break;
10626
10627 /* Set the wrist wear wake-up configuration */
10628 case BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP:
10629 rslt = set_wrist_wear_wake_up_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.wrist_wear_wake_up, dev);
10630 break;
10631
10632 default:
10633 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10634 break;
10635 }
10636 }
10637
10638 /* Return error if any of the set configurations fail */
10639 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
10640 {
10641 break;
10642 }
10643 }
10644 }
10645
10646 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
10647 * not when already disabled
10648 */
10649 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
10650 {
10651 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
10652 }
10653 }
10654 else
10655 {
10656 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10657 }
10658
10659 return rslt;
10660}
10661
10665XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_get_sensor_config(struct bmi2_sens_config *sens_cfg, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10666{
10667 /* Variable to define error */
10668 XBYTESIG rslt;
10669
10670 /* Variable to define loop */
10671 XBYTE loop;
10672
10673 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
10674 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
10675
10676 /* Null-pointer check */
10677 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10678 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sens_cfg != NULL))
10679 {
10680 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
10681 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
10682 for (loop = 0; loop < n_sens; loop++)
10683 {
10684 if((sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_ACCEL) || (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO) ||
10685 (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_AUX) || (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE))
10686 {
10687 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_config(&sens_cfg[loop], 1, dev);
10688 }
10689 else
10690 {
10691 /* Disable Advance power save if enabled for auxiliary
10692 * and feature configurations
10693 */
10694 if((sens_cfg[loop].type >= BMI2_MAIN_SENS_MAX_NUM) || (sens_cfg[loop].type == BMI2_AUX))
10695 {
10696
10697 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
10698 {
10699 /* Disable advance power save if
10700 * enabled
10701 */
10702 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
10703 }
10704 }
10705
10706 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10707 {
10708 switch (sens_cfg[loop].type)
10709 {
10710 /* Get sig-motion configuration */
10711 case BMI2_SIG_MOTION:
10712 rslt = get_sig_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.sig_motion, dev);
10713 break;
10714
10715 /* Get any motion configuration */
10716 case BMI2_ANY_MOTION:
10717 rslt = get_any_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.any_motion, dev);
10718 break;
10719
10720 /* Get no motion configuration */
10721 case BMI2_NO_MOTION:
10722 rslt = get_no_motion_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.no_motion, dev);
10723 break;
10724
10725 /* Set the step counter parameters */
10726 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER_PARAMS:
10727 rslt = get_step_count_params_config(sens_cfg[loop].cfg.step_counter_params, dev);
10728 break;
10729
10730 /* Get step counter/detector/activity configuration */
10731 case BMI2_STEP_DETECTOR:
10732 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER:
10733 case BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY:
10734 rslt = get_step_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.step_counter, dev);
10735 break;
10736
10737 /* Get the wrist gesture configuration */
10738 case BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE:
10739 rslt = get_wrist_gest_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.wrist_gest, dev);
10740 break;
10741
10742 /* Get the wrist wear wake-up configuration */
10743 case BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP:
10744 rslt = get_wrist_wear_wake_up_config(&sens_cfg[loop].cfg.wrist_wear_wake_up, dev);
10745 break;
10746
10747 default:
10748 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10749 break;
10750 }
10751 }
10752
10753 /* Return error if any of the get configurations fail */
10754 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
10755 {
10756 break;
10757 }
10758 }
10759 }
10760
10761 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while configuring and
10762 * not when already disabled
10763 */
10764 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
10765 {
10766 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
10767 }
10768 }
10769 else
10770 {
10771 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10772 }
10773
10774 return rslt;
10775}
10776
10782XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_get_sensor_data(struct bmi2_sensor_data *sensor_data, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10783{
10784 /* Variable to define error */
10785 XBYTESIG rslt;
10786
10787 /* Variable to define loop */
10788 XBYTE loop;
10789
10790 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
10791 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
10792
10793 /* Null-pointer check */
10794 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10795 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sensor_data != NULL))
10796 {
10797 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
10798 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
10799 for (loop = 0; loop < n_sens; loop++)
10800 {
10801 if((sensor_data[loop].type == BMI2_ACCEL) || (sensor_data[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO) ||
10802 (sensor_data[loop].type == BMI2_AUX) || (sensor_data[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE) ||
10803 (sensor_data[loop].type == BMI2_GYRO_CROSS_SENSE))
10804 {
10805 rslt = bmi2_get_sensor_data(&sensor_data[loop], 1, dev);
10806 }
10807 else
10808 {
10809 /* Disable Advance power save if enabled for feature
10810 * configurations
10811 */
10812 if(sensor_data[loop].type >= BMI2_MAIN_SENS_MAX_NUM)
10813 {
10814 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
10815 {
10816 /* Disable advance power save if
10817 * enabled
10818 */
10819 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
10820 }
10821 }
10822
10823 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10824 {
10825 switch (sensor_data[loop].type)
10826 {
10827 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER:
10828
10829 /* Get step counter output */
10830 rslt = get_step_counter_output(&sensor_data[loop].sens_data.step_counter_output, dev);
10831 break;
10832 case BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY:
10833
10834 /* Get step activity output */
10835 rslt = get_step_activity_output(&sensor_data[loop].sens_data.activity_output, dev);
10836 break;
10837 case BMI2_NVM_STATUS:
10838
10839 /* Get NVM error status */
10840 rslt = get_nvm_error_status(&sensor_data[loop].sens_data.nvm_status, dev);
10841 break;
10842 case BMI2_VFRM_STATUS:
10843
10844 /* Get VFRM error status */
10845 rslt = get_vfrm_error_status(&sensor_data[loop].sens_data.vfrm_status, dev);
10846 break;
10847 case BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE:
10848
10849 /* Get wrist gesture status */
10850 rslt = get_wrist_gest_status(&sensor_data[loop].sens_data.wrist_gesture_output, dev);
10851 break;
10852 default:
10853 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
10854 break;
10855 }
10856
10857 /* Return error if any of the get sensor data fails */
10858 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
10859 {
10860 break;
10861 }
10862 }
10863 }
10864
10865 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while
10866 * configuring and not when already disabled
10867 */
10868 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
10869 {
10870 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
10871 }
10872 }
10873 }
10874 else
10875 {
10876 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10877 }
10878
10879 return rslt;
10880}
10881
10885XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_update_gyro_user_gain(const struct bmi2_gyro_user_gain_config *user_gain, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10886{
10887 /* Variable to define error */
10888 XBYTESIG rslt;
10889
10890 /* Variable to select sensor */
10891 XBYTE sens_sel[2] = { BMI2_GYRO, BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE };
10892
10893 /* Structure to define sensor configurations */
10894 struct bmi2_sens_config sens_cfg;
10895
10896 /* Variable to store status of user-gain update module */
10897 XBYTE status = 0;
10898
10899 /* Variable to define count */
10900 XBYTE count = 100;
10901
10902 /* Null-pointer check */
10903 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10904 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (user_gain != NULL))
10905 {
10906 /* Select type of feature */
10907 sens_cfg.type = BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE;
10908
10909 /* Get the user gain configurations */
10910 rslt = bmi270_get_sensor_config(&sens_cfg, 1, dev);
10911 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10912 {
10913 /* Get the user-defined ratio */
10914 sens_cfg.cfg.gyro_gain_update = *user_gain;
10915
10916 /* Set rate ratio for all axes */
10917 rslt = bmi270_set_sensor_config(&sens_cfg, 1, dev);
10918 }
10919
10920 /* Disable gyroscope */
10921 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10922 {
10923 rslt = bmi270_sensor_disable(&sens_sel[0], 1, dev);
10924 }
10925
10926 /* Enable gyroscope user-gain update module */
10927 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10928 {
10929 rslt = bmi270_sensor_enable(&sens_sel[1], 1, dev);
10930 }
10931
10932 /* Set the command to trigger the computation */
10933 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10934 {
10935 rslt = bmi2_set_command_register(BMI2_USR_GAIN_CMD, dev);
10936 }
10937
10938 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10939 {
10940 /* Poll until enable bit of user-gain update is 0 */
10941 while (count--)
10942 {
10943 rslt = get_user_gain_upd_status(&status, dev);
10944 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (status == 0))
10945 {
10946 /* Enable compensation of gain defined
10947 * in the GAIN register
10948 */
10949 rslt = enable_gyro_gain(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
10950
10951 /* Enable gyroscope */
10952 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10953 {
10954 rslt = bmi270_sensor_enable(&sens_sel[0], 1, dev);
10955 }
10956
10957 break;
10958 }
10959
10960 bmi2_delay_us(10000, dev->intf_ptr);
10961 }
10962
10963 /* Return error if user-gain update is failed */
10964 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (status != 0))
10965 {
10966 rslt = BMI2_E_GYR_USER_GAIN_UPD_FAIL;
10967 }
10968 }
10969 }
10970 else
10971 {
10972 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
10973 }
10974
10975 return rslt;
10976}
10977
10981XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_read_gyro_user_gain(struct bmi2_gyro_user_gain_data *gyr_usr_gain, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
10982{
10983 /* Variable to define error */
10984 XBYTESIG rslt;
10985
10986 /* Variable to define register data */
10987 XBYTE reg_data[3] = { 0 };
10988
10989 /* Null-pointer check */
10990 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
10991 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (gyr_usr_gain != NULL))
10992 {
10993 /* Get the gyroscope compensated gain values */
10994 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_GYR_USR_GAIN_0_ADDR, reg_data, 3, dev);
10995 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
10996 {
10997 /* Gyroscope user gain correction X-axis */
10998 gyr_usr_gain->x = (XBYTESIG)BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[0], BMI2_GYR_USR_GAIN_X);
10999
11000 /* Gyroscope user gain correction Y-axis */
11001 gyr_usr_gain->y = (XBYTESIG)BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[1], BMI2_GYR_USR_GAIN_Y);
11002
11003 /* Gyroscope user gain correction z-axis */
11004 gyr_usr_gain->z = (XBYTESIG)BMI2_GET_BIT_POS0(reg_data[2], BMI2_GYR_USR_GAIN_Z);
11005 }
11006 }
11007 else
11008 {
11009 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
11010 }
11011
11012 return rslt;
11013}
11014
11018XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::bmi270_map_feat_int(const struct bmi2_sens_int_config *sens_int, XBYTE n_sens, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11019{
11020 /* Variable to define error */
11021 XBYTESIG rslt;
11022
11023 /* Variable to define loop */
11024 XBYTE loop;
11025
11026 /* Null-pointer check */
11027 rslt = null_ptr_check(dev);
11028 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sens_int != NULL))
11029 {
11030 for (loop = 0; loop < n_sens; loop++)
11031 {
11032 switch (sens_int[loop].type)
11033 {
11034 case BMI2_SIG_MOTION:
11035 case BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE:
11036 case BMI2_ANY_MOTION:
11037 case BMI2_NO_MOTION:
11038 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER:
11039 case BMI2_STEP_DETECTOR:
11040 case BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY:
11041 case BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP:
11042
11043 rslt = bmi2_map_feat_int(sens_int[loop].type, sens_int[loop].hw_int_pin, dev);
11044 break;
11045 default:
11046 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11047 break;
11048 }
11049
11050 /* Return error if interrupt mapping fails */
11051 if(rslt != BMI2_OK)
11052 {
11053 break;
11054 }
11055 }
11056 }
11057 else
11058 {
11059 rslt = BMI2_E_NULL_PTR;
11060 }
11061
11062 return rslt;
11063}
11064
11065/***************************************************************************/
11066
11075XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::select_sensor(const XBYTE *sens_list, XBYTE n_sens, XQWORD *sensor_sel)
11076{
11077 /* Variable to define error */
11078 XBYTESIG rslt = BMI2_OK;
11079
11080 /* Variable to define loop */
11081 XBYTE count;
11082
11083 for (count = 0; count < n_sens; count++)
11084 {
11085 switch (sens_list[count])
11086 {
11087 case BMI2_ACCEL : *sensor_sel |= BMI2_ACCEL_SENS_SEL; break;
11088 case BMI2_GYRO :
11089 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_GYRO_SENS_SEL;
11090 break;
11091 case BMI2_AUX:
11092 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_AUX_SENS_SEL;
11093 break;
11094 case BMI2_TEMP:
11095 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_TEMP_SENS_SEL;
11096 break;
11097 case BMI2_SIG_MOTION:
11098 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_SIG_MOTION_SEL;
11099 break;
11100 case BMI2_ANY_MOTION:
11101 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_ANY_MOT_SEL;
11102 break;
11103 case BMI2_NO_MOTION:
11104 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_NO_MOT_SEL;
11105 break;
11106 case BMI2_STEP_DETECTOR:
11107 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_STEP_DETECT_SEL;
11108 break;
11109 case BMI2_STEP_COUNTER:
11110 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_STEP_COUNT_SEL;
11111 break;
11112 case BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY:
11113 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_STEP_ACT_SEL;
11114 break;
11115 case BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE:
11116 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE_SEL;
11117 break;
11118 case BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF:
11119 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF_SEL;
11120 break;
11121 case BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE:
11122 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_WRIST_GEST_SEL;
11123 break;
11124 case BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP:
11125 *sensor_sel |= BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_SEL;
11126 break;
11127 default:
11128 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11129 break;
11130 }
11131 }
11132
11133 return rslt;
11134}
11135
11139XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::sensor_enable(XQWORD sensor_sel, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11140{
11141 /* Variable to define error */
11142 XBYTESIG rslt;
11143
11144 /* Variable to store register values */
11145 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
11146
11147 /* Variable to define loop */
11148 XBYTE loop = 1;
11149
11150 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
11151 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
11152
11153 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
11154 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11155 {
11156 /* Enable accelerometer */
11157 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ACCEL_SENS_SEL)
11158 {
11159 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_ACC_EN, BMI2_ENABLE);
11160 }
11161
11162 /* Enable gyroscope */
11163 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_SENS_SEL)
11164 {
11165 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_EN, BMI2_ENABLE);
11166 }
11167
11168 /* Enable auxiliary sensor */
11169 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_AUX_SENS_SEL)
11170 {
11171 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_EN, BMI2_ENABLE);
11172 }
11173
11174 /* Enable temperature sensor */
11175 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_TEMP_SENS_SEL)
11176 {
11177 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BITS(reg_data, BMI2_TEMP_EN, BMI2_ENABLE);
11178 }
11179
11180 /* Enable the sensors that are set in the power control register */
11181 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)
11182 {
11183 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
11184 }
11185 }
11186
11187 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sensor_sel & ~(BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)))
11188 {
11189 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
11190 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
11191 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
11192 {
11193 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
11194 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11195 }
11196
11197 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11198 {
11199 while (loop--)
11200 {
11201 /* Enable sig-motion feature */
11202 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_SIG_MOTION_SEL)
11203 {
11204 rslt = set_sig_motion(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11205 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11206 {
11207 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_SIG_MOTION_SEL;
11208 }
11209 else
11210 {
11211 break;
11212 }
11213 }
11214
11215 /* Enable any motion feature */
11216 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ANY_MOT_SEL)
11217 {
11218 rslt = set_any_motion(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11219 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11220 {
11221 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_ANY_MOT_SEL;
11222 }
11223 else
11224 {
11225 break;
11226 }
11227 }
11228
11229 /* Enable no motion feature */
11230 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_NO_MOT_SEL)
11231 {
11232 rslt = set_no_motion(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11233 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11234 {
11235 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_NO_MOT_SEL;
11236 }
11237 else
11238 {
11239 break;
11240 }
11241 }
11242
11243 /* Enable step detector feature */
11244 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_DETECT_SEL)
11245 {
11246 rslt = set_step_detector(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11247 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11248 {
11249 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_STEP_DETECT_SEL;
11250 }
11251 else
11252 {
11253 break;
11254 }
11255 }
11256
11257 /* Enable step counter feature */
11258 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_COUNT_SEL)
11259 {
11260 rslt = set_step_counter(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11261 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11262 {
11263 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_STEP_COUNT_SEL;
11264 }
11265 else
11266 {
11267 break;
11268 }
11269 }
11270
11271 /* Enable step activity feature */
11272 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_ACT_SEL)
11273 {
11274 rslt = set_step_activity(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11275 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11276 {
11277 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_STEP_ACT_SEL;
11278 }
11279 else
11280 {
11281 break;
11282 }
11283 }
11284
11285 /* Enable gyroscope user gain */
11286 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE_SEL)
11287 {
11288 rslt = set_gyro_user_gain(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11289 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11290 {
11291 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE_SEL;
11292 }
11293 else
11294 {
11295 break;
11296 }
11297 }
11298
11299 /* Enable gyroscope self-offset correction feature */
11300 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF_SEL)
11301 {
11302 rslt = set_gyro_self_offset_corr(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11303 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11304 {
11305 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF_SEL;
11306 }
11307 else
11308 {
11309 break;
11310 }
11311 }
11312
11313 /* Enable wrist gesture feature for wearable variant */
11314 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_WRIST_GEST_SEL)
11315 {
11316 rslt = set_wrist_gesture(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11317 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11318 {
11319 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_WRIST_GEST_SEL;
11320 }
11321 else
11322 {
11323 break;
11324 }
11325 }
11326
11327 /* Enable wrist wear wake-up feature */
11328 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_SEL)
11329 {
11330 rslt = set_wrist_wear_wake_up(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11331 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11332 {
11333 dev->sens_en_stat |= BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_SEL;
11334 }
11335 else
11336 {
11337 break;
11338 }
11339 }
11340 }
11341
11342 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while
11343 * configuring and not when already disabled
11344 */
11345 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
11346 {
11347 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11348 }
11349 }
11350 }
11351
11352 return rslt;
11353}
11354
11358XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::sensor_disable(XQWORD sensor_sel, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11359{
11360 /* Variable to define error */
11361 XBYTESIG rslt;
11362
11363 /* Variable to store register values */
11364 XBYTE reg_data = 0;
11365
11366 /* Variable to define loop */
11367 XBYTE loop = 1;
11368
11369 /* Variable to get the status of advance power save */
11370 XBYTE aps_stat = 0;
11371
11372 rslt = bmi2_get_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
11373 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11374 {
11375 /* Disable accelerometer */
11376 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ACCEL_SENS_SEL)
11377 {
11378 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_ACC_EN);
11379 }
11380
11381 /* Disable gyroscope */
11382 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_SENS_SEL)
11383 {
11384 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_GYR_EN);
11385 }
11386
11387 /* Disable auxiliary sensor */
11388 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_AUX_SENS_SEL)
11389 {
11390 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_AUX_EN);
11391 }
11392
11393 /* Disable temperature sensor */
11394 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_TEMP_SENS_SEL)
11395 {
11396 reg_data = BMI2_SET_BIT_VAL0(reg_data, BMI2_TEMP_EN);
11397 }
11398
11399 /* Disable the sensors that are set in the power control register */
11400 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)
11401 {
11402 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_PWR_CTRL_ADDR, &reg_data, 1, dev);
11403 }
11404 }
11405
11406 if((rslt == BMI2_OK) && (sensor_sel & ~(BMI2_MAIN_SENSORS)))
11407 {
11408 /* Get status of advance power save mode */
11409 aps_stat = dev->aps_status;
11410 if(aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE)
11411 {
11412 /* Disable advance power save if enabled */
11413 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11414 }
11415
11416 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11417 {
11418 while (loop--)
11419 {
11420 /* Disable sig-motion feature */
11421 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_SIG_MOTION_SEL)
11422 {
11423 rslt = set_sig_motion(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11424 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11425 {
11426 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_SIG_MOTION_SEL;
11427 }
11428 else
11429 {
11430 break;
11431 }
11432 }
11433
11434 /* Disable any-motion feature */
11435 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_ANY_MOT_SEL)
11436 {
11437 rslt = set_any_motion(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11438 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11439 {
11440 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_ANY_MOT_SEL;
11441 }
11442 else
11443 {
11444 break;
11445 }
11446 }
11447
11448 /* Disable no-motion feature */
11449 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_NO_MOT_SEL)
11450 {
11451 rslt = set_no_motion(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11452 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11453 {
11454 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_NO_MOT_SEL;
11455 }
11456 else
11457 {
11458 break;
11459 }
11460 }
11461
11462 /* Disable step detector feature */
11463 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_DETECT_SEL)
11464 {
11465 rslt = set_step_detector(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11466 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11467 {
11468 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_STEP_DETECT_SEL;
11469 }
11470 else
11471 {
11472 break;
11473 }
11474 }
11475
11476 /* Disable step counter feature */
11477 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_COUNT_SEL)
11478 {
11479 rslt = set_step_counter(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11480 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11481 {
11482 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_STEP_COUNT_SEL;
11483 }
11484 else
11485 {
11486 break;
11487 }
11488 }
11489
11490 /* Disable step activity feature */
11491 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_STEP_ACT_SEL)
11492 {
11493 rslt = set_step_activity(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11494 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11495 {
11496 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_STEP_ACT_SEL;
11497 }
11498 else
11499 {
11500 break;
11501 }
11502 }
11503
11504 /* Disable gyroscope user gain */
11505 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE_SEL)
11506 {
11507 rslt = set_gyro_user_gain(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11508 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11509 {
11510 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE_SEL;
11511 }
11512 else
11513 {
11514 break;
11515 }
11516 }
11517
11518 /* Disable gyroscope self-offset correction feature */
11519 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF_SEL)
11520 {
11521 rslt = set_gyro_self_offset_corr(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11522 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11523 {
11524 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF_SEL;
11525 }
11526 else
11527 {
11528 break;
11529 }
11530 }
11531
11532 /* Disable wrist gesture feature for wearable variant*/
11533 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_WRIST_GEST_SEL)
11534 {
11535 rslt = set_wrist_gesture(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11536 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11537 {
11538 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_WRIST_GEST_SEL;
11539 }
11540 else
11541 {
11542 break;
11543 }
11544 }
11545
11546 /* Enable wrist wear wake-up feature */
11547 if(sensor_sel & BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_SEL)
11548 {
11549 rslt = set_wrist_wear_wake_up(BMI2_DISABLE, dev);
11550 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11551 {
11552 dev->sens_en_stat &= ~BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_SEL;
11553 }
11554 else
11555 {
11556 break;
11557 }
11558 }
11559
11560 /* Enable Advance power save if disabled while
11561 * configuring and not when already disabled
11562 */
11563 if((aps_stat == BMI2_ENABLE) && (rslt == BMI2_OK))
11564 {
11565 rslt = bmi2_set_adv_power_save(BMI2_ENABLE, dev);
11566 }
11567 }
11568 }
11569 }
11570
11571 return rslt;
11572}
11573
11577XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_any_motion(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11578{
11579 /* Variable to define error */
11580 XBYTESIG rslt;
11581
11582 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11583 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11584
11585 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11586 XBYTE idx = 0;
11587
11588 /* Variable to set flag */
11589 XBYTE feat_found;
11590
11591 /* Initialize feature configuration for any-motion */
11592 struct bmi2_feature_config any_mot_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11593
11594 /* Search for any-motion feature and extract its configurations details */
11595 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&any_mot_config, BMI2_ANY_MOTION, dev);
11596 if(feat_found)
11597 {
11598 /* Get the configuration from the page where any-motion feature resides */
11599 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(any_mot_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11600 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11601 {
11602 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of any-motion axes */
11603 idx = any_mot_config.start_addr + BMI2_ANY_MOT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11604
11605 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11606 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_ANY_NO_MOT_EN, enable);
11607
11608 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11609 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11610 }
11611 }
11612 else
11613 {
11614 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11615 }
11616
11617 return rslt;
11618}
11619
11623XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_no_motion(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11624{
11625 /* Variable to define error */
11626 XBYTESIG rslt;
11627
11628 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11629 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11630
11631 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11632 XBYTE idx = 0;
11633
11634 /* Variable to set flag */
11635 XBYTE feat_found;
11636
11637 /* Initialize feature configuration for no-motion */
11638 struct bmi2_feature_config no_mot_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11639
11640 /* Search for no-motion feature and extract its configurations details */
11641 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&no_mot_config, BMI2_NO_MOTION, dev);
11642 if(feat_found)
11643 {
11644 /* Get the configuration from the page where any/no-motion feature resides */
11645 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(no_mot_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11646 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11647 {
11648 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of no-motion axes */
11649 idx = no_mot_config.start_addr + BMI2_NO_MOT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11650
11651 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11652 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_ANY_NO_MOT_EN, enable);
11653
11654 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11655 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11656 }
11657 }
11658 else
11659 {
11660 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11661 }
11662
11663 return rslt;
11664}
11665
11669XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_step_detector(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11670{
11671 /* Variable to define error */
11672 XBYTESIG rslt;
11673
11674 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11675 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11676
11677 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11678 XBYTE idx = 0;
11679
11680 /* Variable to set flag */
11681 XBYTE feat_found;
11682
11683 /* Initialize feature configuration for step detector */
11684 struct bmi2_feature_config step_det_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11685
11686 /* Search for step detector feature and extract its configuration details */
11687 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&step_det_config, BMI2_STEP_DETECTOR, dev);
11688 if(feat_found)
11689 {
11690 /* Get the configuration from the page where step detector feature resides */
11691 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(step_det_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11692 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11693 {
11694 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of step detector */
11695 idx = step_det_config.start_addr + BMI2_STEP_COUNT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11696
11697 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11698 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_STEP_DET_FEAT_EN, enable);
11699
11700 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11701 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11702 }
11703 }
11704 else
11705 {
11706 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11707 }
11708
11709 return rslt;
11710}
11711
11715XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_step_counter(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11716{
11717 /* Variable to define error */
11718 XBYTESIG rslt;
11719
11720 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11721 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11722
11723 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11724 XBYTE idx = 0;
11725
11726 /* Variable to set flag */
11727 XBYTE feat_found;
11728
11729 /* Initialize feature configuration for step counter */
11730 struct bmi2_feature_config step_count_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11731
11732 /* Search for step counter feature and extract its configuration details */
11733 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&step_count_config, BMI2_STEP_COUNTER, dev);
11734 if(feat_found)
11735 {
11736 /* Get the configuration from the page where step-counter feature resides */
11737 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(step_count_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11738 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11739 {
11740 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of step counter */
11741 idx = step_count_config.start_addr + BMI2_STEP_COUNT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11742
11743 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11744 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_STEP_COUNT_FEAT_EN, enable);
11745
11746 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11747 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11748 }
11749 }
11750 else
11751 {
11752 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11753 }
11754
11755 return rslt;
11756}
11757
11761XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_sig_motion(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11762{
11763 /* Variable to define error */
11764 XBYTESIG rslt;
11765
11766 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11767 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11768
11769 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11770 XBYTE idx = 0;
11771
11772 /* Variable to set flag */
11773 XBYTE feat_found;
11774
11775 /* Initialize feature configuration for sig-motion */
11776 struct bmi2_feature_config sig_mot_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11777
11778 /* Search for sig-motion feature and extract its configuration details */
11779 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&sig_mot_config, BMI2_SIG_MOTION, dev);
11780 if(feat_found)
11781 {
11782 /* Get the configuration from the page where sig-motion feature resides */
11783 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(sig_mot_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11784 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11785 {
11786 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of sig-motion */
11787 idx = sig_mot_config.start_addr + BMI2_SIG_MOT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11788
11789 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11790 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BIT_POS0(feat_config[idx], BMI2_SIG_MOT_FEAT_EN, enable);
11791
11792 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11793 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11794 }
11795 }
11796 else
11797 {
11798 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11799 }
11800
11801 return rslt;
11802}
11803
11807XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_step_activity(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11808{
11809 /* Variable to define error */
11810 XBYTESIG rslt;
11811
11812 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11813 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11814
11815 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11816 XBYTE idx = 0;
11817
11818 /* Variable to set flag */
11819 XBYTE feat_found;
11820
11821 /* Initialize feature configuration for step activity */
11822 struct bmi2_feature_config step_act_config = { 0, 0, 0 };
11823
11824 /* Search for step activity feature and extract its configuration details */
11825 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&step_act_config, BMI2_STEP_ACTIVITY, dev);
11826 if(feat_found)
11827 {
11828 /* Get the configuration from the page where step-activity
11829 * feature resides
11830 */
11831 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(step_act_config.page, feat_config, dev);
11832 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11833 {
11834 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of step activity */
11835 idx = step_act_config.start_addr + BMI2_STEP_COUNT_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
11836
11837 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11838 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_STEP_ACT_FEAT_EN, enable);
11839
11840 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11841 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11842 }
11843 }
11844 else
11845 {
11846 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11847 }
11848
11849 return rslt;
11850}
11851
11856XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_gyro_self_offset_corr(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11857{
11858 /* Variable to define error */
11859 XBYTESIG rslt;
11860
11861 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11862 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11863
11864 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11865 XBYTE idx = 0;
11866
11867 /* Variable to set flag */
11868 XBYTE feat_found;
11869
11870 /* Initialize feature configuration for self-offset correction */
11871 struct bmi2_feature_config self_off_corr_cfg = { 0, 0, 0 };
11872
11873 /* Search for self-offset correction and extract its configuration details */
11874 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&self_off_corr_cfg, BMI2_GYRO_SELF_OFF, dev);
11875 if(feat_found)
11876 {
11877 /* Get the configuration from the page where self-offset
11878 * correction feature resides
11879 */
11880 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(self_off_corr_cfg.page, feat_config, dev);
11881 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11882 {
11883 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of self-offset correction */
11884 idx = self_off_corr_cfg.start_addr;
11885
11886 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11887 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYR_SELF_OFF_CORR_FEAT_EN, enable);
11888
11889 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11890 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11891 }
11892 }
11893 else
11894 {
11895 rslt = BMI2_E_INVALID_SENSOR;
11896 }
11897
11898 return rslt;

11904XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_wrist_gesture(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11905{
11906 /* Variable to define error */
11907 XBYTESIG rslt;
11908
11909 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11910 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11911
11912 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11913 XBYTE idx = 0;
11914
11915 /* Variable to set flag */
11916 XBYTE feat_found;
11917
11918 /* Initialize feature configuration for wrist gesture */
11919 struct bmi2_feature_config wrist_gest_cfg = { 0, 0, 0 };
11920
11921 /* Search for wrist gesture and extract its configuration details */
11922 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&wrist_gest_cfg, BMI2_WRIST_GESTURE, dev);
11923 if(feat_found)
11924 {
11925 /* Get the configuration from the page where wrist gesture feature resides */
11926 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(wrist_gest_cfg.page, feat_config, dev);
11927 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11928 {
11929 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of wrist gesture */
11930 idx = wrist_gest_cfg.start_addr;
11931

11933 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_WRIST_GEST_FEAT_EN, enable);
11934
11935 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11936 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11937 }
11938 }
11939 else

11942 }

11944 return rslt;

11946
11950XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_wrist_wear_wake_up(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
11951{
11952 /* Variable to define error */
11953 XBYTESIG rslt;
11954
11955 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
11956 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
11957
11958 /* Variable to define the array offset */
11959 XBYTE idx = 0;
11960
11961 /* Variable to set flag */
11962 XBYTE feat_found;
11963
11964 /* Initialize feature configuration for wrist wear wake up */
11965 struct bmi2_feature_config wrist_wake_up_cfg = { 0, 0, 0 };
11966
11967 /* Search for wrist wear wake up and extract its configuration details */
11968 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&wrist_wake_up_cfg, BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP, dev);
11969 if(feat_found)
11970 {
11971 /* Get the configuration from the page where wrist wear wake up
11972 * feature resides
11973 */
11974 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(wrist_wake_up_cfg.page, feat_config, dev);
11975 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
11976 {
11977 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of wrist wear wake up */
11978 idx = wrist_wake_up_cfg.start_addr;
11979
11980 /* Set the feature enable bit */
11981 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_WRIST_WEAR_WAKE_UP_FEAT_EN, enable);
11982
11983 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
11984 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
11985 }
11986 }
11987 else

11991

11994
11999XBYTESIG DIOI2C6AXISTRACKINGBMI270::set_gyro_user_gain(XBYTE enable, struct bmi2_dev *dev)
12000{
12001 /* Variable to define error */
12002 XBYTESIG rslt;
12003
12004 /* Array to define the feature configuration */
12005 XBYTE feat_config[BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES] = { 0 };
12006
12007 /* Variable to define the array offset */
12008 XBYTE idx = 0;
12009
12010 /* Variable to set flag */
12011 XBYTE feat_found;
12012
12013 /* Initialize feature configuration for gyroscope user gain */
12014 struct bmi2_feature_config gyr_user_gain_cfg = { 0, 0, 0 };
12015
12016 /* Search for user gain feature and extract its configuration details */
12017 feat_found = bmi2_extract_input_feat_config(&gyr_user_gain_cfg, BMI2_GYRO_GAIN_UPDATE, dev);
12018 if(feat_found)
12019 {
12020 /* Get the configuration from the page where user gain feature resides */
12021 rslt = bmi2_get_feat_config(gyr_user_gain_cfg.page, feat_config, dev);
12022 if(rslt == BMI2_OK)
12023 {
12024 /* Define the offset for enable/disable of user gain */
12025 idx = gyr_user_gain_cfg.start_addr + BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_FEAT_EN_OFFSET;
12026
12027 /* Set the feature enable bit */
12028 feat_config[idx] = BMI2_SET_BITS(feat_config[idx], BMI2_GYR_USER_GAIN_FEAT_EN, enable);
12029
12030 /* Set the configuration back to the page */
12031 rslt = bmi2_set_regs(BMI2_FEATURES_REG_ADDR, feat_config, BMI2_FEAT_SIZE_IN_BYTES, dev);
12032 }
12033 }
12034 else
